Thank you for taking the time to read about our campaign, sharing and contributing towards it.

story:
Short Summary

Major profit is to be made on crypto currency and forex fiat, but the risks are high.

This project will allow me to adapt my highly profitable, but low risk forex triangular arbitrage strategy to work on cryptocurrencies.

Problem with forex is that it moves to fast with very few and short lived arbitrage opportunities.
Crypto moves much slower, but in huge leaps, which creates big and regular arbitrage opportunities not seen in forex fiat currencies.

Triangular arbitrage work by buying 3 currencies in a circular fashion.

Example : You take your 1 bitcoin and buy ethereum, then take the ethereum and buy litecoin, then take the litecoin and buy back bitcoin.

You would expect to end with 1 bitcoin (minus transaction costs) seeing that you just bought in a circle, but because of market inefficiencies you will end up with either 1.1 or 0.9 bitcoins (exaggerated example) and therefore you can make 0.1 bitcoin profit every time you trade this circle during a profitable run by just playing the inefficiencies.

In theory you can not lose seeing that you will know ahead of time that you will make profit and only trade when you can make profit, but in practice there can be multiple problems like a slow internet connection, your pc the program runs on restarting, ex.. , but even then the amount you could lose during these unforeseen problem times is far outweighed by the overall profit and these problems are so few and far in-between that the drawdown is almost negligible for very low risk.

You also remain unaffected by price spikes and drops not connected to the base currency you use for even less risk.

 

I plan to make this program a fire and forget program that automatically generates a passive income for its users.

 

 

What I Need & What You Get

I want to create an automated program that will trade on a cryptocurrency exchange.

This program will run with the minimum to no settings so that it can be fully automated, without blaming the user of the wrong settings like other systems.

I have already partially created an automated EA/program for the forex fiat currency market, which I will adapt for use on a cryptocurrency exchange.

I need funds to allow me to take off work for 4 months while I develop and test this new program.

I also need funds to pay for my development tools. (laptop, internet, power, Online Servers, exchange testing funds, api licences if any for fast crypto exchange connection)

Once the project is complete and properly tested I will update this campaign with all the results and supply all people that donated more than $100 with the program for their own use.

People that donate more than $2000 will also get the source code of this program for their own use or just to verify that the code is clean with no hidden features like some other scaly programs out there and put your mind at ease.

As a stretch goal I still want to complete my Forex triangular arbitrage EA/program and if this campaign goes above $50000 then I will also complete the forex EA and supply the EA to those that contributed and also the source code to those above $2000.

For more detail about what I am planning then please look at a forexfactory thread I have created some time go that goes into a bit more detail and it also showcases the partial forex ea that I created to test the strategy long ago.

https://www.forexfactory.com/showthread.php?t=6...

 

 

The Impact

I have been putting a lot of development into this strategy for a couple of years now and have reached a point where I have to ask for assistance to fund the final step of the development.

Look at the forexfactory link to see my history of where I started and tried to complete the project on my own funds and I almost succeeded, only to be stopped after proving the theory and even creating a semi functional EA, by not being able to afford to continue.

Once this project is complete it can stand to make a lot of money and hopefully help others to generate a stable passive income.

 

 

Risks & Challenges

Triangular arbitrage work by buying 3 currencies in a circular fashion.

Example : You take your 1 bitcoin and buy ethereum, then take the ethereum and buy litecoin, then take the litecoin and buy back bitcoin.

You would expect to end with 1 bitcoin (minus transaction costs) seeing that you just bought in a circle, but because of market inefficiencies you will end up with either 1.1 or 0.9 bitcoins (exaggerated example) and therefore you can make 0.1 bitcoin profit every time you trade this circle during a profitable run by just playing the inefficiencies.

In theory you can not lose seeing that you will know ahead of time that you will make profit and only trade when you can make profit, but in practice there can be multiple problems like a slow internet connection, your pc the program runs on restarting, ex.. , but even then the amount you could lose during these unforeseen problem times is far outweighed by the overall profit and these problems are so few and far in-between that the drawdown is almost negligible for very low risk.

You also remain unaffected by price spikes and drops not connected to the base currency you use for even less risk.

I am no financial adviser and can not guarantee that this will always make profit, but have studied and tested this strategy to exhaustion and have even released the full strategy online to be scrutinised.

All I can say is that this project is a passion of mine and you only have to look at my progress as reported in the forexfactory thread to see the possibilities of this system and my dedication to this project.

https://www.forexfactory.com/showthread.php?t=6...

I just need help with the final step.

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

I need help with spreading the word about it.

Show people my previous work, which this campaign will be partially based off.

https://www.forexfactory.com/showthread.php?t=6...

If you have got access to a fast VPS close to the binance exchange, china or europe and you allow me access to it then that can also help speed up the development, once the campaign is ready to start.

story:
globellColor offers the first consumer distance calibration tool worldwide. This brings lab technology to your workspace and enables better results of your digital image editing. It is fast, user friendly and precise – all of this combined at an affordable price!

If you want your images to appear just as brilliant in print as they do on your screen, then you need a color calibration tool. But you have to keep in mind that not every room and all surrounding light conditions are the same. Also the reflections from every screen are different.  Color calibration that was able to take all of this into consideration used to be very expensive.
The good news from this project? Today, we can offer this sophisticated hardware at a very affordable price.

globellColor helps you set up your monitor professionally in just a few simple steps. Colors, brightness and contrast are displayed perfectly while taking human perception into account, all to ensure outstanding precision with minimal effort.

Thanks to globellColor’s standing device and the new revolutionary distance calibration, you will receive the most advanced consumer product on a professional level, that ensures even better – more natural – results.

We have developed the right solution with the community for the community. Within our successful first crowdfunding campaign we have created the globellColorMeter – an almost professional screen calibration tool. There is no longer any excuse for putting up with less-than-perfect monitor settings.

 

Thanks to the tremendous support of our supporters we were able to build our own sensor and combine it with our powerful software. But we also innovated further  while we were fulfilling the project so that now we are back on Indiegogo to share our passion for true-to-life colors with everyone!

Get your globellColorSuite today and make sure that you see your colors as they are supposed to be!

During our Indiegogo campaign you can order your globellColorSuite starting from only $149 (RRP $249).

With globellColor, there is no need to use your best judgement.

Unfortunately, our eyes cannot be trusted. They work very closely with our brain, where a kind of built-in white balance automatically ‘corrects’ deviations in brightness and color temperature. Unfortunately, evolution has done such a good job of this that our eyes are really quite unsuited to the precise visual settings of monitors.

 

While a number of products have sought to compensate for this biological handicap for years now, none have proved satisfactory. These solutions have been technically ambitious but complicated and expensive to use. Or they are easy to use and affordable, but unable to function at a sufficiently high standard.
 


We refuse to accept this ‘either/or’ situation. globellColor offers a technically mature solution that is easy and fast to use and delivers precise calibration results at an attractive price.

We even went one step further. Compared to existing solutions the globellColorMeter comes with several significant advantages. The most obvious one: globellColor is standing and is measuring at a distance!

We are proud to offer you the first standing device for screen calibration. The time of complicated hanging and adjusting of a sensor on the screen is over and you can lean your globellColorMeter conveniently against your screen – even the monitor hoods can remain untouched.

Calibration with globellColor and EIZO goes hand in hand. The software already supports the hardware calibration of a wide range of EIZO displays and the list keeps growing.
 

To offer you a more natural result of your screen calibration and profiling, we have added another revolutionary feature, that until now has been restricted to laboratory-grade meters with a high price tag. You can place the globellColorMeter with the help of its stand a few centimeters away from the display and perform a distance calibration.
 


During the distance measurement, the sensor does not just record the light emitted by the display, but also takes into account ambient light that can reflect off the display and combines these values for correction calculation. For the user, color perception is therefore enhanced to the best possible level, as the same conditions can now apply for both the human eye and the sensor. With this in mind, monitors can be calibrated to L-Star standard, so they are adjusted to match human perception.
 

globellColor hardware and software. 

The centerpiece of the globellColor range is our high-quality glass optics that guarantees the best possible calibration results when combined with our high-performance glass filter sensor. Developed in collaboration with Meyer-Optik-Görlitz lens specialists, this lens allows maximum light absorption during measurement. Our optics enable the sensor to record all data precisely, and offer consistent calibration. This is the foundation of our innovations.

The interplay between our powerful hardware and sophisticated software makes globellColor the most precise, easy-to-use product in its price range. You can calibrate your monitor with globellColor in just three steps and less than five minutes. After launching the software, place the sensor on the monitor, select the appropriate preset, and start the calibration process. The software measures the monitor’s current display settings before creating the right color profile for your environment. This profile is automatically saved in the right place and enabled.

When developing the software, we focused on making it as easy to use as possible, without forcing more experienced users to give up on an even greater range of possibilities. Ambitious hobby photographers won’t have to do without a simple and instant way to improve the quality of their screen display. And professional users can take advantage of globellColor’s more advanced features - that they already know from existing tools - to fine tune and optimize the display performance of their monitors.

The team behind globellColor

When we started developing gobellColor, we made one simple promise: No compromises. From the very beginning, our goal was to be able to offer a calibration tool that was easy to use and satisfied the highest technical requirements, without having to place it in a high price segment.

Expertise made in Germany

Without our decades of experience in the field of color management, photography and monitor calibration, as well as the expertise of partners such as Meyer-Optik Görlitz, we would not have achieved our ambitious goal: To enable the best possible calibration results through the most easy-to-use tool and perfect workmanship.

Today, we are pleased with the result! We know you will be, too.



Shipping Information

The globellColorSuite will be available worldwide. Your suite will be shipped either from Germany or the US. Since local regulations vary, please note that we cannot be held responsible for additional sales taxes or import/customs fees added by your country. If you have a question about shipping or handling, please don’t hesitate to contact us! 

Deliveries to Germany and the European Union: Shipping costs to Germany are $10 USD and within the European Union are $20 USD. For our supporters from the European Union, please note that VAT is not included and needs to be added seperately. If our project is successfully funded, we will get in contact with you in case of open VAT.

Deliveries to the U.S.: Shipping costs of the sensors in the U.S. are $20 USD. Please note that sales tax is not included and must be added in line with local regulations.

Deliveries outside U.S. and the European Union: For deliveries to regions outside U.S. or the European Union the shipping costs are $40 USD.

Please note there may be extra import costs/customs/taxes to pay upon delivery, depending on your location. Customs and taxes are subject to possible change and applicable law at the time of delivery will have to be taken into account. If you have a question about shipping or handling, please don’t hesitate to contact us! If you have forgotten to add VAT/sales tax to your pledge, you can just raise it as long as the Indiegogo project is live.

 

Risks and Challenges

As you read this, globellColor is being manufactured and shipped worldwide. We never stop to make our products better and are currently adding the additional stand to our serial production. The globellColor team has carefully evaluated and mitigated all foreseeable risks and challenges, but may face unforeseen events. We have already successfully designed, created and shipped globellColorSuites without the additional stand. Each of the final sensors will be individually calibrated and checked to fulfill the highest quality standard.

Our delivery dates, as outlined in the campaign, are based on careful planning and our manufacturing experience with other crowdfunding campaigns, but may change due to materials, suppliers and unforeseen events. We will ensure that we keep each of our supporters fully updated. Conversely, it is important that all backers keep us updated of their address before we ship the final rewards. Any reshipping will require additional payments.
story_txt:
globellColor offers the first consumer distance calibration tool worldwide. This brings lab technology to your workspace and enables better results of your digital image editing. It is fast, user friendly and precise – all of this combined at an affordable price!


If you want your images to appear just as brilliant in print as they do on your screen, then you need a color calibration tool. But you have to keep in mind that not every room and all surrounding light conditions are the same. Also the reflections from every screen are different.  Color calibration that was able to take all of this into consideration used to be very expensive.The good news from this project? Today, we can offer this sophisticated hardware at a very affordable price.
globellColor helps you set up your monitor professionally in just a few simple steps. Colors, brightness and contrast are displayed perfectly while taking human perception into account, all to ensure outstanding precision with minimal effort.

story:
Why back this project?

My name is David Pavelsky and I am Active Duty Army until I retire next year. I designed this spinner as something I could play with at work, while in meetings, or just sitting watching TV. I always needed something to do with my hands. The initial design for the Tri-Spinner Fidget Toy™ came out great and was more spectacular than I could have imagined. After showing a few friends, they convinced me to try and see if I could sell a few. I did and that was the end of it. This was in May 2016. Come July I had more requests than I could possibly keep up with but I tried anyway. I have been super limited on how many I could produce and a lot of people have gone without or gone to products that they were not satisfied with and paid way too much money for.

With this campaign I want to be able to ramp up production to 40-50 spinners a day and keep the price point right where it is. My ultimate goal is to have 5 3D printers running non stop and be able to come up with more designs that the public will love. 

I am currently running on 2 printers and have no time to prototype new products. If I can add 3 more printers to my workshop, I can provide all the spinners you all need and want and I can get you the new designs I have been promising.

Each spinner comes 100% complete with a 3D printed body (high quality ABS plastic is all I use for durability), a ceramic hybrid center bearing for the smoothest and longest spins, steel outer bearings of equal weight to get balanced spins every time and a set of finger pads already installed to allow for balance and holdability.

The hurdles I am currently trying to overcome is having my design taken as public property and folks trying to make their own but with lower quality and less attention to detail. I have overcome some of this by applying for a trademark on the name and currently in the process of getting a design patent filed for the design. 

Every little bit will help make this dream a reality and get every one a spinner for their ever restless hands.

Help me help you, get the word out, let every one know that this is the one and only original Tri-Spinner Fidget Toy™. With your help, I can keep high quality fidget toys in the hands of the masses.

Thank you for all of your support!

story:
If you're here, you love your IPV4/4S as much as we do. We're the type of guys that rock our cell phones with a minimalist case, or no case at all. The beauty of well designed electronics deserves to be out in the open where we can enjoy it, and appreciate it.

We have redesigned the IPV4/4S battery sleeve (grip) to achieve a few key things we've wanted from IPV4 vape mail day 1...

THE HARD COPY:

Multiple color options (finally): Deep blue, Tiffany Blue, Lime Green, Blood Red, Orange, Pink, Purple, White, Black and Grey.


Ergonomics: Redesigned with your hand in mind.

Charge Port: Covered


THE DETAILS:

Color - don't get me wrong, I love my black on black (murda!) but we need to be able to change it up. Big Chinese companies are chasing dollars and spec trends, but forgetting that when we find something we like, we want to keep it and make it our own. I'm not the type to bedazzle and add decals, I just want to slap another sleeve on that matches my RBA, drip tip, o-rings, shoes, etc. (I'll be rocking the deep blue grip). If you've used the silicone sleeves, you know it's a pain removing them to charge your batteries - and for me, that defeats the purpose of the easily removable battery sleeve. 

Ergonomics - the original design is so close to perfect with the rounded edge, but we saw a cut from another mod we liked a lot better ;) We like to have our cake and eat it too. This one will contour to the shape of your palm instead of being ribbed for your displeasure.

Charge port - I'm guilty of charging my IPV4 with a cable I found on ebay. I saw the pictures, but I'm lazy (and have a death wish). Buuuut, for the other 99% of IPV4 owners, lets cover that shit up! I'm personally OCD with design, and I don't want to look at the charge port even though I use it, so we all win. Just to make sure EVERYONE wins, we're going to mark where the hole should be (on the inside) so you can drill it out if you're like, whatever the opposite of OCD is.

Slippy grips - If you've held, or watched reviews on the IPV4S you'll notice there's no play with the grip (it doesn't wiggle around like it does on the IPV4). We like that, and we're keeping that design because it works with the original models.


COST BREAK-DOWN

250 units is just about the minimum quantity we can produce without losing money. If we exceed our funding goal, we'll produce more - and if we simply meet our goal, we'll produce enough for all of you and call it a day. If we don't reach our goal, everyone gets their money back within 3-5 days. We're not factoring in our time here, so you can explain it to our wives if we simply break-even.


PRODUCTION TIMELINE

As soon as we hit our goal of $2,000 we will begin our final design process, including:

1. Sending a more detailed 3D model to the manufacturing facility
2. Reviewing and revising samples
3. Testing for durability

Once final revisions are approved, we will:

1. Create a production cast mold
2. Determine quantities and colors based on campaign funding stats
3. Place our order
4. Patiently wait for all units to arrive

Once received:

We'll take a couple of days off work and ship out your Redesigned IPV4/4S hand grips!


Thank you, and stay tuned for updates!

~Brought to you buy Meli Juice and AJAX Designs~

story:
Overview

microMighty is a simple to use embedded processor board for many applications.  It was designed to be easy to use and require no tools or libraries to install, nor does it require additional hardware to purchase, install and configure to get going. microMighty is Windows, Mac and Linux compatible, and can even be used directly from an Android phone or tablet.

microMighty contains Lua version 5.4.0, and special built in libraries that directly interface with the embedded hardware wich make working with the hardware simple without diluting the powerful capabilities of the embedded processor.

Connectivity Simplified

microMighty has a flexible pin library with which only one line of code is required to:

  • Communicate with an I2C or SPI  sensor
  • Change the frequency or duty cycle of any PWM output
  • Control one or many neoPixel LEDs
  • Generate a pulse with microsecond pulse width resolution
  • Read an analog input
  • Many, many more things...

microMighty can use ANY pin as an I2C or SPI port and almost every pin can have a PWM output. There is also up to 29 digital IO, 6 UARTs, 4 LEDs and 6 analog inputs.

Parallel IO revised

Any group of pins on microMighty can be used to make a parallel port of up to 32 bits wide. The pins can be arranged in any order of any length up to the 32 bits, and can even be the same pin in multiple positions.

Wondering what you would do with the same pin in multiple positions of a parallel port? When writing the same pin multiple times microMighty will split the parallel write at the duplicate! The example video above generates a pulse by toggling a 2 bit port that has both bits the same.  Two nibbles can be written to an 8-bit port by using the same 4 pin group two times in the same port group.  

High-performance embedded processing

microMighty uses the most powerful microcontroller available, the ARM Cortex-M7. The processor core runs at 216 MHz and includes hardware floating point operations! With this horsepower and math capacity, microMighty is perfect for processing data from sensors and embedded applications.

And, when the data is collected and processed, it can be streamed directly to a file on the 8 MB flash disk that is onboard using simple calls to the Lua IO Library.

Hardware Specifications

  • 216 MHz 32-Bit ARM Cortex-M7
  • 32-Bit Hardware Floating-Point Operations
  • 256 KB RAM / 512 KB Flash
  • 8 MB Serial Flash Drive
  • 27 General Purpose Digital IO (Up to 29 Max Digital IO)
  • 6 Analog Inputs
  • 24 PWM outputs
  • 5 UARTs
  • 4 Servo Connectors
  • 4 LEDs (Blue, Green, Red, Yellow)
  • LiPo Battery (JST-PH)
  • LiPo Charge from USB
  • Power from USB, Pin, or LiPo Battery
  • Full Lua implementation with extensions for embedded hardware

Comparisons With Other Platforms

microMighty was built on hardware that is powerful like Pi, but easy to use with embedded sensors and motors like an Arduino.  The simple to use Lua based interface makes quick work of interfacing with sensors, and building applications. Enabling the maker to spend less time typing in the IDE and more time in the lab experimenting with the hardware.

Perks

Goal 1: Meet Our Funding Goal $30,000

microMighty will be configured to run Lua v5.4.0, with the base features planned for the project.

Stretch Goal 1: $33,000

When we reach $33,000 in funding I will complete the  microMighty enhanced version of the Arduino environment, and all backers get to choose if microMighty is delivered to you programed as an Arduino or with the Original Lua environment.

Why we need funding

microMighty has been built in small batch quantities already, and has demonstrated a real potential as both a learning tool and a platform for making, but in order to make microMighty more accessible we have to reduce the cost and time associated with building the boards and procuring the materials.  Since there is a relationship between cost and quantity, we need to build larger batches to reduce the costs of the materials by allowing us to buy in bulk.  Your contribution to this campaign enables us to buy in bulk and to build larger production runs, making the microMighty board more affordable.

By contributing to this campaign, you are helping to make microMighty affordable for schools makers, and enthusiasts.

Our Timeline

 

Risks and Challenges

As with any hardware project there are always potential risks, however, most of the highly risky items have been already retired.  Presently there are working prototypes and the design of the core of microMighty is complete.  There is a plan for a re-spin of the hardware design following this campaign to incorporate feedback and to support design-for-manufacturing.  Working closely with our manufacturers will help to optimize the design for quicker and higher quality production and testing. 

Our Team

Chuck E. : HW/SW Design & Founder

In Chuck's more than 20 years as a professional engineer, he’s worked with FPGAs, High-Perfomance processors, small microcontrollers and everything in between. Chuck is an innovator and creator of control electronics for diverse applications with a passion for control electronics, software, and systems design. Chuck designed the microMighty platform to promote learning and to enhance the process we use as makers to build, experiment, and explore the world.

Parallel IO revised
Any group of pins on microMighty can be used to make a parallel port of up to 32 bits wide. The pins can be arranged in any order of any length up to the 32 bits, and can even be the same pin in multiple positions.

Wondering what you would do with the same pin in multiple positions of a parallel port? When writing the same pin multiple times microMighty will split the parallel write at the duplicate! The example video above generates a pulse by toggling a 2 bit port that has both bits the same.  Two nibbles can be written to an 8-bit port by using the same 4 pin group two times in the same port group.  
High-performance embedded processing
microMighty uses the most powerful microcontroller available, the ARM Cortex-M7. The processor core runs at 216 MHz and includes hardware floating point operations! With this horsepower and math capacity, microMighty is perfect for processing data from sensors and embedded applications.
And, when the data is collected and processed, it can be streamed directly to a file on the 8 MB flash disk that is onboard using simple calls to the Lua IO Library.

Hardware Specifications

216 MHz 32-Bit ARM Cortex-M7
32-Bit Hardware Floating-Point Operations
256 KB RAM / 512 KB Flash
8 MB Serial Flash Drive
27 General Purpose Digital IO (Up to 29 Max Digital IO)
6 Analog Inputs
24 PWM outputs
5 UARTs
4 Servo Connectors
4 LEDs (Blue, Green, Red, Yellow)
LiPo Battery (JST-PH)
LiPo Charge from USB
Power from USB, Pin, or LiPo Battery
Full Lua implementation with extensions for embedded hardware


Comparisons With Other Platforms

microMighty was built on hardware that is powerful like Pi, but easy to use with embedded sensors and motors like an Arduino.  The simple to use Lua based interface makes quick work of interfacing with sensors, and building applications. Enabling the maker to spend less time typing in the IDE and more time in the lab experimenting with the hardware.
Perks










Goal 1: Meet Our Funding Goal $30,000
microMighty will be configured to run Lua v5.4.0, with the base features planned for the project.
Stretch Goal 1: $33,000
When we reach $33,000 in funding I will complete the  microMighty enhanced version of the Arduino environment, and all backers get to choose if microMighty is delivered to you programed as an Arduino or with the Original Lua environment.
Why we need funding
microMighty has been built in small batch quantities already, and has demonstrated a real potential as both a learning tool and a platform for making, but in order to make microMighty more accessible we have to reduce the cost and time associated with building the boards and procuring the materials.  Since there is a relationship between cost and quantity, we need to build larger batches to reduce the costs of the materials by allowing us to buy in bulk.  Your contribution to this campaign enables us to buy in bulk and to build larger production runs, making the microMighty board more affordable.
By contributing to this campaign, you are helping to make microMighty affordable for schools makers, and enthusiasts.
Our Timeline
 Risks and Challenges
As with any hardware project there are always potential risks, however, most of the highly risky items have been already retired.  Presently there are working prototypes and the design of the core of microMighty is complete.  There is a plan for a re-spin of the hardware design following this campaign to incorporate feedback and to support design-for-manufacturing.  Working closely with our manufacturers will help to optimize the design for quicker and higher quality production and testing. 
Our Team



Chuck E. : HW/SW Design & Founder
In Chuck's more than 20 years as a professional engineer, he’s worked with FPGAs, High-Perfomance processors, small microcontrollers and everything in between. Chuck is an innovator and creator of control electronics for diverse applications with a passion for control electronics, software, and systems design. Chuck designed the microMighty platform to promote learning and to enhance the process we use as makers to build, experiment, and explore the world.

story:
Short Summary

I am an electronics graduate and Post graduate degree in Management -MBA and Diploma in Business System analysis and Project management from Canada.   

 I have been working in B2B sales for 12 years handling different portfolios , during these years i have came across many software and ERP platforms which are well known and very complicated to use , any of the small organisation cannot even think of purchasing Them because of complexity and cost associated with the same , 

so i developed an idea of ERP for all which can be afforded and easy to use software , so i have developed Mind Rich CRM which is very easy to use and affordable also, now with the help of communities like   Kick Starter i will develop the other modules and complete the dream of ERP for all mission .

i have developed the CRM module as the first module and i am developing the other modules also like HR ,Accounting, material management .

Because i think technology is the basic need today for all and every one should have access to technology

I need around USD 15000 for CRM to bring to market

USD 8000 is needed for setting up dedicated server and mobile app develolement

i have developed the software and you can use it before backing my project idea

and you will get a really very good software to use

with your help i will make a positive change in the field of ERP software 

i will make a software that is accessible and affordable by all , regardless of size of the organisation and money they can spend.

story:
What is CheerPod?

Once upon a time, a great person combined the touchpad and the mouse, and there it is, we get the magic mouse. After several years, a team named CheerDots puts the magic mouse and the laser pointer together and made some great improvements, and here we get the amazing CheerPod!

 

As a game-changer, CheerPod can be used as a full-function desktop mouse, touchpad and laser pointer on virtually any device. With support for the most frequently used hand gestures in both Desktop Mode and Air Mode, it’s comfortable to use and easy to control. No matter whether you are working in the office, giving a presentation, or enjoying some entertainment on your sofa, CheerPod is the perfect productivity tool and control device for multi-device!

 

 

  

 

In Production Now

 

 

 

 

An extra receiver is bulky for you to carry around. CheerPod saves your valuable input slot and delivers a fast connection. Simply connect it just like connect your wireless earbuds, easy and effortless! CheerPod's universal compatibility makes it a perfect control solution for multi-device. Turn it on and go!

 

When CheerPod is used in the Ground Mode, it works as a full-function desktop mouse + touchpad for various devices.

When you are tired of placing your hands on the table while working, try the Air Mode to continue the work in an easier way! At the flick of a switch, CheerPod instantly gives you gesture control from the comfort of your couch or moving freely around the room!

 

See What You Can Do With CheerPod

 

 

 

With CheerPod, meetings and presentations become more dynamic. Air Mode allows you to move around the room as you present, advancing slides, opening apps, and switching between important documents. Its built-in laser pointer is great for getting to the point and CheerPod supports the most frequently used controls for presentations such as: zoom in/out, turn the page, scroll control, and more using simple gestures.

 

 

 

CheerPod is great for the office but it isn’t all work and no play! It makes a super convenient remote control for TVs or phones and computers that are mirrored to the big screen. When it’s time for entertainment, CheerPod keeps you fully in control without holding the device or keeping it within your reach.

 

 

 

CheerPod is ergonomically designed to perfectly fit the hand and respond to natural hand movements. For this purpose, we've tried all kinds of sizes and tested the prototypes (see pic below). Based on the test result, we made CheerPod compact enough that it fits in a pocket for go-anywhere convenience, but large enough to be comfortable for all-day use.

 

 

 

 

For any wireless device, staying in sync is key. CheerPod has a super low latency of 7ms so it always responds with perfect accuracy and no lag. In a working range of 10m, you can control the device as you move freely around the room without any disconnection.

 

 

 

Nobody needs another bulky device to lug around. CheerPod is super slim at just 2.6 inches long and it’s a 33g featherweight. It goes with you anywhere, seamlessly transitioning between home, work, cafe or travel. With 20+ days of working time on a single charge, you can rely on it anytime you need it.

 

 

 

CheerPod is ready for mass production soon, check our latest CheerPod demo video with Windows, Mac OS and iOS.

 
 

Complete List of Hand Gesture Controls

  • Specific hand-gestures control of the user manual shall be the final standard version.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CheerDots aims to change the world with the power of technology. Although we have years of experience in the field, we are a young and energetic team of tech geeks laser-focused on creating innovative ways to interact with the essential devices we use for work, learning and fun. Our products increase productivity and add convenience to daily life. With your support, we can bring CheerPod to the world and provide the ultimate portable solution for go-anywhere device control.

 

Our experienced team has years of experience in the design of computer input devices and peripherals and we work closely with reliable partners for manufacturing and logistics. CheerPod has undergone rigorous development, testing, and refinement. We know what it takes to bring a product to market and are confident that we can avoid any potential problems and stay on schedule. If some issues do unexpectedly arise, we promise to keep our backers updated about the situation and provide quick solutions.

story:
Shurikey Gear Hanzo

Shuriken is a dart-like weapon commonly used by Ninjas. With a smart and minute change from “ken” to “key”, we create our brand name Shurikey, which not only conveys an eye-catching sense but contains mechanical keyboard features. Our team has more than 9 years of experience in the mechanical keyboard industry. Being professional and proficient in mechanical keyboard manufacturing, R&D, and being familiar with the needs of customers and the market, we are confident to deliver a quality experience with innovative mechanical keyboard products.

Three themes are available for the first launch: the vintage computer 001, the western desert 002, and the arcade game 003.

REFIT

001

002

003

One of the core elements of the products in the industrial era is refit. Many components of Hanzo, including the top cases, rivets, knobs, kickstand, can be easily detached and installed back, which provides various possibilities for customers.

Thanks to the advantages of Electrostatic Capacitive (EC) Keyboard, without a delayed jittering triggered by switches, when the game mode is turned on, its comprehensive input delay will be more than 50% lower than conventional mechanical keyboards with a refresh rate 1000Hz, making it an ideal item for gaming.

Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 chip.

Shurikey Hanzo supports connecting three devices at the same time and being switched easily.

The built-in large-capacity lithium battery ensures tremendously long using hours.

Smoothness and steadiness are our top priorities. We want the keys to be smooth and steady at the same time.

After comparing with other switches, we found Varmilo EC V2 switches the smoothest and the

steadiest one. You can barely feel any friction from the keypress. Also, the contactless feature enables EC switches to be more durable.

One metal kickstand | Better ergonomics | More comfortable experience.

All the stabilizers of Shurikey are factory lubed to ensure all the keys to be consistent and noise-free.

Shurikey Hanzo Keyboards equip with 1.5 mm ABS double-shot Cherry-profile keycaps, which benchmark the well-known high-end customized double-shot keycaps with legends, thickness, compatibility optimized. What's more, Shurikey exclusive keys are available. Therefore, this is definitely a set of ABS double-shot keycaps with top craftsmanship. In addition, Shurikey will also release the 167-key keycap set to fit your mechanical keyboards from other brands.

Original design: Each keycap bottom is engraved with "SRK" authenticity certification.
Delicate technics: ABS material, Double shot molding technics.
Thickened design: the 1.5mm thickness is 0.2mm thicker compared to 1.3mm of GMK.
Injection hole: The injection hole is adjusted from the side to the bottom, so you can't see the injection hole from the outside.
Both North-facing and South-facing LED adaptivity: The keycap has a trapezoidal slot inside, allowing the keyboard to be mounted on the keypad without bumping into the switch.
Legends design: The legends are redesigned, the alignments are adjusted to harmonize the look and feel of the legends.
Appearance on the side: Shurikey team worked hard to improve the appearance on the side, which was a difficulty of double-shot keycaps.
High adaptability: 167keys, compatible with most mechanical keyboards on the market.     Cost-effective: the 167Key keycap set costs less than $60 as a set of double-shot keycaps we consider to be high quality.

We avoid internal excess space as much as possible in the structural design. The silicone pad is gonna provide a solid feel and avoid hollow noise.

Delivery Guarantee

The first batch will be shipped within 10 days after the end of the crowdfunding. We have prepared 3000 keyboards, 2000 sets of keycaps, and 1000 mousepads in advance. The excess quantity will be shipped before December.

There is an additional personality keycap with the brand icon in the box, as well as a space bar keycap without LOGO, and an extra top cover.

All backers who purchase a keyboard can get an extra free replaceable decorative top case (theme 001 matches the deep grey top case, theme 002 matches the light grey top case, theme 003 matches the yellow top case);
When the amount funded reaches up to $10,000, all backers will get one random exclusive ESC keycap ($3.9);
When the amount funded reaches up to $20,000, all backers will get one random exclusive ESC keycap and space bar keycap set ($3.9+$7.9);
When the amount reaches up to $30,000, all backers will get one random exclusive ESC keycap and space bar keycap set ($3.9+$7.9); and one pure copper Shurikey brand launch badge ($9.9).

(Stretch goals only available for backers who purchase keyboards.)

story:
INVZI 9-in-1 100W GaN USB-C Charger Hub

www.invzi.com

  • USB-C 100W Max PD
  • USB-C 100W Max PD & Hub 5Gbps
  • USB-C 30W Max PD & Hub 5Gbps
  • USB-A 7.5W Max Hub 5Gbps
  • HDMI 4K60HZ HDR
  • SD/Micro SD Card Slot
  • Gigabit Ethernet
  • 3.5mm Audio/Mic Jack

CES2021 Innovation Awards Honor

INVZI Power Hub has 9 ports to connect laptop with 100W Max PD charging, extend display with 4K@60Hz HDMI, internet cable with gigabits ethernet, flash drive, keyboards, SD/Micro SD cards, audio and other devices all at the same time. The multi-functional power hub is designed to be the perfect all-in-one solution for laptop, tablet and phone.

100W Fast Charging & Data for MacBook

Wall Charger and Hub for MacBook

Updated GaN Technology by Navitas

Fast Charging 3 Devices

Desktop Charger for MacBook, iPad Pro and iPhone

USB-C hub for iPad Pro and Tablet

Single USB-C Hub Mode for MacBook

Extension Cable and Universal Adapters UK/AU/EU

Tech Specs

  • USB-C1: 100W Max, 5~15V/3A, 20V/5A
  • USB-C2: 100W Max Hub, USB-C 3.1 Gen 1 5Gbps data transfer
  • USB-C3: 30W Max, USB-C 3.1 Gen 1 5Gbps data transfer
  • USB-A: 7.5W Max Hub, USB-A 3.1 Gen1 5Gbps data transfer
  • HDMI: Up to 4K@60Hz,1080p Full HD
  • Ethernet: RJ45 1000Mbps
  • Micro SD/SD: UHS-1 with speed up to 104MB/s Data Speed
  • Audio & Mic: 3.5 Audio, 96KHz 24bit
  • Protection: Over-current, Over-voltage, Over-temperature, Short-circuit Protection
  • Power Input: AC 100-240V, 50/60Hz, 2.4A Max Power Output: 100W
  • Product Dimensions: 94 x 76 x30mm / 3.7" x 2.99" x 1.18"
  • Weight: 210g / 7.4oz / 0.46 lb


Note: Need use USB3.1 USB-C to USB-C 100W/10Gbps cable or USB 4.0 cable for the data hub functions with USB-B C2 port.

What You Get

  • -1 X INVZI Power Hub 100W GaN 9-in-1 Charger & Hub

  • -1 X Universal Adapters EU,UK,AU

  • 1 X 6.6ft(2m) Extension Cable Adapter (Compatible with Adapters)

  • -1 X USB-C 3.1 Gne 2 100W/10G USB-C to USB-C Cable 1.64ft(0.5m)

  • -1 X Travel Pouch

story:
Introducing Mantiz, the world's smallest foldable laptop stand that help you get rid of those heavy, bulky and flimsy stands. Mantiz is a smart laptop and tablet stand that delivers effortless portability and comfort with a state-of-the-art foldable design, ventilation, stability and durability. 

Mantiz is designed to make your work much easier. Measured at only 4.5’’ and weighing nearly 5.6oz, it is your best EDC peripheral.

Say goodbye to those heavy, bulky and hard-to-pack laptop stands. You can slap it on your table, or even ground to use it whenever you want.

Replacing that old laptop stand with Mantiz that you can take with you anywhere, is ultra comfortable and extremely durable. 

Mantiz is a unique laptop stand because unlike most stands where they fold-down flat, it compacts down to a palm-sized bar. Its unique foldable design enables you to shrink the stand within seconds. You will never be restless of packing and unpacking the stand.

Your posture can be significantly improved upon using Mantiz. It lets you easily enjoy the perfect height of working on a laptop any time.

Keeping your screen to your eye level prevents you from hunching over while working. It is designed to benefit your posture problems and help eliminate pain and muscle strains for laptop users.

You can place it anywhere from 3 to 4.6 inches high and choose the best angles ranging from 20° to 32° to find a just-right position. (20° is the most comfortable resting angle)

Since there's been a massive increase in working from home, there's been a lot more accidents involving liquids and laptops. It is a complete disaster if you need to replace your expensive computer because of a water spill. With a height level up by Mantiz, you won’t need to worry about this unexpected issue.

Mantiz has a universal compatibility and should fit notebooks and laptops up to 17.3 inches. 

Digital nomads hate hassles with cables swinging like vines in the jungle, which is enough to drive anyone crazy.

Mantiz is fantastic for cable management since it comes with a hollow design that reduces the contact area with your desk so that you can route your cables underneath to keep your office, and desk both neat and tidy. 

Raising your laptop 3 inches off your desk, there will be more space for storage. This laptop stand can offer a place to stow your keyboard and mouse that isn’t having them strewn over your desk. 

With 4 silicone contacts on the bottom, you can rest assured that Mantiz will keep your laptop secure while you are working. Also, Mantiz has two built-in brackets to prevent your laptop from slipping off the stand.

In addition, Mantiz holds up to 6.1lbs which means you can place any laptop above this stand.

It is important to keep your laptop cool to maintain its longevity. Generally, the source of heat comes from the inability for air to flow underneath your laptop.  Mantiz helps solve this problem by elevating your laptop to ensure a better airflow.

Made from aluminum alloy, a material that is resistant to rust, Mantiz can last for a long time while still maintaining its sleek appearance. With its minimalist design, it can perfectly fit into your office and match with your device. 

Good Products always come from a good team. We are a professional team integrating departments of design, R&D and product testing. To create products that are innovative and pragmatic, we attach great importance to every stage of the testing and product development. We are confident that Mantiz is a unique laptop stand which has great portability and durability with a stunning look. Our team will spare no effort to provide users with the best experience not only on product usage but also the after-sales service. If you have any problems about Mantiz, feel free to communicate with us.

Mantiz is a smart laptop and tablet stand that delivers effortless portability and comfort with a state-of-the-art foldable design, ventilation, stability and durability. Mantiz is designed to make your work much easier. Measured at only 4.5’’ and weighing nearly 5.6oz, it is your best EDC peripheral.Say goodbye to those heavy, bulky and hard-to-pack laptop stands. You can slap it on your table, or even ground to use it whenever you want.Replacing that old laptop stand with Mantiz that you can take with you anywhere, is ultra comfortable and extremely durable. Mantiz is a unique laptop stand because unlike most stands where they fold-down flat, it compacts down to a palm-sized bar. Its unique foldable design enables you to shrink the stand within seconds. You will never be restless of packing and unpacking the stand.Your posture can be significantly improved upon using Mantiz. story:
For other accessories, please send an email to kendyz@gpd.hk

 

 

Today we released a Pocket 2 keyboard sticker for Pocket 2 (7y30, 8100Y, 3965Y) models, expected to ship on December 27, 2018!

 

 

  GPD Pocket 2 ( 8GB ) GPD Pocket 2 (8GB) Amber black
Launch Data 10 / 2018 1 / 2019
Product Positioning Household intelligent device Household intelligent device
Color Silvery Amber black
Product model Intel® Core™ m3-8100Y Intel® Celeron® Processor 3965Y
# of Cores / # of Threads 2 / 4 2 / 2
Processor Base Frequency 1.10 Ghz 1.50 Ghz
Max Turbo Frequency 3.40 Ghz Null

Lithography 14nm 14nm

4K Support Support
HDMI 4096×2304 @24Hz 4096×2304 @24Hz
DisplayPort 4096×2304 @60Hz 4096×2304 @60Hz

OpenGL Support, 4.5 Support, 4.4
Memory  8GB 8GB
Memory Types LPDDR3 LPDDR3
Two channel memory Support Support
Hard Disk Type 128GB 128GB
Battery Life About 6~8 hours，It should depend on the actual working conditions About 8~10 hours，It should depend on the actual working conditions

 

There are many Ultrabooks on the market, but they are bulky and hard to carry. Last year, we have successfully launched a laptop and raised over $3.5 million. With an Intel x7-8750 processor and a 7-inch screen, it is lightweight, ultra-thin, and can be put into a handbag or pocket. We named it Pocket. It‘s the perfect laptop for light or mobile office crowds. Everyone loved it. This year, GPD Pocket 2 will redefine the ultimate portable laptop.

 

 

This is what GPD Pocket 2 offers for you:

  • UNIBODY Machined Magnalium Design: streamlined and fashionable
  • Fits in Your Pocket Easily: bring it with you anywhere
  • Lightweight, <550g: more compact than the GPD Pocket 1
  • 7-inch Screen: just the right size for maximum productivity
  • Traditional Keyboard Design: minimum user adoption; type like you used to
  • Micro SDXC Card Slot and More USB A Ports: Expand storage space without a separate USB HUB
  • Active Cooling: rather than a passive cooling thin design that sacrifices performance
  • Superior Performance than Microsoft (m3) Surface Pro
  • Low Noise Operating Mode: caters to different user preferences
  • Compatible with All Chargers and Mobile Power Banks

 

 

 

 

“Wherever you are, whenever you want, you can pull out GPD Pocket 2 from your pocket or purse and start working right away.”

 

 

You can use Photo  to act on your inspirations, anywhere and anytime.

 

 

Whether you are engaged in design work in: civil construction, decoration, industrial drawing, engineering, electronics, tailoring and so on, the GPD Pocket 2 is undoubtedly the best ultra-mobile productivity tool for you.

 

 

With GPD Pocket 2, you can work and communicate when and where it is needed, allowing you to improve work efficiency.

 

 

Using GPD Pocket 2 you can: monitor the stock market, commodity futures and foreign currency fluctuations all in real time. Time is money, so seize every second to improve your investment efficiency and success.

 

 

GPD Pocket 2 is also an excellent e-reader. Compared with traditional e-readers, GPD Pocket 2 possesses a larger storage capacity and supports more software and e-book formats. Download your favorite e-book anytime and anywhere.

 

 

GPD Pocket 2 gives you an immersive experience for watching movies and listening to music, offering an authentic private cinema for you.

 

 

 

With 2.5 times the performance of the previous generation Pocket, streamlined sleek and stylish design, UNIBODY machined magnalium construction rivaling the MacBook, the palm sized GPD Pocket 2 satisfies the tastes and mobile office needs of the most discerning business professionals.

 

 

At only 8mm at its thinnest section, the GPD Pocket 2 is 57% less thick than the previous generation GPD Pocket. It weighs only 510g, 410g less than Apple MacBook and 258g less than the Microsoft Surface Pro.

 

 

With the built in Optical Finger Navigation, you can operate with one finger for 360-degree rotation and movement anywhere. It can also replace direction key. The effect is comparable to the optical mouse. GPD Pocket 2 supports touch screen and the built-in multi-touch function makes it even more convenient.

 

 

GPD Pocket 2 has a 7-inch IPS 1920x1200 resolution screen, delivering more colors and higher contrast. With a 323 PPI screen, it provides a bright Retina display experience with better in screen details than the MacBook and new Surface Pro. The IPS-based screen has viewing angles up to 178° in either the horizontal or vertical. Use of In-Cell full lamination allows the Pocket 2 to have a screen that is thin, thus reducing the weight of the device. With a screen border of only 4mm, the Pocket 2 delivers an almost borderless viewing experience.

 

 

The keyboard has been ergonomically designed to ensure ease of use. Each keycap is independent of the others, and with their large surface area they offer an improved contact area between finger tip and keycap. Typing requires very little force and therefore can be more accurate. The Pocket 2 keyboard brings a comfortable feel, while the independent keys and non-adhesive keycaps, decreases the potential for pressing the wrong key.

 

 

GPD Pocket 2 uses the same Intel® Core™ m3-8100Y processor as the new Surface Pro. With 14nm fabrication, ultra-low voltage, low power consumption, 99.76MHz bus speed, 4GT/s OPI, the data transmission speed can read a peak of 4×10^9 times per second. It also has a 4 MB L3 Cache and provides fast and efficient processing and data recall.

 

 

GPD Pocket 2 is equipped with ninth-generation UHD Graphics 615, featuring 24 Execution Units and a max dynamic frequency of 900MHz. When parallel processing of graphics data for high throughput, UHD Graphics 615 can boost up to 350% resulting in smooth graphics and video playback.

 

 

The GPD Pocket 2 storage is capable of sequential read speeds of 267.35MB/s and sequential write speed of 120.10MB/s. Compared with the GPD Pocket, the read-write speeds have increased substantially. This means that boot up and software loading requires a lot less time, increasing your efficiency and productivity.

 

 

The biggest advantage of the GPD Pocket 2 is its active cooling design. All the most popular ultra-thin laptops on the market do not use active cooling, leading to fast frequency-reduction once the processor hits thermal limits. This reduces their effectiveness for both work and entertainment uses. With its fan based PC-level cooling solution, GPD Pocket 2 provides great performance.

 

 

The GPD Pocket 2 features a unique “one-button fan mute” mode which is a great boon for those who are sensitive to noise. You can work quietly or enjoy videos without system noise interfering with your experience.

 

 

Two USB A ports and one Micro SD card slot allows you to expand the storage to 2.4TB. The m3-7y30 supports the UHS 104 ultra-high-speed SD interface, with a bus speed up to 104MB/s. It also supports Micro SDXC cards. As tested, the read speed of a SanDisk 128GB Micro SD card was measured to be up to 88MB/s, and the write speed was up to 57MB/s.

Notes: currently, the max USB capacity is 1TB and the max Micro SD capacity is 400GB。

 

 

The Pocket 2's Type C is a full-featured interface, you can connect to the Hub to extend the storage such as HDMI, VGA, RJ45, SD card, Micro SD card and U disk, etc. Meanwhile, you can also use Hub to charge Pocket 2.

 

 

GPD Pocket 2 supports fast charging based on the PD 2.0 protocol, it can be charged to half full in 30 minutes. Pocket 2 also supports almost all mobile phone chargers and mobile power banks. Just go with one power adapter for both of your Pocket 2 and cellphone. Meanwhile, you can easily find charging source at airport or in cafe for Pocket 2 (most places provide 5V/2A charge output standard).

Product Positioning Household intelligent device

Screen Type Gorilla Glass 4，H-IPS Technology
Size 7 inches

Miracast Support, Compatibility WiDi
Bluetooth 4.1
I/O Port Data / Charging 2×USB A、1×USB C
Audio Frequency 3.5mm Headset & Microphones
Card Reader Micro SDXC, No Capacity Ceiling
Mouse description Optical Finger Navigation
Keyboard Chocolate Keyboard，QWERTY
Battery Battery Type Li-polymer
Battery Capacity 6800mAh
Battery Life About 6~8 hours，It should depend on the actual working conditions
Appearance Net weight 510g
Length 181mm
Width 113mm
Thickness 8-14mm
Shell Material Magnesium alloy
Shell Description UNIBODY Craft
Thermal Design Active Cooling Method
Sensor Hall Sensor
Accessories   GPD Pocket 2 × 1
  Power adapter (5V==3A, 9V==2.67A, 12V==2A, 15V==1.6A) ×1, Pocket 2 also supports any 5V mobile phone charger or 5V mobile power bank.
  Warranty Card ×1
  Specification ×1
Warranty Information Warranty Policy Intermnational Warranty Service
Warranty Time Device 1 year, Charger 1 year
Service Telephone + 86 755 86572275
Chinese Website www.Softwincn.com
English Website www.Gpd.hk

 

 

Small ultra-portable laptops are always poor in performance, while laptops with good performance are often large and less portable. The GPD Pocket 2 aims to provide the perfect solution delivering both power and ultra-portability.

Compared with the Apple MacBook and Microsoft Surface Pro (m3), GPD Pocket 2 is more fashionable, smaller, portable and has the advantage of having an active cooling system. The GPD Pocket 2 is well suited for high-end business professionals.

We are crowdfunding the GPD Pocket 2 on Indiegogo to fund R&D and to purchase molds and materials which can be costly. All funds we raise will be put into mass production of the GPD Pocket 2. We believe that this product will redefine the mobile office and notebook, bringing a new mobile office experience to high-end business professionals. We very much hope that you can support us in this project.

 

 

GamePad Digital (GPD) located in Shenzhen, China, is a company focused on producing office and handheld game devices. It was created by the founders passion to create great gaming products. GPD is committed in providing users with personalized products and services.
 

 

Thank you to all those who participate in the crowdfunding of our product. It is your support that drives us.

Without your trust and support, we could not produce this product.

 

 

1. Does the crowdfunding price include tariff’s that may be incurred in the destination country?

The raised funds include international express freight and remote area surcharges, but do not include the tariffs incurred when entering the destination country which need to be paid by you. Tariffs vary by country: To an EU country, the tariff rate is 21%, to Japan the tariff rate is 10%; to USA goods priced over $800 will also incur a tariff.
 

2. What post-sale service can the participants in the GPD Pocket 2 crowdfunding obtain?

Users that participate in this crowdfunding can obtain the same warranty as those that buy the product after it launches. If users are dissatisfied with the product, they can return the product within one week after receiving it for a refund. Initial product freight costs to the user will be deducted from the refund.

Please note that postage and packing costs incurred for returns will be borne by you. When mailing back units, the local postal courier should be used. Other international logistic services tend to incur tariffs on entry into China, ranging from 20% to 30% of the value of the goods. GPD will not bear this part of the cost.

 

3. What will happen if the crowdfunding fails to reach the target amount?

If the crowdfunding fails to reach the target amount, the users will also get reward. At the same time, we will seek other financing channels to ensure development and mass production. We also hope that users is fond of this product can continue to follow the project.

 

4. What can I do if I don’t receive a reply to my question in the crowdfunding comments?

For questions regarding: product technicals during the crowdfunding, product shipment after the crowdfunding, product problems or returns, please send your question to the following email: kendyz@gpd.hk using the email you used in your crowdfunding order. Replies will be sent to you soon.

For distributor or agent inquiries. Please send an email to: sales03@gpd.hk.
 

 

Indiegogo supporters will receive the reward as a priority.

Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.

CE-RoHS, FCC, CCC, JATE, MIC and other international certificates will be provided.

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues.

  Small ultra-portable laptops are always poor in performance, while laptops with good performance are often large and less portable. The GPD Pocket 2 aims to provide the perfect solution delivering both power and ultra-portability.Compared with the Apple MacBook and Microsoft Surface Pro (m3), GPD Pocket 2 is more fashionable, smaller, portable and has the advantage of having an active cooling system. The GPD Pocket 2 is well suited for high-end business professionals.We are crowdfunding the GPD Pocket 2 on Indiegogo to fund R&D and to purchase molds and materials which can be costly. All funds we raise will be put into mass production of the GPD Pocket 2. We believe that this product will redefine the mobile office and notebook, bringing a new mobile office experience to high-end business professionals. We very much hope that you can support us in this project.  GamePad Digital (GPD) located in Shenzhen, China, is a company focused on producing office and handheld game devices. It was created by the founders passion to create great gaming products. GPD is committed in providing users with personalized products and services.  Thank you to all those who participate in the crowdfunding of our product. It is your support that drives us.Without your trust and support, we could not produce this product.  1. Does the crowdfunding price include tariff’s that may be incurred in the destination country?The raised funds include international express freight and remote area surcharges, but do not include the tariffs incurred when entering the destination country which need to be paid by you. Tariffs vary by country: To an EU country, the tariff rate is 21%, to Japan the tariff rate is 10%; to USA goods priced over $800 will also incur a tariff. 2. What post-sale service can the participants in the GPD Pocket 2 crowdfunding obtain?Users that participate in this crowdfunding can obtain the same warranty as those that buy the product after it launches. If users are dissatisfied with the product, they can return the product within one week after receiving it for a refund. Initial product freight costs to the user will be deducted from the refund.Please note that postage and packing costs incurred for returns will be borne by you. When mailing back units, the local postal courier should be used. Other international logistic services tend to incur tariffs on entry into China, ranging from 20% to 30% of the value of the goods. GPD will not bear this part of the cost. 3. What will happen if the crowdfunding fails to reach the target amount?If the crowdfunding fails to reach the target amount, the users will also get reward. At the same time, we will seek other financing channels to ensure development and mass production. We also hope that users is fond of this product can continue to follow the project. 4. What can I do if I don’t receive a reply to my question in the crowdfunding comments?For questions regarding: product technicals during the crowdfunding, product shipment after the crowdfunding, product problems or returns, please send your question to the following email: kendyz@gpd.hk using the email you used in your crowdfunding order. Replies will be sent to you soon.For distributor or agent inquiries. Please send an email to: sales03@gpd.hk.  Indiegogo supporters will receive the reward as a priority.Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.CE-RoHS, FCC, CCC, JATE, MIC and other international certificates will be provided.We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues.

story:
Story

We're the Z generation from Vietnam solving the problem about personal temperature, whether you feel too hot or too cold.

As a tropical country, we clearly understand how hot it is during the sunny season. Sometimes, it can reach up to 40 Degree Celsius but everybody still has to go out for work or other reasons. Climate change is happening and people are using more air-conditioners but it is actually a loop. So, we design this product with a hope of solving the problem for not just the people but the environment as well.

The problem

Let's think about the last time you had to go out in the hot weather. What was your solution for that? Was it enough for you?

Or ladies, do you feel chills during your period  in your office?

At times like these, do you wish the temperature was more comfortable?

Our Solution

Coolbrace will help you find your comfort with just a press on the button whenever you're feeling a little too hot or too cold.  

YOU WANT TO FEEL COOLER?

Just press the left button, Coolbrace will cool you down to 17 Degree Celsius. It's like when you put a cube of ice on your wrist and then feel more comfortable in 15 minutes.

YOU WANT TO FEEL WARMER?

Press the right button to activate the warming mode, which will make you feel better like hugging a cup of hot water.

How does it work ?

According to the science research of Stanford and UC Berkeley University, when you cool down or warm up the sensitive areas that have many blood vessels and nerves such as the wrists, feet or napes,...; it will improve your overall comfort but will not change the body temperature.

That’s why you feel more comfortable when leaving your feet out of the blanket at sleep or when drinking hot water in winter.

How do you wear it ?

Coolbrace is designed to wear flexibly. At this time, you can wear Coolbrace on the top or bottom of your wrist

We understand when you are working on your computer, it may be a little inconvenient with Coolbrace on your wrist.. Therefore, our team also designs Coolbrace to be worn on your nape when you are working.

Woww Moments !!!

Woww Moments of Coolbrace is the reality video recording the first moments of different people when they tried the product prototype. We planned to have 50 different “wows”.

However, our city is now in lockdown due to the pandemic, so we can only upload what we have recorded.

Coolbrace will be suitable for ?

Coolbrace can be used when your body feels thermally uncomfortable. For example:

  • Riding motorcycles in hot weather
  • Traffic jams
  • Menstrual period
  • Working in an outdoor environment
  • Sleeping without Air-Conditioners
  • Trekking or Camping
  • Traveling to any other places where it is cold or hot for you
  • And more ...

However, Coolbrace is not designed to act as a substitute for temperature protection measures such as wearing a jacket in cold weather or as a measure against heatstroke.

Technical information

Coolbrace device

  • Dimensions: 50 x 33 x 13.6 mm

  • Weight: 80g with band 

  • Aluminum body (Top side and bottom side)

  • Plastic border on both sides (ABS)

  • LED light interface to visualize

  • Built-in rechargeable Li-ion battery with Type C charging cable

  • Battery life: 8 hours in normal use

  • Charing Time : 100% in 1 hours

Stainless iron Milanese loop band (130 - 210mm)

Band for your nape

Backer can buy the band for wearing on the nape as an optional.

What's in the box ?

  • Coolbrace device

  • The stainless wristband (or napeband)

  • Type C charging cable

  • Quickstart guide 

Timeline & Shipping 

Coolbrace is in the prototype testing stage so that we need more support from the community.

Although our team is still young, we have 4+ years experience in researching and developing products, especially IoT. Therefore, our team will try our best to burn the time to deliver Coolbrace as soon as possible. This is the timeline we're planning: 

  • Oct 2021 : Indiegogo campaign ends

  • Nov 2021 : Produce engineering pilot units, get certificated

  • Dec 2021 : Deliver to early backers who has buy Perk 119$

  • Jan 2022 : Delivered to all backers

About the shipping fee, we'll notice to backer when we reach the target.

However, the world is being affected by Covid-19 and Ho Chi Minh City will be locked down until September 15th for further information from the government. It may affect the delivery time. We hope you can understand this situation!

Meet the team

We're young Vietnamese and have been working together for years. Our core team is the Z generation and supported by the Millennials. We believe that technology can help people have a better life.

Special thanks to everybody supporting this campaign

 

 

Disclaimers

Battery life: the actual battery life depends on the usage such as the cooling/warming temperature or each usage duration.

Water resistance: Coolbrace is splash resistant but not waterproof. You can treat it a bit like your cell phone or searching IP67.

Risks and challenges

SUPPLY CHAIN RISK

As mentioned above, our world is affected by Covid-19, so components delays and unexpected shortages can occur. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and try to solve the problem at our best.

Our contact

If you have any questions or need any support, just reach out to us :
Email : team@coolbrace.me 
Website : https://coolbrace.me
Facebook : https://facebook.com/coolbrace

If you love our project please share it with your friend

story:
Millions of computer users understand the huge productivity gains that additional computer screens can bring. By reducing or eliminating the time spent switching back and forth between different programs, additional screens can allow you to get things done much more quickly.

When using a laptop being limited to just the single laptop screen can be frustrating. We created Packed Pixels so you can easily take a lightweight and durable monitor wherever you go, so you can stay productive all the time.

Why Packed Pixels?

Our new Packed Pixels models now offer:

  • Two screen size options to choose from
  • HDMI and USB-C connectivity

Packed Pixels has always been:

  • A huge aid to productivity
  • Lightweight
  • Durable
  • High quality retina display
  • Easy, universal mounting system
  • First to market
  • Reliable
  • Thousands already delivered worldwide
  • Backed up with great customer service

See how Packed Pixels could help you:

Work from home/coffee shop/hot desk/freelance

Have you ever found yourself trying to write a proposal but you are constantly having to switch back and forth to a spreadsheet that has all the figures on it?

With Packed Pixels you can have the proposal open on your laptop screen and the figures immediately to hand on your Packed Pixels. Spend more time working and less time wasted switching back and forth between programs.

Developer

Many developers understand the benefits of extra screens. It can therefore be so frustrating when working on a laptop to be switching back and forth with that helpful wiki, while also missing out on crucial items in your chat window.

With Packed Pixels you can have it all; chat windows, wiki pages, monitoring dashboards, etc. no matter where you are.

Photographer/Film maker

Do you wish you had a larger preview screen when shooting and editing?

Packed Pixels can help. While connected to your laptop, Packed Pixels can give you a rich full colour preview of your output. For film makers, the Packed Pixels 4K gives you a full 4K preview of your output.

But that isn’t all. Thanks to the HDMI connectivity, you can also connect your Packed Pixels directly to your camera for a large preview of what you are shooting. And thanks to the standard 1/4 UNC thread mount on the rear of Packed Pixels, it can be mounted using any standard camera mount.

Stocks and shares day trader

If you deal in stocks and shares you know how important it is to have as much screen space as possible so you can track the market trends. While laptops are great for letting you trade from anywhere in the world, it can be frustrating being so limited on what you can track on just one screen.

Packed Pixels only use retina panels which means you can fit more stock graphs on screen, giving you that competitive advantage. And thanks to how lightweight and durable Packed Pixels are, you can make your millions where ever you want to be.

Gamer

Do you want to be the envy of the LAN party or wish you could game on your console anywhere? Packed Pixels can help. With Packed Pixels you can turn your gaming laptop into a widescreen powerhouse. Or perhaps you just need some extra screen space for the ultimate laptop Twitch setup.

Thanks to our inclusion of HDMI connectivity console gamers aren’t left out either. Packed Pixels can plug into your Xbox, Playstation or Switch for the ultimate go anywhere setup that drops easily into your backpack.

The Packed Pixels difference

Packed Pixels are the only retina resolution portable laptop monitors on the market.
Our patented mounting system works with any size of laptop and takes seconds to take on and off. Our system does NOT use sticky pads that are permanently stuck to your laptop or clamping brackets that can damage your screen.
We have a track record of delivering quality and reliable screens all over the world, backed up with excellent customer service.

Which Packed Pixels is right for me?

No matter which Packed Pixels you choose, you will have a lightweight and durable screen that will improve your productivity, no matter where you are.

Packed Pixels Go - 10.1" portable monitor - Choose your perk in this campaign

Our more compact screen has been designed to be the perfect companion to lightweight ultrabook laptops and for those who like to travel light. The Packed Pixels Go packs a real punch with its beautiful retina display and can be used landscape or portrait for ultimate flexibility.

Packed Pixels 4K - 15.6" portable monitor - Follow the link below to our other Indiegogo campaign

Designed for those who run larger and more powerful laptops and want only the best experience. Its size and massive 4K resolution are perfect for those who want a powerful workstation no matter where they are.

Go to our Packed Pixels 4K Indiegogo campaign

Reviews and testimonials

For the past 3 years we have been shipping Packed Pixels worldwide, helping thousands of people all over the globe to be more productive. Don’t just take our word for it, here is what they’ve had to say about Packed Pixels.

“absolutely love it!”

“super sharp and very bright”

“the product and functionality of it are wonderful”

“Has made my work so much easier.”

“Great product with great customer service backing it up!”

“such a beautiful screen”

We launched the original Packed Pixels via the Kickstarter crowdfunding platform. We feel this comment from a backer shows what you can expect from us.

“I will always look forward to any Kickstarter campaigns by this team: they represent the very best type of Kickstarter experience and have indeed delivered an awesome product that still is way ahead of any potential competition out there... and there really isn't any (yet). YOU GUYS ROCK!”

Tech specs
