story:
Story

Like many others, I suddenly became a full-remote employee in 2020. I was tired of being stuck inside all day and wanted to take my work outside. Unfortunately, it was often impossible to see my laptop screen because of the glare from the bright sun. I had enough, and the idea for VIZOR® was born. 

 

What's next? I bought a 3D printer and got to work designing, prototyping and testing. The following months involved consultations with professional engineers,  reputable manufacturers and material experts.

Fast forward to 2021 and VIZOR® is ready for the world, allowing anyone to get outside, beat the sun and have the freedom to work anywhere. 

 

Why

Staying inside for extended periods of time is a problem, one many of us are facing more now than ever before. I always felt better after getting outside, but there’s more to it than just a feeling, there’s science to back it up!

 

Studies show that spending time outdoors has a clear positive impact on your mental health and brain function. Benefits include: better focus, improved memory, longer attention span, creativity and lower stress. It also lowers your risk of health problems such as high blood pressure, cardiovascular disease and type II diabetes.

 

Beat the Light

VIZOR® allows you to get outside and beat the sun. When indoors, it beats overhead lights or the sun shining through windows. VIZOR® creates a shaded workspace, eliminates glare and improves the visibility of your laptop screen.

Beat the sun with VIZOR®.

 

Portable Design

VIZOR® folds up and easily fits in backpacks, bags, and sleeves. The folded dimensions are: 25cm x 23cm x 1.3cm. These dimensions may change with our final design improvements, but not by much.

Lightweight and thin, fold up VIZOR® and take it wherever you go.

 

Universal Fit

Have confidence that VIZOR® will fit your laptop.  Personal laptop? Work laptop? One size fits all 13" to 17" laptops. When you upgrade your laptop, VIZOR® will be there. We have yet to be stumped in our testing, here are the allowable dimensions:

Height: 20cm or greater
Width: 23cm - 44cm
Thickness: 1cm or less

Have confidence your laptop will be compatible with VIZOR®.

Tested Laptops: MacBook Air, MacBook Pro, HP ProBook, HP EliteBook, HP Envy, Asus ZenBook, Asus VivoBook, Acer Aspire, Acer Nitro, Acer Swift, Samsung Series 5, Microsoft Surface, Lenovo IdeaPad, Lenovo ThinkPad, Dell XPS

 

No Installation

VIZOR® requires no installation and sets up in seconds. No need for a permanent fixture stuck to your laptop and no screen bubbles from a privacy filter. Simply unfold, slide to the width of your laptop, and rest it on top! 

Work anywhere hassle free with VIZOR®.

 

Laptop Safe Design

With foam padding and rubber contact, VIZOR® is a safe addition to your laptop. It rests on top of your laptop and stays strong against surprise bumps or winds.

VIZOR® is proudly designed and manufactured in Canada.

 

Sunlight Heat Protection

VIZOR® blocks the hot sun, reducing your laptop’s temperature and helps prevent overheating. Excess temperatures can cause components within the laptop to fail, including the hard drive or battery. Shorter exposures that don't cause failure can still cause damage to your laptop's battery and reduce its lifetime.

Help keep your laptop cool with VIZOR®.

 

Keep Your Work Private

Wandering eyes at the office, airport or on transit will no longer see your work. The Global Visual Hacking Experiment by Ponemon Institute discovered 91% of visual hacking attempts are successful, 68% of them go unnoticed and 27% include financial and confidential information.

Keep your screen protected from strangers with VIZOR®.

 

VIZOR® vs Competition

VIZOR®'s unique design sets it apart from the rest. The existing alternatives had some problems, including: a permanent fixture on your laptop, laptop size restrictions, not usable with laptop stands, and cutting off corners of your screen.

Competitor data from amazon.ca - pricing in CAD.

 

Perks

 

 

Risks and Challenges

Like most products entering mass production, there are delay risks, with possible issues arising in any point of the design, manufacturing and fulfillment processes. These risks have been identified and mitigated, however things can still go beyond our expectation. If there are any delays, I promise to give you full transparency into the issues and solve them in a way that leaves you happy and proud to support VIZOR®.

The existing alternatives had some problems, including: a permanent fixture on your laptop, laptop size restrictions, not usable with laptop stands, and cutting off corners of your screen.Competitor data from amazon.ca - pricing in CAD. Perks  Risks and ChallengesLike most products entering mass production, there are delay risks, with possible issues arising in any point of the design, manufacturing and fulfillment processes. These risks have been identified and mitigated, however things can still go beyond our expectation. If there are any delays, I promise to give you full transparency into the issues and solve them in a way that leaves you happy and proud to support VIZOR®.

story:
Today, we carry more smart devices than ever before, and fewer of us are working in a traditional fixed office setting. This raises a real challenge in keeping all of our devices charged while we’re on the move. Every device seems to need its own charger, with power bricks often taking up more space than the devices themselves. The obvious solution would be to use one product to power all of your gadgets.

 

 

SuperTank Pro is the Ultimate Mobile Power Solution that allows working professionals to set up a workstation anywhere they need.

 

 

With its high powered 100W USB-C port, SuperTank Pro reimagines your charging experience. Charge your power-hungry 16” MacBook Pro at the same speed as the native power brick.  

 

SuperTank Pro can charge your devices lightning-fast, thanks to 100W max power output from a single USB-C port.

 

 

 

Share power! Maxim 26,800mAh Battery Capacity enables more people to use SuperTank Pro while collaborating.

 

 

Explore, untethered. Power your phone for up to a week with a fully-charged SuperTank Pro.

 

 

The  26,800mAh capacity enables more usage time than smaller chargers. What’s more, advanced Samsung battery technology ensures peak efficiency for SuperTank Pro.

 

 

Charge 4 devices at the same time using SuperTank Pro’s convenient USB-C output ports. SuperTank Pro’s high-powered USB-C ports allow you to configure your work setup with endless creativity!

 

SuperTank Pro takes the charging experience to a whole new level!

The OLED display on SuperTank Pro gives you real-time information about your power usage and remaining charge, so you can plan ahead and make the best use of your mobile workstation.

 

SuperTank Pro is the first portable battery that features an advanced TI battery fuel gauge, allowing for adaptive charging and power cell balance.

As a result, the OLED screen can accurately display charging input and output status, letting you take control of your device power levels in real-time.

Keep your SuperTank Pro compatible with the latest devices just by updating the firmware.

 

No matter how you choose to charge SuperTank Pro, the USB-C outputs can be used to power and charge other devices at the same time. Talk about convenience!

SuperTank Pro is made of an aluminum alloy which protects the internal components, to keep up with the demands of a mobile workplace. The color, material, and finish are similar to a MacBook.

SuperTank Pro makes the most of its massive capacity and power output through the use of high-quality internal components, with a charging efficiency of up to 85%. Most batteries on the market operate at a lower efficiency, which means they may not charge your devices quite as well as you’d expect. SuperTank Pro can keep a phone charged through seven days of typical usage.

The high-density battery cells pack more energy into less space, and the multi-layer PCB design allows for a compact and convenient form factor, minimizing the size of SuperTank Pro, with no wasted space.  

SuperTank Pro monitors a variety of internal metrics in real-time for safety, efficiency, and device protection.

SuperTank Pro’s power distribution algorithms automatically determine how the power should be distributed. The internal logic is designed to distribute power as needed to a variety of devices, from low power wearables like earbuds and smartwatches, to larger products like a robotic arm.

SuperTank Pro can be recharged in 1 hour and 45 minutes when you use Zendure’s SuperPort S4, a pocket-sized charger capable of up to 100W output.

Designed with a foldable AC adapter,  SuperPort S4 is easy to pack and carry, fitting in just about any small bag or pocket. SuperPort S4’s compact form is 30% smaller than Apple’s 96W charger and has 4 USB ports instead of just one. 

SuperPort S4 is widely compatible with the latest devices, like laptops, phones, tablets, Nintendo Switch and others. With 100W USB-C Power Delivery output, SuperPort S4 can provide full-speed charging for most of the latest USB-C high-power devices!

SuperPort S4 supports mainstream smartphone fast-charge protocols including PD 3.0, QC 3.0, PPS 5A (for Samsung fast charge), AFC (for Samsung fast charge) and SCP/FCP 22.5W (for HUAWEI fast charge).

SuperPort S4 supports 100-240V AC power and comes with 3 plug converters (AU/EU/UK) so you can use it in over 200 countries worldwide.

Adapter Specifications:

 

 

SuperTank Pro is compatible with most USB solar panels. Now you have two reasons to enjoy a sunny day!

* Please note that SuperTank Pro should be charged from the solar panel’s USB output using an A-to-C cable, not from a DC-to-USB converter.

Many electric cars and bikes feature charging ports that work especially well with SuperTank Pro, so you can charge on the way to your destination. We found that the USB-C ports on the Tesla Model 3 can charge SuperTank Pro at up to 27W. Surprising, huh? By the way, one more fun fact about SuperTank Pro: you can use it as a power meter to measure the outputs of any USB device.

 

 

Free premium EVA case for everyone! This case is compact and lightweight to protect and store the SuperTank Pro. It specifically designs a holding strap to hold your SuperTank Pro and a mesh pocket for a small accessory.

 

Unboxing SuperTank Pro!

 

How does SuperTank Pro work?

story:
CHUWI LarkBox has been shipped!

 

CHUWI LarkBox In Mass Production Now!

 

  1. Doesn’t occupy large amounts of space.
  2. Powerful functionality.
  3. Great as an office or home PC.
  4. 4K output for a great visual experience.
  5. Ideal for home theatres, digital signage, projectors, and monitoring.
  6. Less extra heat while lowering operating costs​.

 

 

 

 

  • Baseball-sized small body, suitable for places where space is scarce.

Due to its super compact size, Larkbox is fantastic for a desk where space is scarce. What’s more, it can be taken anywhere in your bag, enabling you to work anywhere without the need to switch devices.

To make this even easier, we made Larkbox super lightweight so you won’t even notice you’re carrying it. Unlike a traditional PC that can weigh upwards of 5KG, Larkbox is designed as the ultimate ease of use PC. Ultra-small form factor and lightweight design ensure that Larkbox is never a burden to your daily life.

 

  •  Small, yet with decent power

Despite its size, Larkbox packs a mighty punch. This opens up endless use cases for Larkbox. Due to the form factor, Larkbox is fantastic for POS and digital signage, kiosks, and CCTV systems. The options for Larkbox are endless, small, and powerful enabling it to complete all manner of tasks, anywhere, with ease.

 

 

 

 

  •   It's only about the size of a baseball and weighs 127g.

Larkbox utilizes an extremely small form factor, measuring in at a mere 61 x 61 x 43mm, and weighing only 127g. Traditional PCs can be very large and cumbersome, often meaning that transportation is near impossible. Larkbox aims to break that tradition, offering a super-compact form factor, without sacrificing on performance.

Our engineers worked tirelessly to shave off every possible millimeter, ensuring that Larkbox is as small as possible. With an overall size comparable to a baseball, the Larkbox can be taken anywhere with ease. With these parameters in mind, the options for Larkbox are limitless.

 

  •  High-Efficiency Celeron Processor

Don’t let the size fool you, Larkbox is a capable desktop replacement. Powered by Intel’s quad-core processor, it can handle all manner of home/office tasks effortlessly.

Larkbox is perfect for use as an office PC as emails, documents, and web browsing are performed with ease. Larkbox also works great as a 4K TV box, thanks to the Intel UHD graphics.

It also supports 4K output, allowing you to stream and play a huge selection of content, directly to your TV. The possibilities don't stop there, Larkbox is a fantastic option for POS, digital signage, kiosks, and surveillance.

 

 

 

 

  • 6GB LPDDR4 RAM and 128GB eMMC storage

With a massive 6GB of LPDDR4 Ram, the Larkbox can run multiple large programs simultaneously.

RAM dependent programs such as Photoshop run great on Larkbox, and thanks to DDR4, switching between programs can be done fast and efficiently.

Unlike other small form-factor PCs Larkbox is extremely versatile. The 128GB internal eMMC storage can be expanded via the M.2 2242 SSD slot, and even further with the inclusion of a micro SD slot, perfect for transferring photos and videos from cameras and other devices.

 

  • Convenient Wire or wireless connections

Larkbox has a huge variety of connection options, utilizing ultra-fast 802.11a/ac/b/g/n WiFi, reaches up to 867Mbps, and the latest Bluetooth 5.1. So you can connect dozens of devices with ease.

Stream audio to your Bluetooth headphones with minimal latency and move freely around the office without the constraint of wires. Connect to any router and enjoy fast reliable WiFi using the internal Intel-based wireless solution.

Despite its size, Larkbox presents a large I/O, allowing you to connect a huge selection of devices without the need for expensive adapters and trailing cables. Two full-sized USB-A 3.0 ports are essential for USB pen drives or charging your phone. Connect any modern monitor or TV with the HDMI 2.0 port with support up to 4K 60fps.

A micro SD slot can be found on the side of Larkbox, perfect for versatile storage or transferring media to and from a variety of devices. A USB-C port on the rear is used to power the Larkbox, gone are the days of awkward proprietary connections.

 Lastly, Larkbox also includes a 3.5mm combo analog jack for wired headphones and mics.

 

  •  Less extra heat while lowering operating costs​

LarkBox has an energy-efficient design that reduces environmental impact while helping to lower operating costs for your business. It consumes as little as 5W at idle and 12W at full load. It is also whisper-quiet, generating just 19dB of noise. 

A dedicated cooling solution was implemented to ensure optimal heat dissipation from Larkbox. Keeping your PC cool is essential to ensuring peak performance at all times, Larkbox uses an active heat dissipation fan to achieve this, ensuring your PC is always ready to perform at its best.

 

 

  • Easy installation, easy office

 

  • Supports multiple systems

 

 

 

 

 

We are so proud of what we have created so far, but we need your support to push it over the line. As part of this campaign we formally invite you to join us on this journey to bring this product to life.

Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design process, manufacturing of the units ordered through crowdfunding, and marketing costs.

As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All units claimed as perks will have at least 15% off the planned retail price and free shipping. First deliveries now start in August 2020 - only to LarkBox Indiegogo backers.

The warranty period for CHUWI LarkBox is 1 year, and for accessories, it is 6 months. Counting from the date of receipt of shipment. If you have any questions please feel free to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com.

 

We would love you to join the LarkBox movement and help by spreading the word on social media or telling colleagues and friends about our campaign.

Any suggestions on ways in which we can improve our campaign or products, please don’t hesitate to reach out by email or social media. We would absolutely love to hear from you.

 

Established in 2004 and located in Shenzhen of China, CHUWI has built a reputation for creating great tablet devices in our home country over the past fifteen years. We are always committed to designing and producing products that meet our customers’ requirements, allowing our supporters to enjoy our products in a new way.

 

1. Potential Delays 

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however, please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues. Including:

▲Certification delays

▲Production delays

▲Suppliers are unable to provide accessories on time

Currently, we have an initial prototype of LarkBox but building any new product is a huge task and there are risks involved. Our team has experience in delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in August 2020. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on this progress. We know that some backers have ended badly in the past - but never from CHUWI - we’ll always keep in touch with you, and welcome any messages you wish to send.

2. About the product

Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.

3. About the price

If the number of backers exceeds expectations or the exchange rate fluctuates significantly, the regular selling price may be lower than the planned selling price.

Since this is a crowdfunding project, please ensure you read the above points in advance.

Please, do not hesitate to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com. We are looking forward to answering any of your questions. Thank you!

story:
Bringing the Nanobook Back

A few months ago, we introduced Nanobook 1.0: The Toughest Notebook for Your Hand. Today, we are excited to reveal the refreshed version of the notepad that put us on the map.

We stuck with it and showed that we commit to not only get the product out but also to refine its design and make it the product we wanted it to be. We listened to the needs of our customers and created the Nanobook 2.0, a product that is even more convenient to use than the original. 

FIRE RESISTANT

100% WATERPROOF

SUPER DURABILITY

 

Here is Nanobook 2.0 in a nutshell: 

  • Designed to be small enough to fit comfortably in your hand when you’re outdoors.
  • Made from stone & grade 5 titanium, this next-generation product is made from non-organic materials and zero trees were harmed in its production.
  • One paper for all weather. Will survive sweat, rain, mud, snow, oil, grease, and the wear-and-tear of daily use.
  •  Use anything like a pen, even your keys. You can use several means to write on stone paper in case there is no pen on hand.
  • The combination of titanium alloy with stone paper has a flame retardant effect, especially in its closed state. The stone paper alone will eventually burn, but compared with other paper, it is more resilient. The titanium cover is fire-resistant and will protect the notes within.

 

Our robust and waterproof stone-paper goes hand in hand with the new and durable Grade 5 Titanium Cover. Whether it’s spilt coffee or just every-day wear, the legendary strength of the feather-light Titanium in a Nanobook 2.0 can withstand all of the obstacles that life throws at you.

Stone Paper is a revolutionary new medium whose composition is owed more to stone than organic material. Its production process creates a product which is 100% tree-free, water-free, acid-free, bleach-free and does not produce any waste.

 

Nanobook is small enough that it can be grasped in one hand, meaning that it can be used in all circumstances, regardless of what Mother Nature throws in your path. It can cope with all kinds of writing outdoors, even when you don’t have access to a table or another platform to write on. We made it our mission to create a notepad that you can carry and write on, wherever you are.  

IN HAND

IN POCKET​

 

Nanobook has a tremendous feature: it can be written on with coins, most keys and even using the tip of a bullet. This means you can easily and quickly take your essential notes in a tight spot, even when you don’t have access to a pen. 

ANY PEN

EVEN COINS

 

The refillable system is perfectly designed so that you can be fully present. Easily refill the titanium cover with your choice of inner refill pads.

EASY TO ADD OR REMOVE

 

Nanobook ST: Measuring just 2 x 3 inches, our smaller size is ideal for taking notes on the go when you have limited space, and is strong enough to hold in one hand while writing with the other.

Nanobook MT: Our larger, 3 x 5 inches notepad gives you more room for your notes, and is ready for wherever your next trip takes you. It is still small enough to put it in your pocket as you bike in the woods, or to store in your backpack when you hike your next mountain.

 

You can choose the paper type of Nanobook to meet your own needs in the survey when the campaign ends. BLANK or SQUARED paper available.

 

We have been working together with our trusted manufacturer for a long time. With utmost efficiency and stringent quality gates along each step of the way, we are confident to fulfil this project and deliver your rewards on June 2020.

 Our robust and waterproof stone-paper goes hand in hand with the new and durable Grade 5 Titanium Cover. Whether it’s spilt coffee or just every-day wear, the legendary strength of the feather-light Titanium in a Nanobook 2.0 can withstand all of the obstacles that life throws at you.Stone Paper is a revolutionary new medium whose composition is owed more to stone than organic material. Its production process creates a product which is 100% tree-free, water-free, acid-free, bleach-free and does not produce any waste. Nanobook is small enough that it can be grasped in one hand, meaning that it can be used in all circumstances, regardless of what Mother Nature throws in your path. It can cope with all kinds of writing outdoors, even when you don’t have access to a table or another platform to write on. We made it our mission to create a notepad that you can carry and write on, wherever you are.  IN HANDIN POCKET​ Nanobook has a tremendous feature: it can be written on with coins, most keys and even using the tip of a bullet. This means you can easily and quickly take your essential notes in a tight spot, even when you don’t have access to a pen. ANY PENEVEN COINS The refillable system is perfectly designed so that you can be fully present. Easily refill the titanium cover with your choice of inner refill pads.EASY TO ADD OR REMOVE Nanobook ST: Measuring just 2 x 3 inches, our smaller size is ideal for taking notes on the go when you have limited space, and is strong enough to hold in one hand while writing with the other.Nanobook MT: Our larger, 3 x 5 inches notepad gives you more room for your notes, and is ready for wherever your next trip takes you. It is still small enough to put it in your pocket as you bike in the woods, or to store in your backpack when you hike your next mountain. You can choose the paper type of Nanobook to meet your own needs in the survey when the campaign ends. BLANK or SQUARED paper available. We have been working together with our trusted manufacturer for a long time. With utmost efficiency and stringent quality gates along each step of the way, we are confident to fulfil this project and deliver your rewards on June 2020.

story:
In 2017, we launched a widely acclaimed product on Indiegogo: Passport, a universal travel adapter with an auto-resetting fuse to help travelers get away from the annoyance of single-use fuses. We’ve followed up with two other products: Passport Pro and Passport 30W. Thousands of Passport devices have been shipped around the world, thanks to the support of our backers.

 

Our fourth installment marks a bigger leap than we’ve ever taken before. Introducing Passport II Pro. Passport II Pro is more than just a travel adapter. It is an indispensable powerhouse for home use as well.

 

 

 
 
 

 

 

It only takes 2 hours to fully charge a 13” MacBook Pro. Leave your laptop charger at home. With Passport II Pro and a USB-C to USB-C cable, you’re packing lighter and smarter than ever before. Plus, Passport II Pro has enough ports to charge up to five other devices.

 

 

The 61W USB-C PD port isn’t just for laptops. It supports mainstream fast charge protocols like PD, QC, PPS 3A, AFC and FCP for fast charging Apple, Samsung, HUAWEI and more. iPhone 11 Pro can be charged up to 50% in 30 minutes with PD 3.0, and Samsung Galaxy S20 can be fully charged in just one hour with PPS 3A.

Thanks to cutting-edge GaN technology and several long meetings with engineers, we don’t have to make choice between performance and size. Passport II Pro is 20% smaller than Passport 30W, despite delivering over twice the power and having more ports. It’s like having your cake and eating it too… and then charging your laptop with the cake.

So what is GaN? Semiconductors (electronic components that make many wonderful things possible) are typically made with silicon. But in some applications, GaN (Gallium Nitride) has proven to be superior. In power converters, GaN semiconductors operate at a higher efficiency. This means they generate less heat when performing a task, which means engineers don’t have to dedicate as much space to managing that heat. The result? A smaller product with more power and less heat. The future’s so bright and small, you’ll need prescription shades to see it.

Passport II Pro is equipped with 5 USB ports (2 USB-C ports & 3 USB-A ports) and a multi-region AC outlet, allowing you to charge up to 6 devices at the same time. No need to carry several different chargers for all your devices. Keep your desk neat and clutter-free with Passport II Pro.

Passport II Pro’s sleekness and versatility really shine when it’s time to hit the road. You’ll have so much extra space in your bag, you might hear an echo.

 

Passport II Pro integrates US, UK, EU & AU plug into one sleek unit.

 

Passport II Pro can plug into type A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K, L, M, N and O outlets. This is related to where you want to travel with Passport II Pro.

 

 

Passport II Pro can accept type A, B, C, E, F, G, I, J, L and N plugs. This is related to the devices you want to use, or in other words, where you are from.

 

Here is a complete list of countries & regions that Passport II Pro is compatible with (more than 200 countries and regions).

The retractable plugs are integrated into Passport II Pro’s all-in-one design and can be accessed with one hand using the Press & Slide controls. The sliding action is smoother than ever, for ease of use and a better user experience.

 

 

But wait, where is AU plug?

Just rotate the US plug and you will get an AU plug. Pretty easy, right?

And it won't interfere with the switch button in Australia & New Zealand!

 

We introduced auto-resetting fuses to the travel adapter industry with our first Passport. In the event that you plug something into your travel adapter that draws too much current, the fuse will stop the flow of power. Most travel adapters on the market have a single-use fuse that you’ll have to replace if this happens. Passport’s auto-resetting fuse means you’re back in action within about a minute. 

And with Passport II Pro, the fuse has been upgraded to 10A, which means Passport II Pro is compatible with many high-power devices that other travel adapters can’t handle, including many brands of hair dryers, hair straighteners, and electric kettles.

Safety always comes first. Passport II Pro adopts a child-proof shield to make sure that the AC outlet is only used for plugs… in case a curious toddler tries to stick anything else in there.

Passport II Pro follows the design language of Passport, the one which won Good Design Award in 2017 from the Chicago Athenaeum Museum of Architecture and Design. The “Press and Slide” buttons and Roman Pillars Stripe design make Passport II Pro stand out from other travel adapters.

 

 

Zendure was founded in 2013 by Tom Haflinger and Bryan Liu. Zendure has a portfolio of innovative, premium quality products delivered to over 20,000 backers on Kickstarter, including the A-Series, the world's first crush-proof external batteries; SuperTank, a massive portable charger that has brought in over $1,000,000 USD in funding worldwide; SuperMini, a credit-card-sized 10,000mAh portable chargers with 18W Power Delivery; SuperHub, a compact charger, HDMI adapter and USB hub with dual PD output. All of our crowdfunding projects are successfully fulfilled. Our experience with charging technology and our concern for the current global situation has led us to the release of Passport II Pro, a travel adapter that is also indispensable for the home office.

story:
Tired of viewing the dim screen and poor color quality on your LCD display? You deserve a better monitor. A far better OLED monitor. OLED (Organic Light Emitting Diode) displays are better than LCDs…they are brighter, more efficient, have better contrast and refresh rates, and are thinner in size.

However, the OLED monitors currently on the market are either too expensive or unsuitable for on-the-go use. 

 

 

Introducing XtendTouch Pro, the world’s first 15.6-inch 4K AMOLED portable monitor, with true-to-life colors, extreme blacks, and stunning details that let you see and work better.

 

Hands-on Review by ETA PRIME 

"This is by far the best looking portable monitor I have ever tested and it actually the best looking display that I have here at the house out of all my Monitors and TVs! This thing is absolutely beautiful.

Filming this monitor with the camera isn't going to do it justice. The best way to see how good this looks is with the naked eyes. But I still think this came out absolutely amazing."

 

Hands-on Review by TheRelaxingEnd 

"The response time seems better than in some of the other portable monitors I've tried..."

 

There are over 8.3 million self-lit pixels in the XtendTouch Pro 4K AMOLED display, each emits their own light independently and can be completely turned off. Therefore, the XtendTouch Pro enables everyone to enjoy an unparalleled viewing experience, with vivid colors, deep black, stunning images, and incredible details.

 

 

  •    Wider color gamut 

XtendTouch Pro exceeds industry standards for color reproduction, achieving over 100% DCI-P3 color gamut coverage.

 

 

  • Truly-precise color accuracy, exceptional contrast, and rapid response.

 

High quality displays are of vital importance to many professionals like video editors, photographers, designers, colorists, and anyone chasing superior quality to see the true colors, contrast, and details of their content. XtendTouch Pro is your creative studio on-the-go that gives you everything you need to boost creativity and productivity.

 

With an advanced stylus included, drawing, image retouching, and note-taking have never been so easy. Intuitive, precise, and 4096-pressure-sensitive, it is magical with a Microsoft-certified chip and is always ready when inspiration strikes.

 

XtendTouch Pro is equipped with multiple ports that allow connection to virtually any device. Whether you are using the display with a laptop, smartphone, or even Switch for gaming, XtendTouch Pro meets all your daily demands.

 

  •  Reliable power supply system 

The cutting-edge power supply system ensures stable operation at high-brightness. In contrast, typical monitors will turn dark without sufficient power or can’t reach high-brightness at all.

 

 

  • Foldable stand & Magnetic cover for various angles & uses 

Every XtendTouch Pro comes with a foldable stand and magnetic cover that can unlock endless viewing possibilities. The stand is designed with pros in mind and is completely adjustable, allowing your XtendTouch Pro to fit seamlessly into any work environment. The magnetic cover provides great protection while using in both landscape and portrait mode (auto-rotation via gyroscope).

 

 

  • PD Passthrough Charging 

This function enables you to charge your devices via XtendTouch Pro itself, to keep you powered up at all times and eliminates the need to carry extra chargers. Set up is hassle-free and plug & play, so you get more done quickly.

 

 

  • Hardware Low Blue Light Filter Technology

The AMOLED display panel of the XtendTouch Pro has a native hardware blue light filter that shifts the frequencies of the harmful blue light spectrum to the beneficial spectrum and thus effectively reducing damage to the eye while maintaining its picture quality. It's with up to 70% less blue light emission than an LCD monitor.

 

 

  • Dual Stereo Speakers 

Typical portable monitors always seem to have poor sound quality. We armed XtendTouch Pro with dual stereo speakers that deliver outstanding audio and dynamic bass for crystal clear sound for any application.

 

 

  • Picture in picture 

When connecting 2 devices to XtendTouch at the same time, you can still view both of them. Watch a movie while making a video call, or take notes while having a Zoom online meeting, it’s up to you.

 

XtendTouch Pro perfectly combines outstanding performance and an affordable price, making it the ideal portable monitor for any on-the-go creative, student, or digital nomad.

 

 

Innovation • Uncompromised Quality • Passion

Founded in 2017 by a group of customer-focused gadget enthusiasts and engineers, Pepper Jobs aims to become one of the world's leading computing and mobile gadgets companies. To achieve this goal, Pepper Jobs has been developing a wide variety of innovative gadgets with cutting-edge technologies and delivering them to our customers at an affordable cost. Through these products, Pepper Jobs strives for unparalleled satisfaction and reliability to our customers.

Through these products, Pepper Jobs strives for unparalleled satisfaction and reliability to our customers.

story:
To order your Mirabook, please click the link below to access our website!

Order your Mirabook now!

Version Française

Versión Española

Versão Portuguese

General Overview

Turn your Smartphone into a Laptop

In a world where mobile has triumphed, Miraxess launches The Mirabook, a true extension to give the smartphone all the capacities of a laptop. A large full HD Display, a keyboard, a touchpad, extra storage and a high capacity battery that instantly create the ultimate laptop - of which you already own half

As consumers increasingly depend on their smartphone to organize their personal and professional lives, it is becoming evident that the traditional computer has been replaced by the smartphone as the main servant of our digital needs. The PC market and worldwide deliveries keep declining: -5.7% in the 3rd quarter of 2016 and -3.3% for EMEA[1]. This can be explained among others by the emerging markets where People choose Smartphones over PCs.

Since its launch, the smartphone has been integrating more and more features. The smartphone is nowadays a real computer with a capacity that truly matches one of a conventional PC. For instance, did you know that the Samsung Galaxy S8 is more powerful than a Macbook air?    

To boost the next mobile revolution, Miraxess offers a breakthrough innovation to fully harness the power of your smartphone.

 

Simplicity and design

The Mirabook comes in the form of a full-fledged laptop, ultra-lightweight and customizable, with an aluminum finish. With a 13.3  inch display offering and a  1080p resolution, it is quiet and does not heat up. The battery is its greatest asset: it can be used continuously for up to 24 hours while recharging your Smartphone.

The extension is both simple to use and practical. It can be plugged in through the smartphone Type-C USB and instantly displays the mobile screen. The Smartphone centralizes all apps and data so there is no longer any need for data synchronization.

Choose your color and make it yours

私たちのプロジェクトをサポートしてくれてありがとう

우리를 지원 주셔서 감사합니다

Merci de soutenir notre projet

Gracias por apoyar nuestro proyecto

Thank you for supporting our project

Download our media kit

 

When convergence meets endless mobility

Efficient Personal data management is now possible with the Mirabook. Even though smartphones now offer greater storage (like 128 GB), the Mirabook offers its own storage for extended mobility and privacy. Unequally autonomous and lightweight compared to a standard PC, the Mirabook is the ultimate mobile solution.

"Everyone has the Smartpart of the Mirabook in their pocket. Our ambition is to truly revolutionize the mainstream computer market considering that the Smartphone is the only computer that we need now. The PC market has been declining since 2012, the combination Smartphone + Mirabook is the next big breakthrough innovation. Eventually, Miraxess plans to develop other extensions, always based on this principle of mirroring and convergence.” - Yanis Anteur CEO

 

The Mirabook Extension fits into this natural movement that makes the smartphone the universal engine of our activities. Miraxess reinvents the laptop and focuses on a small handheld computer, the Smartphone.

 

Desktop Modes

Features such as Samsung Desktop Experience or Oxi by Auxens provide Desktop mode interfaces. You can now be productive and enjoy your favorite apps on your mobile phone. The Mirabook is the perfect Samsung DeX laptop Users have plenty of choices to operate a desktop interface:

See Samsung DeX

See Oxi OS

See Leena OS

See Maru OS

See Remix Singularity

See Microsoft Continuum

 

    Compatibility with PC sticks

    Connect the Mirabook with the world’s smallest PCs, for a cost-effective computer on the go.

    Make it work with your Raspberry Pi !

    Connect your Raspberry Pi and make it look like the most affordable full-size laptop.

    The Mirateam is working closely with Mark Chin to bring a special USB-C module for Raspberry Pi. With it, you will be able to take part of the full potential of the most affordable tiny PC.

    Take a look at his work 

     

     

    1st prototype Video reviews

     

    English

    French

    Portuguese

    Italian

     

    Compatibility: Android, Windows Phone, Ubuntu

    Contrary to the old classic PC market, there is no video protocol standard on Smartphone. To better understand the choice we had to make, let's have a look at the different options to display a Smartphone's on an external screen:

    MHL over USB C: It's a hardware solution founded by both Samsung and Sony. The problem is that it's now present almost only on Sony products because Samsung has switched to SlimPort.

    HDMI over USB C: It's hardware solution but is currently present in no device at all.

    DisplayLink: It's a software solution enabling all smartphones to be compatible because you need to install a driver over an app. However, the software compression makes that technology unstable and uses significantly the CPU processing power.

    SlimPort: This is the native technology we chose. It's a Hardware solution,which implies that it's very reliable, efficient and and it's the most frequently integrated in Mobile devices. Samsung, LG, Microsoft, Acer, HTC are all using Slimport on their smartphones. Apple is also secretly using this technology in their Iphones, but it's not used at the moment.

    Miracast: This is a wireless solution, and we really hope to use it one day, even though this may incur higher production costs.

     

    The Mirabook: We had to make a choice in terms of compatibility and that's why the Mirabook prioritizes the performance over universal compatibility. However, we have the possibility to develop a special cable/adapter working with DisplayLink to reach more Smartphones models, Once the $100K threshold is reached The same will be done for a wireless dongle if we meet our goal of $1,5M.

    They talk about Miraxess

     

    About Miraxess

    It started with a simple question: "Why do we have so many devices when having only one would be enough." Mobile convergence is the solution to develop innovative products and make life more simple. Miraxess wishes to mark its time with an innovative vision of computing and a new approach to mobility. The young French start-up was founded in 2015 by Yanis Anteur (CEO) and Paul-Emile René (CTO), then joined by Julien Guillaud (Business dev Associate) and Fabien Pointet (CMO).

     

    Our vision

    The Mirabook is just a start, and we anticipate the coming of the Mobile First Revolution. Your Smartphone has so much potential that it becomes the only meaningful computer. 

    We predict that, in the future your Smartphone will be your main internet access point. It will be the client of a connected cloud server for your deported Operating system, your professional software, and your data.

    Based on this vision, Miraxess is a creator of Smartphone extensions and there are so many revolutionary products we want to launch, such as a tablet extension, a dock or a gaming station, all working with your Smartphone.

    The future is mobile and the only computer your need is in your pocket.

     

    Where do you ship to?

    Our shipping partner uses multiple couriers for worldwide delivery and we will ship to any place where they deliver.

    Is shipping included?

    Unfortunately, Shipping is not included, as we are still currently engaged in talks with 3PL (third-party logistic) companies to provide you the best price. We are building a custom portal for you to keep track of your Mirabook . 

    Once the campaign is finished you will receive a personal login to www.miraxess.com and pay for your shipping there. Approximate shipping cost will be $15 anywhere in Europe, and the USA. Shipping-related costs to other countries will vary depending on your location.

    Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries.

    What are the possible issues and challenges?

    The Mirabook is nearly complete. The final prototypes shown on this page and in the videos were built on our partner ODM's production line. We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan and we are ready to meet the estimated delivery times. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur and sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. If this happens, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possible

    What are the phone specification requirement to use the mirabook ?

    The phone must support DisplayPort over USB Type-C
    (see the list of compatible phones or ask your manufacturer)

    We plan to develop an adapter to convert DisplayLink to DisplayPort for phones without DisplayPort support.

    What is DisplayPort™ over USB Type-C?

    DisplayPort™ over USB Type-C enables the delivery of full DisplayPort A/V performance (driving monitor resolutions of 4K and beyond), SuperSpeed USB (USB 3.1) data and up to 100 watts of power with the convenience of reversible plug orientation and cable direction. DisplayPort™ is the best A/V protocol to be carried over USB Type-C.

    What happens if I receive a call when my phone is plugged to the Mirabook ?

    You will be able to pick up the call directly on your mobile phone and on the Mirabook as well.

    Does the screen of the mirabook stay on when my phone is locked ?

    It will depend on the OS you are running. For example, with Windows continuum or Samsung Desktop Experience, this function is  included.

    How do I check the battery level ?

    You can press the battery level gauge button on the side to see it.

    Will there be different keyboard layout ?

    We really want to have international keyboard layouts, but it will depend upon quantity required. We invite you to share the campaign page to your friend so we can reach the minimum order quantity for your keyboard. At first, the QWERTY keyboard will be available.

    Can I change the brightness of the screen or adjust audio level by using hotkey?

    Yes

    _____________________________________________________________________________________

    Transformez votre smartphone en ordinateur portable !

    Dans un monde où le tout-mobile prévaut, Miraxess est fier de vous présenter le Mirabook, une extension qui vous permettra de transformer votre smartphone en un véritable ordinateur. Le Mirabook vous propose un grand écran en haute définition, un clavier, un pavé tactile, une batterie de très grande autonomie et une capacité de stockage qui viendra compléter la mémoire de votre smartphone. Combinez les capacités de votre smartphone avec les possibilités du Mirabook et vous obtenez l’ordinateur portable ultime. Si vous êtes d’ores et déjà détenteur d’un smartphone, vous êtes déjà à mi-parcours, alors sautez le pas et profitez dès à présent d’une expérience unique !

    À une époque où le Smartphone est indispensable, tant dans notre vie professionnelle que privée, celui-ci a clairement supplanté l’ordinateur portable traditionnel en tant qu’instrument incontournable et pourvoyeur principal de nos besoins numériques. Partout, à travers le monde, les ventes de PC et autres produits affiliés sont en baisse : - 5,7% au troisième trimestre de l’année 2016 et - 3,3% dans la zone EMEA. Les raisons d’un tel déclin ? Entre autres, les pays émergents, dont la population tend à privilégier les smartphones plutôt que les PC en tant qu’outil numérique de prédilection.

    L’extension Mirabook s’inscrit dans ce mouvement naturel qui place le smartphone au cœur de nos activités numériques. Miraxess réinvente l’ordinateur portable en se concentrant sur cet ordinateur miniature et ultra-mobile qu’est le smartphone.

    Nos smartphones proposent désormais de nombreuses fonctionnalités. De nos jours, un smartphone est un véritable ordinateur, capable de rivaliser avec un PC traditionnel. Le saviez-vous ? Un Samsung Galaxy S8 est désormais plus puissant qu’un MacBook Air:   

    À l’aube de la prochaine révolution numérique, Miraxess propose une innovation révolutionnaire qui vous permettra d’exploiter pleinement la puissance de votre smartphone.

    Design et simplicité

    Le Mirabook se présente sous la forme d’un ordinateur portable ultra-léger et entièrement personnalisable, aux finitions aluminium. Doté d’un écran de 13,3 pouces et de la haute définition, le Mirabook est silencieux et ne surchauffe pas. Sa plus grande force réside certainement dans son autonomie impressionnante : le Mirabook offre 24 heures d’utilisation en continu tout en rechargeant votre smartphone.

    L’extension est à la fois simple d’utilisation et pratique. Elle se branche via un port USB de type C et permet d’afficher instantanément l’écran du smartphone à l’ordinateur. Le smartphone centralisant toutes les applications et toutes les données, le Mirabook ne nécessite aucune synchronisation de données.

    Ta couleur, ton Mirabook

    私たちのプロジェクトをサポートしてくれてありがとう

    Merci de soutenir notre projet

    Gracias por ayudar a nuestro proyecto

    Thank you for supporting our project

     

    Convergence et mobilité

    Le Mirabook permet dès à présent une gestion efficace et intelligente des données. Bien que les smartphones offrent désormais des capacités de stockage accrues, atteignant parfois les 128 Go, le Mirabook va plus loin et propose une capacité de stockage supplémentaire, pour une confidentialité et une mobilité absolues de vos données. Sa légèreté et son autonomie font du Mirabook une alternative incontournable au PC traditionnel, pour une mobilité parfaite.

    « Nous disposons tous déjà de la moitié intelligente du Mirabook. Elle est là, dans votre poche, il s’agit tout simplement de votre smartphone. Notre ambition est de révolutionner le marché traditionnel du PC, avec le parti pris suivant : notre smartphone est le seul ordinateur dont nous ayons besoin. Le marché du PC connaît un certain déclin depuis 2012, mais en combinant un smartphone avec la technologie du Mirabook, on obtient la prochaine grande innovation qui va rebattre les cartes du marché. Miraxess a également d’autres projets en ligne de mire, tels que le développement de nouvelles extensions, toujours basées sur le principe de complémentarité et de convergence. » - Yanis Anteur, PDG de Miraxess.

     

    Modes Bureau

    Des services tels que le Samsung Desktop Experience ou Oxi by Auxens proposent d’ores et déjà des interfaces offrant un mode Bureau. Il est désormais possible d’être productif, tout en profitant de ses applications mobiles préférées. Et en ce qui concerne les modes Bureau, vous n’aurez que l’embarras du choix.

    See Samsung DeX

    See Oxi OS

    See Leena OS

    See Maru OS

    See Remix Singularity

    See Microsoft Continuum

     

      Compatibilité PC stick

      Connectez votre Mirabook aux plus petits ordinateurs disponibles sur le marché, pour un ordinateur instantanément opérationnel et à prix malin.

      Compatibilité Raspberry Pi

      Connectez votre Mirabook au Raspberry Pi et faites de votre Mirabook l’ordinateur portable le moins cher du marché !

      La Mirateam travaille étroitement avec Mark Chin, un membre de la communauté Raspberry Pi, pour créer un module USB-C unique au monde.

      Regardez son travail

       

      1e prototype en vidéo

       

      English

      French

      Portuguese

      Italian

       

      Compatibilité : Android, Windows Phone, Ubuntu

      Contrairement au marché PC traditionnel, il n’existe pas de protocole vidéo standard sur smartphone. De toutes les différentes options qui s’offraient à nous, Miraxess a fait le choix d’opter pour un affichage d’écran de smartphone sur un écran externe grâce à la technologie SlimPort. Voici pourquoi :

       

      L’interface MHL via USB-C (interface mobile de haute définition) est une solution développée par Samsung et Sony. Le problème de cette interface est qu’elle est désormais présente sur les produits conçus par Sony mais pas par Samsung, ces derniers étant passés à une technologie SlimPort.

       

      L’HDMI via USB-C serait une solution hardware viable mais qui n’est malheureusement pas présente sur les appareils requis.

      DisplayLink est une solution logicielle assurant la compatibilité des smartphones grâce à l’installation d’un pilote via une application dédiée. Cependant, la compression du logiciel rend cette technologie instable et gourmande en matière de puissance de processeur.

       

      SlimPort est la technologie native que nous avons privilégiée. C’est une solution hardware, ce qui la rend fiable, efficace, et qui fait d’elle une solution fréquemment intégrée aux smartphones. Samsung, LG, Microsoft, Acer, HTC sont autant de marques utilisant SlimPort pour leurs smartphones. Apple y a également discrètement recours, sans que ce choix soit pour le moment ouvertement utile.

       

      Miracast est une solution sans fil que souhaitons pouvoir utiliser à l’avenir, et ce bien qu’elle entraîne des coûts de production accrus.

       

      Le développement du Mirabook nous a contraint à faire des choix, et c’est pourquoi nous avons décidé de privilégier la performance plutôt qu’une compatibilité universelle. Toutefois, notre projet de financement – une fois le cap des 100 000 dollars franchi - inclut le développement éventuel d’un adaptateur compatible avec la technologie DisplayLink pour rendre notre Mirabook accessible à un nombre croissant de smartphones. Et une fois le cap des 1,5 millions franchi, c’est cette fois-ci le développement d’un dongle sans fil qui sera à l’ordre du jour.

      Ils parlent de nous

       

      About Miraxess

      Tout a commencé avec une simple question. Pourquoi s’embarrasser d’une multitude d’appareils alors qu’un seul suffirait ? La convergence mobile est une solution qui nous permet de faire d’une pierre deux coups : en développant des produits innovants, nous nous simplifions également la vie. Par sa vision novatrice de l’informatique et par une nouvelle approche de la mobilité, Miraxess souhaite marquer l’histoire du smartphone de son empreinte. La jeune start-up a été fondée en 2015 par Yanis Anteur (PDG) et Paul-Émile René (Directeur de la technologie), rejoints plus tard par Julien Guillaud (Directeur Commercial) et Fabien Pointet (Directeur Marketing).

       

      Notre vision

      Mirabook n’est que le début, car, avec l’arrivée prochaine de la Première Révolution mobile, nous sommes convaincus que nous allons bientôt assister à la naissance d’une nouvelle ère. Votre smartphone a un potentiel illimité, pour peu que vous commenciez à le considérer comme le seul ordinateur d’avenir valable.

       

      Nous sommes convaincus qu’à l’avenir, votre smartphone sera votre principal moyen d’accès à Internet. Connecté au cloud, il hébergera vos données personnelles et professionnelles sur le système d’exploitation de votre choix.

       

      Miraxess place cette vision au cœur de toutes ses entreprises : c’est pourquoi nous avons créé une extension smartphone, qui sera bientôt suivie de bien d’autres projets, tels qu’une extension tablette, un dock, une installation gaming, tous opérables depuis votre smartphone.

      Le futur est mobile et le seul ordinateur dont vous ayez besoin se trouve d’ores et déjà à portée de main.

       

      Où livrez-vous ?

      Notre entreprise partenaire assure un service de livraison international, nous livrons donc à toute destination couverte par leurs services.

      Les frais de port sont-ils inclus ?

      Malheureusement, les frais de port sont supplémentaires car nous sommes toujours en phase de négociations avec des entreprises 3PL (logistique tierce partie) afin de vous garantir le meilleur service possible. Nous développons actuellement un service de suivi qui vous permettra de suivre en temps réel la livraison de votre Mirabook.

      Dès la fin de la levée de fonds, vous recevrez un identifiant qui vous permettra de vous connecter sur la page www.miraxess.com et de payer vos frais de port directement sur celle-ci. Nos frais de port s’élèvent en moyenne à 15 dollars pour une livraison en Europe ou aux États-Unis. Un autre montant s’appliquera en dehors de cette zone et selon le pays de destination.

      L’application éventuelle d’une TVA ou de frais de douane selon le pays de destination seront toutes deux à la charge de l’acheteur.

      Vais-je rencontrer d’éventuels problèmes ou difficultés ?

      Le Mirabook est entré dans sa phase finale de développement. Les prototypes présentés sur cette page et sur ces vidéos ont été conçus via la chaîne de production de notre original design manufacturer (ODM). Notre plan de production repose sur une estimation solide de la demande et nous sommes prêts à respecter les délais de livraison initialement prévus. Cependant, des retards dans la livraison de composants et autres contretemps indépendants de notre volonté peuvent se produire et retarder de façon impromptue le délai de livraison initialement prévu. En cas d’incident, nous vous communiquerons les raisons d’un éventuel retard et nous nous attacherons à y remédier dans les plus brefs délais.

      Ai-je besoin d’un équipement spécifique sur mon smartphone pour pouvoir utiliser le Mirabook ?

      Votre smartphone doit être équipé de l’interface DisplayPort via USB-C. Vous pouvez consulter la liste de smartphones compatibles ou vous adresser, le cas échéant, au producteur concerné

      Nous développerons prochainement un adaptateur qui vous assurera une compatibilité DisplayLink – DisplayPort pour les smartphones ne disposant pas du service DisplayPort

      DisplayPort™ via USB-C, kézako ?

      La technologie DisplayPort™ via USB-C permet une interconnexion audio/ vidéo et supporte des résolutions d’écran de 4K et plus. DisplayPort allie la rapidité du service USB SuperSpeed (USB 3.1) à une puissance de 100 watts, tout en offrant tout le confort d’une prise et d’un câble orientables à souhait. DisplayPort est à ce jour le meilleur protocole audio/ vidéo disponible via USB-C.

      Que se passe-t-il si je reçois un appel sur mon smartphone pendant que j’utilise le Mirabook ?

      Vous aurez le choix de décrocher directement sur votre smartphone ou depuis le Mirabook.

      L’écran du Mirabook restera-t-il allumé si je verrouille mon smartphone ?

      Tout dépend de votre système d’exploitation. Cela sera possible avec, entre autres, Windows Continuum et Samsung Desktop Experience car ils assurent notamment ce service.

      Comment puis-je vérifier le niveau de charge de la batterie ?

      Le Mirabook vous permet de vérifier à tout moment quel est votre niveau de charge restant grâce à un bouton dédié, sur le côté.

      Aurais-je une disposition de touches de clavier différente en passant sur le Mirabook ?

      Assurer la disponibilité des claviers les plus internationalement répandus est au cœur de nos préoccupations. Nous vous invitons à partager notre page de campagne avec vos amis pour atteindre le palier de commandes qui déclenchera la disponibilité de votre Mirabook avec la disposition de clavier de votre choix. Pour le moment, seul le clavier QWERTY est disponible. 

      Le Mirabook sera-t-il équipé d’une touche permettant de régler la luminosité ou le niveau de volume ?

      Oui.

      _____________________________________________________________________________________

      Convierte tu teléfono en un ordenador portátil!

      En un mundo donde prevalecen todos los móviles, Miraxess se enorgullece en presentar el Mirabook, una extensión que le permite convertir tu teléfono en un ordenador real. El Mirabook ofrece una gran pantalla de alta definición, un teclado, un trackpad, una batería de muy larga duración y capacidad de almacenamiento que complementará la memoria de su smartphone. Combinar las capacidades de su smartphone con las posibilidades del Mirabook y se obtiene el portátil definitivo. Si usted ya tiene un smartphone, ya se encuentra a medio camino, aga el paso y aproveche de una experiencia única.

      En un momento en el que el Smartphone es esencial tanto en nuestra vida profesional y privada, este ah suplantado claramente el portátil tradicional como proveedor esencial y principal instrumento de nuestras necesidades digitales. En todas partes del mundo, las ventas de ordenadores personales y otros productos de afiliados están bajando - 5,7% en el tercer trimestre de 2016 y - 3,3% en EMEA. Las razones una tal disminución ? Entre otros, los países emergentes, cuya población tiende a concentrarse en los smartphones como herramienta digital principal.

      La extensión Mirabook hace parte de este movimiento natural que coloca el smartphone en el corazón de nuestras actividades digitales. Miraxess reinventa el portátil, centrándose en nuestro PC miniatura y ultra móvil que es el smartphone.

      Nuestros smartphones ahora ofrecen muchas características. Hoy en día, un smartphone es un ordenador real capaz de rivalizar con PC tradicional. Sabías ? Un Galaxy S8 Samsung es ahora más potente que un MacBook Air:   

      En el amanecer de la próxima revolución digital, Miraxess ofrece una innovación revolucionaria que le permite aprovechar la potencia de su Smartphone.

      Design y simplicidad

      El Mirabook se presenta en forma de un ordenador portatil ultraligero y adaptable, con acabados en aluminio. Con una pantalla alta definición de 13,3 pulgadas, el Mirabook es silencioso y no se sobrecalienta. Su mayor fuerza reside sin duda en su impresionante duración de batería: el Mirabook proporciona 24 horas de uso continuo mientras carga el smartphone.

      La extensión es a la vez fácil de usar y conveniente. Se conecta a través de un puerto USB tipo C y al instante se muestra la pantalla del smartphone al ordenador. El smartphone centralizando todas las aplicaciones y todos los datos, el Mirabook no requiere la sincronización de datos.

      Tu color, tu Mirabook

      私たちのプロジェクトをサポートしてくれてありがとう

      Merci de soutenir notre projet

      Gracias por ayudar a nuestro proyecto

      Thank you for supporting our project

       

      Convergencia y Movilidad

      El Mirabook ahora permite la gestión de datos eficiente e inteligente. Aunque los smartphones ahora ofrecen una mayor capacidad de almacenamiento, a veces llegando a 128 GB, el Mirabook va más allá y ofrece una capacidad de almacenamiento adicional para la absoluta confidencialidad y la movilidad de sus datos. Su peso ligero y la autonomía son del Mirabook una alternativa esencial del PC tradicional para la movilidad perfecta.

      "Todos tenemos la parte inteligente del Mirabook. Esta en su bolsillo, es simplemente su smartphone. Nuestro objetivo es revolucionar el mercado de los PC tradicionales, con la siguiente parcialidad: nuestro smartphone es el único equipo que necesitamos. El mercado de los PC está sufriendo una disminución desde 2012, pero la combinación de un smartphone con la tecnología del Mirabook, obtenemos la siguiente gran innovación que va a remodelar el mercado. Miraxess también tiene otros proyectos en la línea de visión, tales como el desarrollo de nuevas extensiones, siempre basadas en el mismo principio de complementariedad y convergencia. "- Yanis Anteur CEO Miraxess.

       

      Typos de displays

      Los servicios tales como el Samsung Desktop Experience o Oxi, de Auxens ya ofrecen interfaces de typo escritorio. Ahora es posible de ser mas productivos mientras disfruta de sus aplicaciones móviles favoritas. Y con respecto a la a los typos de displays, hay mucha variedad para que usted eliga.

      See Samsung DeX

      See Oxi OS

      See Leena OS

      See Maru OS

      See Remix Singularity

      See Microsoft Continuum

       

        Compatibilidad PC stick

        Conecte su Mirabook a uno de los PC mas pequeños del mercado, para un ordenador instantaneo a muy buen precio.

        Compatibilidad Raspberry Pi

        Conecte su Mirabook a un Raspberry Pi y disfrute del ordenador portatil mas barato del mercado !

        El Mirateam trabaja estrechamente con Mark Chin, un miembro de la comunidad de Raspberry Pi, para crear un módulo USB-C unico en el mundo.

        Mire su trabajo

         

        1er prototypo en video

         

        English

        French

        Portuguese

        Italian

         

        Compatibilidad : Android, Windows Phone, Ubuntu

        A diferencia del mercado de los PC tradicionales, no hay ningún protocolo de video estándar en el smartphone. De todas las diferentes opciones disponibles, Miraxess eligió optar por un protocolo del Smartphone a una pantalla externa a través de la tecnología de SlimPort. La razón es la siguiente: 

        La interfaz USB MHL-C (interfaz de alta definición móvil) es una solución desarrollada por Samsung y Sony. El problema con esta interfaz es que ahora está presente en productos diseñados por Sony, pero no por Samsung, este último pasa por una tecnología SlimPort. 

        HDMI USB-C sería una solución de hardware viable, pero por desgracia, no es presente en los smartphones necesarios.

        DisplayLink es una solución de software que garantiza la compatibilidad de los smartphones mediante la instalación de un controlador a través de una aplicación dedicada. Sin embargo, el compresor del software hace que sea instable y muy hambrienta en materia de poder de procesador. 

        SlimPort es la tecnología que tenemos privilegiada. Esta es una solución de hardware, por lo que es confiable, eficiente, y que hace que sea una solución integrada con frecuencia en los smartphones. Samsung, LG, Microsoft, Acer, HTC son todas marcas que utilizan SlimPort en sus smartphones. Apple también ha utilizado esta solucion en silencio, sin que esta sea muy util por el momento.

         

        Miracast es una solución inalámbrica que deseamos utilizar en el futuro, a pesar de que los precios de produccion aumenten.

         

        El desarrollo de Mirabook nos obligó a tomar decisiones, y es por eso que decidimos centrarnos en el rendimiento más que una compatibilidad universal. Sin embargo, nuestra financiación del proyecto - una vez los $100 000 pasados - incluye el posible desarrollo de un adaptador compatible con la tecnología DisplayLink para que nuestro Mirabook sea accesible a un número cada vez mayor de smartphones. Y una vez que cruzemos los 1,5 millones, el desarrollo de una llave inalámbrica estará al orden del día.

        Hablan de nosotros

         

        Sobre Miraxess

        Todo comenzó con una simple pregunta. ¿Por qué molestarse con una multitud de dispositivos cuando sólo uno sería suficiente? La convergencia móvil es una solución que nos permite hacer dos cosas a la vez: mediante el desarrollo de productos innovadores, también le simplificamos la vida. Por su visión innovadora de la informática y un nuevo enfoque de la movilidad, Miraxess quiere crear una nueva historia con el Smartphone. La joven Start-Up fue fundada en 2015 por Yanis Anteur (CEO) y Paul-Émile René (CTO), más tarde se unió por Julien Guillaud (Director Comercial) y Fabien Pointet (CMO).

         

        Nuestra visión

        Mirabook es sólo el comienzo, ya que con la inminente llegada de la primer revolución móvil, estamos seguros de que pronto vamos a ver el nacimiento de una nueva era. El teléfono inteligente tiene un potencial ilimitado, siempre y cuando se empieze a verlo como el unico ordenador que poseemos. 

        Estamos convencidos de que en el futuro, el smartphone será su principal medio de acceso a Internet. Conectado al Cloud, que albergará sus datos personales y profesionales en el sistema operativo de su elección. 

        El futuro es móvil y el único equipo que necesita ya está en su mano.

         

        _____________________________________________________________________________________

         

        General Overview

        Transforme seu celular em um laptop!


        Em um mundo onde todos os móveis prevalecem, Miraxess tem o orgulho de apresentar o Mirabook, uma extensão que permite transformar seu telefone em um computador real. O Mirabook oferece tela de alta definição, um teclado, um trackpad, uma bateria de duração muito longa e capacidade de armazenamento que irá complementar a memória do seu smartphone. Combinando as capacidades do seu smartphone com as possibilidades dele e o Mirabook, o portátil completo é obtido. Se você já tem um smartphone, você já está a meio passo para ter uma experiência única.

        Numa altura em que o Smartphone é essencial tanto na nossa vida profissional como privada, este a claramente suplantado o laptop tradicional como um fornecedor essencial e principal instrumento de nossas necessidades digitais.  Miraxess reinventa el portátil, centrándose en nuestro PC miniatura y ultra móvil que es el smartphone.

        Nossos smartphones já oferecem muitos recursos. Hoje, um smartphone é um computador real capaz de rivalizar com PC tradicional. Você sabia? Samsung Galaxy S8 é agora mais poderoso do que um MacBook Air air?    

        No alvorecer da próxima revolução digital, Miraxess oferece uma plataforma revolucionária que permite que você aproveite o poder do seu Smartphone.

         

        Design e simplicidade

        O Mirabook está na forma de um ultra-portátil e adaptável, com guarnição de alumínio. Com tela HD de 13,3 polegadas, o Mirabook é silencioso e não sobreaquece. Sua maior força é, sem dúvida, a sua vida útil da bateria impressionante: o Mirabook fornece 24 horas de uso contínuo durante o carregamento do smartphone

        A extensão é ao mesmo tempo fácil de usar e conveniente. Ele se conecta através de um USB typo C e a tela do smartphones é mostrada diretamente no computador. O smartphone centraliza todas as aplicações e todos os dados, o Mirabook não requer sincronização de dados

        A tua cor, teu Mirabook

         

        Download our media kit

         

         Convergencia e Mobilidade

        O Mirabook agora permite uma gestão eficiente de dados inteligentes. Embora smartphones agora oferecem maior capacidade de armazenamento, às vezes chegando a 128 GB, o Mirabook vai mais longe e oferece uma capacidade de armazenamento adicional para absoluta confidencialidade e mobilidade dos seus dados. Seu peso leve e autonomia fazen do Mirabook uma alternativa essencial para o PC tradicional e a mobilidade perfeita.

         

        Typos de displays

        Serviços como Experiência Samsung Desktop ou o Oxi, de Auxens já oferecem interfaces para móveis de typo desktop. É agora possível ser mais produtivo, enquanto desfruta de suas aplicações móveis favoritas..

        Olha Oxi OS
        Olha Leena OS
        Olha Maru OS
        Olha Remix Singularity
        Olha Microsoft Continuum

          Conecte seu Mirabook a um dos PC mas pequenos do mercado, para un computador instantãneo a muito bom preço.

          Compatibilidade Raspberry Pi

          Conecte seu Mirabook a um Raspberry Pi y disfrute do computador portatil mas barato do mercado !

          O Mirateam trabalha diretamente con Mark Chin, um membro da comunidade de Raspberry Pi, para criar um módulo USB-C unico no mundo.

          English

          Compatibilidade : Android, Windows Phone, Ubuntu

          Ao contrário do mercado de PCs tradicionais, não há nenhum protocolo de vídeo padrão no smartphone. De todas as diferentes opções disponíveis, Miraxess escolheu optar por um protocolo de Smartphone a um monitor externo via tecnologia SlimPort.

          They talk about Miraxess

          Sobre Miraxess

          Tudo começou com uma pergunta simple. Por que se preocupar com uma infinidade de dispositivos quando apenas um seria suficiente? Convergência móvel é uma solução que nos permite fazer duas coisas ao mesmo tempo: através do desenvolvimento de produtos inovadores também simplificar a sua vida. Por sua visão inovadora da computação e uma nova abordagem para a mobilidade, Miraxess quer criar uma nova história com o Smartphone. A jovem Start-Up foi fundada em 2015 por Yanis Anteur (CEO) e Paul-Émile René (CTO), mais tarde juntou Julien Guillaud (Diretor Comercial) e Fabien Pointet (CMO).

           

          Nosa visão

          Mirabook é apenas o começo, porque com a chegada iminente da primeira revolução móvel, estamos confiantes de que em breve veremos o nascimento de uma nova era. O smartphone tem um potencial ilimitado, desde que ela começa a vê-lo como o único computador que possuímos.
          Estamos convencidos de que, no futuro, o smartphone será o seu principal meio de acesso à Internet. Conectado ao Cloud, que sediará os seus dados pessoais e profissionais no sistema operacional de sua escolha.
          Miraxess tem esta visão nos corações de todos os seus negócios, por isso criamos uma extensão do Smartphone, que em breve será seguido por muitos outros projetos, como uma extensão da plataforma, um Dock, um sistema de jogo, todos operável desde o smartphone.El futuro es móvil y el único equipo que necesita ya está en su mano.

Order your Mirabook now!Version Française Versión Española Versão Portuguese General OverviewTurn your Smartphone into a LaptopIn a world where mobile has triumphed, Miraxess launches The Mirabook, a true extension to give the smartphone all the capacities of a laptop. A large full HD Display, a keyboard, a touchpad, extra storage and a high capacity battery that instantly create the ultimate laptop - of which you already own halfAs consumers increasingly depend on their smartphone to organize their personal and professional lives, it is becoming evident that the traditional computer has been replaced by the smartphone as the main servant of our digital needs. The PC market and worldwide deliveries keep declining: -5.7% in the 3rd quarter of 2016 and -3.3% for EMEA[1]. This can be explained among others by the emerging markets where People choose Smartphones over PCs.Since its launch, the smartphone has been integrating more and more features. The smartphone is nowadays a real computer with a capacity that truly matches one of a conventional PC. For instance, did you know that the Samsung Galaxy S8 is more powerful than a Macbook air?    To boost the next mobile revolution, Miraxess offers a breakthrough innovation to fully harness the power of your smartphone. Simplicity and design The Mirabook comes in the form of a full-fledged laptop, ultra-lightweight and customizable, with an aluminum finish. With a 13.3  inch display offering and a  1080p resolution, it is quiet and does not heat up. The battery is its greatest asset: it can be used continuously for up to 24 hours while recharging your Smartphone.The extension is both simple to use and practical. It can be plugged in through the smartphone Type-C USB and instantly displays the mobile screen. The Smartphone centralizes all apps and data so there is no longer any need for data synchronization.
