Compatibility: Android, Windows Phone, UbuntuContrary to the old classic PC market, there is no video protocol standard on Smartphone. To better understand the choice we had to make, let's have a look at the different options to display a Smartphone's on an external screen:MHL over USB C: It's a hardware solution founded by both Samsung and Sony. The problem is that it's now present almost only on Sony products because Samsung has switched to SlimPort.HDMI over USB C: It's hardware solution but is currently present in no device at all.DisplayLink: It's a software solution enabling all smartphones to be compatible because you need to install a driver over an app. However, the software compression makes that technology unstable and uses significantly the CPU processing power.SlimPort: This is the native technology we chose. It's a Hardware solution,which implies that it's very reliable, efficient and and it's the most frequently integrated in Mobile devices. Samsung, LG, Microsoft, Acer, HTC are all using Slimport on their smartphones. Apple is also secretly using this technology in their Iphones, but it's not used at the moment.Miracast: This is a wireless solution, and we really hope to use it one day, even though this may incur higher production costs. The Mirabook: We had to make a choice in terms of compatibility and that's why the Mirabook prioritizes the performance over universal compatibility. However, we have the possibility to develop a special cable/adapter working with DisplayLink to reach more Smartphones models, Once the $100K threshold is reached The same will be done for a wireless dongle if we meet our goal of $1,5M.They talk about Miraxess


 
About Miraxess It started with a simple question: "Why do we have so many devices when having only one would be enough." Mobile convergence is the solution to develop innovative products and make life more simple. Miraxess wishes to mark its time with an innovative vision of computing and a new approach to mobility. The young French start-up was founded in 2015 by Yanis Anteur (CEO) and Paul-Emile René (CTO), then joined by Julien Guillaud (Business dev Associate) and Fabien Pointet (CMO).


 Our visionThe Mirabook is just a start, and we anticipate the coming of the Mobile First Revolution. Your Smartphone has so much potential that it becomes the only meaningful computer. We predict that, in the future your Smartphone will be your main internet access point. It will be the client of a connected cloud server for your deported Operating system, your professional software, and your data.Based on this vision, Miraxess is a creator of Smartphone extensions and there are so many revolutionary products we want to launch, such as a tablet extension, a dock or a gaming station, all working with your Smartphone.The future is mobile and the only computer your need is in your pocket. Where do you ship to?Our shipping partner uses multiple couriers for worldwide delivery and we will ship to any place where they deliver.Is shipping included?Unfortunately, Shipping is not included, as we are still currently engaged in talks with 3PL (third-party logistic) companies to provide you the best price. We are building a custom portal for you to keep track of your Mirabook . Once the campaign is finished you will receive a personal login to www.miraxess.com and pay for your shipping there. Approximate shipping cost will be $15 anywhere in Europe, and the USA. Shipping-related costs to other countries will vary depending on your location.Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries.What are the possible issues and challenges?The Mirabook is nearly complete. The final prototypes shown on this page and in the videos were built on our partner ODM's production line. We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan and we are ready to meet the estimated delivery times. However, component delays and unexpected shortages can occur and sometimes forecasts don’t always hit the mark. If this happens, we’ll let you know why and make it right as quickly as possibleWhat are the phone specification requirement to use the mirabook ?The phone must support DisplayPort over USB Type-C(see the list of compatible phones or ask your manufacturer)We plan to develop an adapter to convert DisplayLink to DisplayPort for phones without DisplayPort support.What is DisplayPort™ over USB Type-C?DisplayPort™ over USB Type-C enables the delivery of full DisplayPort A/V performance (driving monitor resolutions of 4K and beyond), SuperSpeed USB (USB 3.1) data and up to 100 watts of power with the convenience of reversible plug orientation and cable direction. DisplayPort™ is the best A/V protocol to be carried over USB Type-C.What happens if I receive a call when my phone is plugged to the Mirabook ?You will be able to pick up the call directly on your mobile phone and on the Mirabook as well.Does the screen of the mirabook stay on when my phone is locked ?It will depend on the OS you are running. For example, with Windows continuum or Samsung Desktop Experience, this function is  included.How do I check the battery level ?You can press the battery level gauge button on the side to see it.Will there be different keyboard layout ?We really want to have international keyboard layouts, but it will depend upon quantity required. We invite you to share the campaign page to your friend so we can reach the minimum order quantity for your keyboard. At first, the QWERTY keyboard will be available.Can I change the brightness of the screen or adjust audio level by using hotkey?Yes_____________________________________________________________________________________
Transformez votre smartphone en ordinateur portable !
Dans un monde où le tout-mobile prévaut, Miraxess est fier de vous présenter le Mirabook, une extension qui vous permettra de transformer votre smartphone en un véritable ordinateur. Le Mirabook vous propose un grand écran en haute définition, un clavier, un pavé tactile, une batterie de très grande autonomie et une capacité de stockage qui viendra compléter la mémoire de votre smartphone. Combinez les capacités de votre smartphone avec les possibilités du Mirabook et vous obtenez l’ordinateur portable ultime. Si vous êtes d’ores et déjà détenteur d’un smartphone, vous êtes déjà à mi-parcours, alors sautez le pas et profitez dès à présent d’une expérience unique ! À une époque où le Smartphone est indispensable, tant dans notre vie professionnelle que privée, celui-ci a clairement supplanté l’ordinateur portable traditionnel en tant qu’instrument incontournable et pourvoyeur principal de nos besoins numériques. Partout, à travers le monde, les ventes de PC et autres produits affiliés sont en baisse : - 5,7% au troisième trimestre de l’année 2016 et - 3,3% dans la zone EMEA. Les raisons d’un tel déclin ? Entre autres, les pays émergents, dont la population tend à privilégier les smartphones plutôt que les PC en tant qu’outil numérique de prédilection.L’extension Mirabook s’inscrit dans ce mouvement naturel qui place le smartphone au cœur de nos activités numériques. Miraxess réinvente l’ordinateur portable en se concentrant sur cet ordinateur miniature et ultra-mobile qu’est le smartphone.Nos smartphones proposent désormais de nombreuses fonctionnalités. De nos jours, un smartphone est un véritable ordinateur, capable de rivaliser avec un PC traditionnel. Le saviez-vous ? Un Samsung Galaxy S8 est désormais plus puissant qu’un MacBook Air:    À l’aube de la prochaine révolution numérique, Miraxess propose une innovation révolutionnaire qui vous permettra d’exploiter pleinement la puissance de votre smartphone.Design et simplicité Le Mirabook se présente sous la forme d’un ordinateur portable ultra-léger et entièrement personnalisable, aux finitions aluminium. Doté d’un écran de 13,3 pouces et de la haute définition, le Mirabook est silencieux et ne surchauffe pas. Sa plus grande force réside certainement dans son autonomie impressionnante : le Mirabook offre 24 heures d’utilisation en continu tout en rechargeant votre smartphone.L’extension est à la fois simple d’utilisation et pratique. Elle se branche via un port USB de type C et permet d’afficher instantanément l’écran du smartphone à l’ordinateur. Le smartphone centralisant toutes les applications et toutes les données, le Mirabook ne nécessite aucune synchronisation de données.

Compatibilité : Android, Windows Phone, UbuntuContrairement au marché PC traditionnel, il n’existe pas de protocole vidéo standard sur smartphone. De toutes les différentes options qui s’offraient à nous, Miraxess a fait le choix d’opter pour un affichage d’écran de smartphone sur un écran externe grâce à la technologie SlimPort. Voici pourquoi : L’interface MHL via USB-C (interface mobile de haute définition) est une solution développée par Samsung et Sony. Le problème de cette interface est qu’elle est désormais présente sur les produits conçus par Sony mais pas par Samsung, ces derniers étant passés à une technologie SlimPort. L’HDMI via USB-C serait une solution hardware viable mais qui n’est malheureusement pas présente sur les appareils requis.DisplayLink est une solution logicielle assurant la compatibilité des smartphones grâce à l’installation d’un pilote via une application dédiée. Cependant, la compression du logiciel rend cette technologie instable et gourmande en matière de puissance de processeur. SlimPort est la technologie native que nous avons privilégiée. C’est une solution hardware, ce qui la rend fiable, efficace, et qui fait d’elle une solution fréquemment intégrée aux smartphones. Samsung, LG, Microsoft, Acer, HTC sont autant de marques utilisant SlimPort pour leurs smartphones. Apple y a également discrètement recours, sans que ce choix soit pour le moment ouvertement utile. Miracast est une solution sans fil que souhaitons pouvoir utiliser à l’avenir, et ce bien qu’elle entraîne des coûts de production accrus. Le développement du Mirabook nous a contraint à faire des choix, et c’est pourquoi nous avons décidé de privilégier la performance plutôt qu’une compatibilité universelle. Toutefois, notre projet de financement – une fois le cap des 100 000 dollars franchi - inclut le développement éventuel d’un adaptateur compatible avec la technologie DisplayLink pour rendre notre Mirabook accessible à un nombre croissant de smartphones. Et une fois le cap des 1,5 millions franchi, c’est cette fois-ci le développement d’un dongle sans fil qui sera à l’ordre du jour.Ils parlent de nous


 
About Miraxess Tout a commencé avec une simple question. Pourquoi s’embarrasser d’une multitude d’appareils alors qu’un seul suffirait ? La convergence mobile est une solution qui nous permet de faire d’une pierre deux coups : en développant des produits innovants, nous nous simplifions également la vie. Par sa vision novatrice de l’informatique et par une nouvelle approche de la mobilité, Miraxess souhaite marquer l’histoire du smartphone de son empreinte. La jeune start-up a été fondée en 2015 par Yanis Anteur (PDG) et Paul-Émile René (Directeur de la technologie), rejoints plus tard par Julien Guillaud (Directeur Commercial) et Fabien Pointet (Directeur Marketing).


 Notre visionMirabook n’est que le début, car, avec l’arrivée prochaine de la Première Révolution mobile, nous sommes convaincus que nous allons bientôt assister à la naissance d’une nouvelle ère. Votre smartphone a un potentiel illimité, pour peu que vous commenciez à le considérer comme le seul ordinateur d’avenir valable. Nous sommes convaincus qu’à l’avenir, votre smartphone sera votre principal moyen d’accès à Internet. Connecté au cloud, il hébergera vos données personnelles et professionnelles sur le système d’exploitation de votre choix. Miraxess place cette vision au cœur de toutes ses entreprises : c’est pourquoi nous avons créé une extension smartphone, qui sera bientôt suivie de bien d’autres projets, tels qu’une extension tablette, un dock, une installation gaming, tous opérables depuis votre smartphone.Le futur est mobile et le seul ordinateur dont vous ayez besoin se trouve d’ores et déjà à portée de main. Où livrez-vous ?Notre entreprise partenaire assure un service de livraison international, nous livrons donc à toute destination couverte par leurs services.Les frais de port sont-ils inclus ?Malheureusement, les frais de port sont supplémentaires car nous sommes toujours en phase de négociations avec des entreprises 3PL (logistique tierce partie) afin de vous garantir le meilleur service possible. Nous développons actuellement un service de suivi qui vous permettra de suivre en temps réel la livraison de votre Mirabook.Dès la fin de la levée de fonds, vous recevrez un identifiant qui vous permettra de vous connecter sur la page www.miraxess.com et de payer vos frais de port directement sur celle-ci. Nos frais de port s’élèvent en moyenne à 15 dollars pour une livraison en Europe ou aux États-Unis. Un autre montant s’appliquera en dehors de cette zone et selon le pays de destination.L’application éventuelle d’une TVA ou de frais de douane selon le pays de destination seront toutes deux à la charge de l’acheteur.Vais-je rencontrer d’éventuels problèmes ou difficultés ?Le Mirabook est entré dans sa phase finale de développement. Les prototypes présentés sur cette page et sur ces vidéos ont été conçus via la chaîne de production de notre original design manufacturer (ODM). Notre plan de production repose sur une estimation solide de la demande et nous sommes prêts à respecter les délais de livraison initialement prévus. Cependant, des retards dans la livraison de composants et autres contretemps indépendants de notre volonté peuvent se produire et retarder de façon impromptue le délai de livraison initialement prévu. En cas d’incident, nous vous communiquerons les raisons d’un éventuel retard et nous nous attacherons à y remédier dans les plus brefs délais.Ai-je besoin d’un équipement spécifique sur mon smartphone pour pouvoir utiliser le Mirabook ?Votre smartphone doit être équipé de l’interface DisplayPort via USB-C. Vous pouvez consulter la liste de smartphones compatibles ou vous adresser, le cas échéant, au producteur concernéNous développerons prochainement un adaptateur qui vous assurera une compatibilité DisplayLink – DisplayPort pour les smartphones ne disposant pas du service DisplayPortDisplayPort™ via USB-C, kézako ?La technologie DisplayPort™ via USB-C permet une interconnexion audio/ vidéo et supporte des résolutions d’écran de 4K et plus. DisplayPort allie la rapidité du service USB SuperSpeed (USB 3.1) à une puissance de 100 watts, tout en offrant tout le confort d’une prise et d’un câble orientables à souhait. DisplayPort est à ce jour le meilleur protocole audio/ vidéo disponible via USB-C.Que se passe-t-il si je reçois un appel sur mon smartphone pendant que j’utilise le Mirabook ?Vous aurez le choix de décrocher directement sur votre smartphone ou depuis le Mirabook.L’écran du Mirabook restera-t-il allumé si je verrouille mon smartphone ?Tout dépend de votre système d’exploitation. Cela sera possible avec, entre autres, Windows Continuum et Samsung Desktop Experience car ils assurent notamment ce service.Comment puis-je vérifier le niveau de charge de la batterie ?Le Mirabook vous permet de vérifier à tout moment quel est votre niveau de charge restant grâce à un bouton dédié, sur le côté.Aurais-je une disposition de touches de clavier différente en passant sur le Mirabook ?Assurer la disponibilité des claviers les plus internationalement répandus est au cœur de nos préoccupations. Nous vous invitons à partager notre page de campagne avec vos amis pour atteindre le palier de commandes qui déclenchera la disponibilité de votre Mirabook avec la disposition de clavier de votre choix. Pour le moment, seul le clavier QWERTY est disponible. Le Mirabook sera-t-il équipé d’une touche permettant de régler la luminosité ou le niveau de volume ?Oui._____________________________________________________________________________________Convierte tu teléfono en un ordenador portátil!En un mundo donde prevalecen todos los móviles, Miraxess se enorgullece en presentar el Mirabook, una extensión que le permite convertir tu teléfono en un ordenador real. El Mirabook ofrece una gran pantalla de alta definición, un teclado, un trackpad, una batería de muy larga duración y capacidad de almacenamiento que complementará la memoria de su smartphone. Combinar las capacidades de su smartphone con las posibilidades del Mirabook y se obtiene el portátil definitivo. Si usted ya tiene un smartphone, ya se encuentra a medio camino, aga el paso y aproveche de una experiencia única. En un momento en el que el Smartphone es esencial tanto en nuestra vida profesional y privada, este ah suplantado claramente el portátil tradicional como proveedor esencial y principal instrumento de nuestras necesidades digitales. En todas partes del mundo, las ventas de ordenadores personales y otros productos de afiliados están bajando - 5,7% en el tercer trimestre de 2016 y - 3,3% en EMEA. Las razones una tal disminución ? Entre otros, los países emergentes, cuya población tiende a concentrarse en los smartphones como herramienta digital principal.La extensión Mirabook hace parte de este movimiento natural que coloca el smartphone en el corazón de nuestras actividades digitales. Miraxess reinventa el portátil, centrándose en nuestro PC miniatura y ultra móvil que es el smartphone.Nuestros smartphones ahora ofrecen muchas características. Hoy en día, un smartphone es un ordenador real capaz de rivalizar con PC tradicional. Sabías ? Un Galaxy S8 Samsung es ahora más potente que un MacBook Air:   En el amanecer de la próxima revolución digital, Miraxess ofrece una innovación revolucionaria que le permite aprovechar la potencia de su Smartphone.Design y simplicidadEl Mirabook se presenta en forma de un ordenador portatil ultraligero y adaptable, con acabados en aluminio. Compatibilidad : Android, Windows Phone, UbuntuA diferencia del mercado de los PC tradicionales, no hay ningún protocolo de video estándar en el smartphone. De todas las diferentes opciones disponibles, Miraxess eligió optar por un protocolo del Smartphone a una pantalla externa a través de la tecnología de SlimPort. La razón es la siguiente: La interfaz USB MHL-C (interfaz de alta definición móvil) es una solución desarrollada por Samsung y Sony. El problema con esta interfaz es que ahora está presente en productos diseñados por Sony, pero no por Samsung, este último pasa por una tecnología SlimPort. HDMI USB-C sería una solución de hardware viable, pero por desgracia, no es presente en los smartphones necesarios.DisplayLink es una solución de software que garantiza la compatibilidad de los smartphones mediante la instalación de un controlador a través de una aplicación dedicada. Sin embargo, el compresor del software hace que sea instable y muy hambrienta en materia de poder de procesador. SlimPort es la tecnología que tenemos privilegiada. Esta es una solución de hardware, por lo que es confiable, eficiente, y que hace que sea una solución integrada con frecuencia en los smartphones. Samsung, LG, Microsoft, Acer, HTC son todas marcas que utilizan SlimPort en sus smartphones. Apple también ha utilizado esta solucion en silencio, sin que esta sea muy util por el momento. Miracast es una solución inalámbrica que deseamos utilizar en el futuro, a pesar de que los precios de produccion aumenten. El desarrollo de Mirabook nos obligó a tomar decisiones, y es por eso que decidimos centrarnos en el rendimiento más que una compatibilidad universal. Sin embargo, nuestra financiación del proyecto - una vez los $100 000 pasados - incluye el posible desarrollo de un adaptador compatible con la tecnología DisplayLink para que nuestro Mirabook sea accesible a un número cada vez mayor de smartphones. Y una vez que cruzemos los 1,5 millones, el desarrollo de una llave inalámbrica estará al orden del día.Hablan de nosotros


 
Sobre MiraxessTodo comenzó con una simple pregunta. ¿Por qué molestarse con una multitud de dispositivos cuando sólo uno sería suficiente? La convergencia móvil es una solución que nos permite hacer dos cosas a la vez: mediante el desarrollo de productos innovadores, también le simplificamos la vida. Por su visión innovadora de la informática y un nuevo enfoque de la movilidad, Miraxess quiere crear una nueva historia con el Smartphone. La joven Start-Up fue fundada en 2015 por Yanis Anteur (CEO) y Paul-Émile René (CTO), más tarde se unió por Julien Guillaud (Director Comercial) y Fabien Pointet (CMO).


 Nuestra visiónMirabook es sólo el comienzo, ya que con la inminente llegada de la primer revolución móvil, estamos seguros de que pronto vamos a ver el nacimiento de una nueva era. El teléfono inteligente tiene un potencial ilimitado, siempre y cuando se empieze a verlo como el unico ordenador que poseemos. Estamos convencidos de que en el futuro, el smartphone será su principal medio de acceso a Internet. Conectado al Cloud, que albergará sus datos personales y profesionales en el sistema operativo de su elección. El futuro es móvil y el único equipo que necesita ya está en su mano. _____________________________________________________________________________________ General OverviewTransforme seu celular em um laptop!Em um mundo onde todos os móveis prevalecem, Miraxess tem o orgulho de apresentar o Mirabook, uma extensão que permite transformar seu telefone em um computador real. O Mirabook oferece tela de alta definição, um teclado, um trackpad, uma bateria de duração muito longa e capacidade de armazenamento que irá complementar a memória do seu smartphone. Combinando as capacidades do seu smartphone com as possibilidades dele e o Mirabook, o portátil completo é obtido. Se você já tem um smartphone, você já está a meio passo para ter uma experiência única.Numa altura em que o Smartphone é essencial tanto na nossa vida profissional como privada, este a claramente suplantado o laptop tradicional como um fornecedor essencial e principal instrumento de nossas necessidades digitais.  Miraxess reinventa el portátil, centrándose en nuestro PC miniatura y ultra móvil que es el smartphone. Nossos smartphones já oferecem muitos recursos. Hoje, um smartphone é um computador real capaz de rivalizar com PC tradicional. Você sabia? Samsung Galaxy S8 é agora mais poderoso do que um MacBook Air air?    No alvorecer da próxima revolução digital, Miraxess oferece uma plataforma revolucionária que permite que você aproveite o poder do seu Smartphone. Design e simplicidadeO Mirabook está na forma de um ultra-portátil e adaptável, com guarnição de alumínio. Com tela HD de 13,3 polegadas, o Mirabook é silencioso e não sobreaquece. Sua maior força é, sem dúvida, a sua vida útil da bateria impressionante: o Mirabook fornece 24 horas de uso contínuo durante o carregamento do smartphoneA extensão é ao mesmo tempo fácil de usar e conveniente. Ele se conecta através de um USB typo C e a tela do smartphones é mostrada diretamente no computador. O smartphone centraliza todas as aplicações e todos os dados, o Mirabook não requer sincronização de dados

A tua cor, teu Mirabook

 
Download our media kit
  Convergencia e MobilidadeO Mirabook agora permite uma gestão eficiente de dados inteligentes. Embora smartphones agora oferecem maior capacidade de armazenamento, às vezes chegando a 128 GB, o Mirabook vai mais longe e oferece uma capacidade de armazenamento adicional para absoluta confidencialidade e mobilidade dos seus dados. Seu peso leve e autonomia fazen do Mirabook uma alternativa essencial para o PC tradicional e a mobilidade perfeita. 
Typos de displays
Serviços como Experiência Samsung Desktop ou o Oxi, de Auxens já oferecem interfaces para móveis de typo desktop. É agora possível ser mais produtivo, enquanto desfruta de suas aplicações móveis favoritas..
Olha Samsung DeXOlha Oxi OSOlha Leena OSOlha Maru OSOlha Remix SingularityOlha Microsoft Continuum
 
Compatibilidade PC stickConecte seu Mirabook a um dos PC mas pequenos do mercado, para un computador instantãneo a muito bom preço.Compatibilidade Raspberry PiConecte seu Mirabook a um Raspberry Pi y disfrute do computador portatil mas barato do mercado !O Mirateam trabalha diretamente con Mark Chin, um membro da comunidade de Raspberry Pi, para criar um módulo USB-C unico no mundo.Take a look at his work   

1st prototype Video reviewsEnglish

 
Portuguese

 
Compatibilidade : Android, Windows Phone, UbuntuAo contrário do mercado de PCs tradicionais, não há nenhum protocolo de vídeo padrão no smartphone. De todas as diferentes opções disponíveis, Miraxess escolheu optar por um protocolo de Smartphone a um monitor externo via tecnologia SlimPort.They talk about Miraxess


Sobre Miraxess Tudo começou com uma pergunta simple. Por que se preocupar com uma infinidade de dispositivos quando apenas um seria suficiente? Convergência móvel é uma solução que nos permite fazer duas coisas ao mesmo tempo: através do desenvolvimento de produtos inovadores também simplificar a sua vida. Por sua visão inovadora da computação e uma nova abordagem para a mobilidade, Miraxess quer criar uma nova história com o Smartphone. A jovem Start-Up foi fundada em 2015 por Yanis Anteur (CEO) e Paul-Émile René (CTO), mais tarde juntou Julien Guillaud (Diretor Comercial) e Fabien Pointet (CMO).


 Nosa visãoMirabook é apenas o começo, porque com a chegada iminente da primeira revolução móvel, estamos confiantes de que em breve veremos o nascimento de uma nova era. O smartphone tem um potencial ilimitado, desde que ela começa a vê-lo como o único computador que possuímos.Estamos convencidos de que, no futuro, o smartphone será o seu principal meio de acesso à Internet. Conectado ao Cloud, que sediará os seus dados pessoais e profissionais no sistema operacional de sua escolha.Miraxess tem esta visão nos corações de todos os seus negócios, por isso criamos uma extensão do Smartphone, que em breve será seguido por muitos outros projetos, como uma extensão da plataforma, um Dock, um sistema de jogo, todos operável desde o smartphone.El futuro es móvil y el único equipo que necesita ya está en su mano.

story:
Do you feel inspired by the Bible and love creating art and journaling inside it? 
Do you wish you could do more than highlighting when reading the Bible on your iPad?
Now you can!

The Bible for Creatives iPadOS App gives you full creative access to your own personal Bible.
Take your Bible everywhere you go and create art, let your creativity flow with journaling, or just make notes. All you need is an iPad and a stylus like the Apple pencil - and the Bible for Creatives app.

This is the Bible for Creatives!

 

Hi Indiegogo, my name is Erin Walker. I am a family man, entrepreneur, and Jesus follower.
Here is my Bible for Creatives story.

One early morning in December 2019 (around Christmas time) I was doing Bible study on my iPad. I was feeling frustrated by the creative limitations and options of the current Bible apps available (there are some great apps and they do many things really well, but you can't draw, write or be creative in any way).
I love the iPad and use the Apple Pencil, but for Bible study on the iPad, it is nothing more than a highlighter. Plus the kids kept on taking my notebooks and pencil off the table so it was always a search for the pens and supplies before Bibel Study time.
As a parent, we have little free time so we need to make every second count.  
I myself am an intermediate designer at best, but I always had a passion for designing and being creative. This was my final "aha" moment. An idea was born. 

I had this idea (I believe it was a divine inspiration) for a Bible app, unlike all the other Bible apps.
I wanted to create a Bible app with a full creative suite of tools and enough white space for creative freedom and to journal to your heart's content. All you need is an iPad and a stylus (like the Apple Pencil). 

For the next five months, we worked with an amazing design company to create the most minimal and cleanest Bible app ever, with the right tools to give you full creative authority with your Bible. On the iPad. This is the Bible for Creatives app.

We have an amazing minimal viable product and need your help to raise $8000 for the developers to complete coding the app for the iPad. It is that simple.
This product is as much for me as it is for a large community of creative Bible readers who want more from their electronic Bible.
Please support us and be part of something special.

There are many Bible apps on the market. There is no app like the Bible for creatives though. The Bible for creatives solves two distinct problems:

Regular Bible journalers and creative people have a genuine lack of mobility when it comes to Bible journaling and being creative on their regular Bible. Just ask my wife :) When the kids want to play outside you can't take all your creative tools along with you. It's just too much of a hassle.

 

The Bible for Creatives iPad app brings great design, simplicity, and mobility to Bible journaling on the iPad.

The other problem we want to solve is for a group of regular Bible readers who use their iPad Bible for normal day to day Bible reading. This second group of people is frustrated with the lack of creativity and note-taking options on current Bible apps. Here the Bible for Creatives comes in very handy.

 

Not sure what Bible journaling is? Nathan from Lifeway.com explains it perfectly:

"Bible journaling is an exciting way to engage with Scripture. It can transform the way you spend time in the Word and it all begins within the margins of the Bible. With Bible journaling, you will find a creative and fresh approach to the age-old discipline of Bible reading. With pen in hand, you can visually capture Scripture, meditate on God's Word, and memorize the text. Some choose to journal as an expression of private devotion, others journal as an act of worship and there are even some who consider it a creative outlet that can be shared.  No matter what your purpose for Bible journaling, the beauty of the movement is this: it doesn’t require a skilled artist. All that matters is that you’re willing to experience God and His Word in a creative way."

 

We want to give people full creative access & freedom to their Bibles - on a simple mobile solution. 

Reading the Bible is not just about how many chapters you read per day (quantity) but also how much time you spent on a few scriptures (quality). The more you focus and meditate on a few scriptures a day the better you understand, remember, and grasp the depth of God's word.
The Bible for Creatives helps with this as you spent more time analyzing and understanding every word when you pair it with our suite of creative tools.

 

 

The Bible for Creatives is not like any other Bible app you have experienced before. We designed this app from the ground up starting with a simple blank wireframe.  Then we added the functions we needed for the perfect Bible app one by one. Simplicity was an important theme. That and enough white space to apply your art, notes and creativity in the space around and next to scriptures. We needed to do this without loosing any of the normal experience of reading and accessing scriptures in your favourite translations. Everything had to be excellent and world class.

 

The Bible for Creatives is so simple to use! You can customize your Bible design by folowing a few simple steps. The first thing you can do when you create a new Bible with our app is to choose the amount of white space you need that suites you're creative needs.

This starts with the amount of drawing space (the space between the border and the text). Also choose if you like your text to be in centre or either side. 

Then you choose the amount of line space you want between each line of text. The more the line space - the more you can write and draw.

Once you are happy with the drawing and line spacing choose your favourite font and font size.

The font size also influences how much usable white space you have.

Do you like to read vertically with endless scrolling or more like a traditional book? Select an option!

We designed the app with an industrial dark mode and elegant light mode - whatever suits your style.

Finally, choose your favourite translation (We are working on adding all the translations available).

Now, you are ready to draw, write, paint, highlight, and do almost whatever you want. Your imagination is the only limit.

We included extra art tools like shapes, a ruler, cut & paste options as well as importing images.

If you need support lines, choose between different backgrounds including grid, lines, and dots.

Another cool feature is you can save any verse to customized folders for prayers, declarations or simply studying them later on. It's so simple.

 

You can create as many Bibles as you want with each customized to your liking.



Instagram much? Easily share any section on-screen to social media.

Double-tap your pencil and activate the read-only mode. Distraction-free reading with minimal clutter and normal functions like copying & pasting verses. 

As with all Bible apps, you can search for keywords anywhere in the Bible including your notes.

The Bible for Creatives has a ton of customizations to find you're perfect white space match :)

You see! That was super easy.

We are actively refining the Bible for Creatives design with new innovations. As our community grows we will use your feedback to make the app even better. We know we could never make the perfect app, but we strive to come as close as possible :)

See our planned timeline below:

 

Our initial target is an $8000 minimum to complete development of the app. The funds will go 100% into the development & coding of the app for iPadOS. 

If we do not reach our humble target of $8000 we will have to seek other forms of finance to complete development which might set us back a year or two. If you believe in the Bible for Creatives APP please support our campaign. We have some wonderful rewards up for grabs. Just check the list on the right of your screen.

 

The Bible for Creatives is being built by world-class designers and coders who understand the heart of the project.

 

For most of the design, the founder, Erin Walker (who is very passionate about design) worked with Pepperplane (pepperplane.com).

      

Pepperplane is a design studio piloted by sisters, Marié Whittington and Annette Schuman. They have partnered with clients from around the globe to create original and inspiring design solutions including Deloitte and IBM.

      

The back-end coding is being done in Apple's Swift language by Byron Rode. He runs his own Mac OS and iOS Development Agency and is Head of Technology at The Formery. Byron was previously an iOS Engineer at Over an Apple award-winning design app (madewithover.com).

Erin Walker (erinwalker.me) - the founder of the Bible for Creatives is a very happy husband and dad, managing a large family business and dabbling in many side projects via his seed company Launchround. Erin passionately loves flying in various forms from real airplanes to RC planes on the weekends. He wants to live his life on earth as close to God's heart as possible.

 

We believe the Bible for Creatives will benefit any Christian who wants to delve deeper into God's word. Everyone experiences reading the Bible differently as everyone is uniquely made. The Bible for Creatives just makes it easier to be yourself when studying the Bible. Even if you just highlight and write small notes (you don't have to be an illustrator) this app makes it possible! This is the thing that makes us really excited. We want everyone to experience God on a deeper level. 

 

The thing with risks is if you don’t ever take one, you’ll never know what could have been. This project is certainly a risk in regard to our time and energy, but we believe it’s one well-worth taking. We have already sorted large part of the design, concept, translations, and kinks because this is a project we are very passionate about. If we don’t meet our minimum raise our backers will not be charged and it will be next-to-impossible to launch in 2020. We would then seek alternative financing and launch as soon as 2021.

The challenges surrounding any project like this are always larger than originally perceived. We want to deliver a high-quality award-winning application that will change Christian's lives and make Bible study even more enjoyable. Because our team is small we don’t have access to unlimited resources to pour into this project, so setbacks are possible. From API and OS changes to late-surfacing bugs and the complexities of managing many Bible translations, patience may be required :)

If you can't contribute - don't worry! There are many ways you can help us :)

  • Please share this Indiegogo campaign with all your friends on Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.
  • Follow us on Facebook/thebibleforcreatives, Twitter/thebibleforcreatives, or Instagram/the_bible_for_creatives. Take part, comment, and leave us some feedback on your own ideas for a creative Bible for the iPad.

We would just like to thank you for supporting us with your time. May 2020 bring more blessings than you ever thought possible.

story:
The NANOBOOK is Back—and Stronger than Ever

We rolled out the NANOBOOK 1.0 & 2.0 to the world in 2019. Today, we’re excited to reveal a new Limited Edition to the NANOBOOK family:

METEOR CRATER  EDITION

The new NANOBOOK 3.0 takes one small step, and one giant leap, with the Meteor Crater Edition.

We took everything you loved about the NANOBOOK and gave it a fresh, new look. It’s crisper, sharper, and with an extra-terrestrial Lunar Surface cover finish that’s made to last anywhere you take it. Why the Lunar Surface? We wanted to create a new cover design that was both rugged and eye-catching. Something that stood out and took our backers’ feedback into account.

With solid titanium construction and its signature stone paper, the new NANOBOOK 3.0 really is out of this world.

 

Waterproof and Greaseproof

 

Here’s the NANOBOOK 3.0 - Meteor Crater Edition in a nutshell:

  • Designed to be small enough to fit comfortably in your hand when you’re outdoors—wherever that might take you.
  • Built from stone paper and Grade 5 titanium, this next-generation notepad is made from non-organic materials, and zero trees were harmed in its production.
  • One paper for any type of weather. The NANOBOOK will survive sweat, rain, mud, snow, oil, grease, and the wear-and-tear of daily use.
  • No pen? No problem. You can write on stone paper with any pointed object you might have on hand—even your keys.

 

The combination of titanium alloy with stone paper has a flame retardant effect, especially when the NANOBOOK is closed. The stone paper alone will burn eventually, but it’s far more resilient than regular paper, meaning you have more time to put it out and save your writing. The titanium cover is fire-resistant and will protect the notes inside.

 

Lunar Surface Cover​

 

 

Our robust, waterproof stone paper goes hand in hand with the new and durable Grade 5 titanium Meteor Crater cover. Whether you spill your coffee, run over it with your car, or it just gets exposed to everyday wear-and-tear, the legendary strength of the featherlight titanium in the new NANOBOOK will withstand all the obstacles that life throws at you.

 

 

Stone paper is a revolutionary new medium whose composition is owed more to stone than organic material. Its production process creates a product that’s 100% tree-free, water-free, acid-free, bleach-free, and produces zero waste.

Better still, stone paper is much stronger and resilient than regular paper. Stretch it. Crumple it. Crush it. Burn it. Stone paper can take it.

 

 

 

We made it our mission to create a notepad that you can carry and write on, wherever you are.

NANOBOOK is small enough that you can easily hold it in one hand, which means it can be used in any circumstance, regardless of what Mother Nature throws in your path. It can cope with all kinds of writing outdoors, even when you don’t have access to a table or a stable surface to write on.

 

 

 

NANOBOOK has a tremendous feature: you can write on it with any pointed object. So the edge of a coin, most keys, rocks, sticks, knives, even the end of your shoelace. This means you can quickly and easily make essential notes in a tight spot, even when you don’t have access to a pen.

 

Using Any Pen

Use Anything As a Pen​

 

 

The refillable system is perfectly designed so you never run out of space. Simply take out the old paper, clip in your choice of new inner refill pads, and you’ve got a new NANOBOOK ready to go.

 

Easy to Add or Remove Pages​​

 

 

NANOBOOK Classic: Measuring just 2 x 3 inches, our smaller size is ideal for taking notes on the go when you have limited space. The titanium and stone paper design is strong enough to hold in one hand while writing with the other.

NANOBOOK Plus: Roughly the size of your smartphone, the NANOBOOK Plus size is ready for wherever your next trip takes you. Measuring 3 x 5 inches, it gives you more room for your notes. It’s functional and durable, yet small enough to slip in your pocket while you go mountain biking or to store in your backpack when on your next hike.

 

 

 

 Choose from BLANK, SQUARED or DOTTED GRID paper—whichever suits your note style best.

 

 

 

We’ve been working together with our trusted manufacturer for a long time now, so we know that they’re able to deliver a superior product. With utmost efficiency and stringent quality gates along each step of the way, we’re confident to fulfil this project and deliver your rewards on Mar 2021, as promised.
story_txt:
The NANOBOOK is Back—and Stronger than EverWe rolled out the NANOBOOK 1.0 & 2.0 to the world in 2019. Today, we’re excited to reveal a new Limited Edition to the NANOBOOK family:METEOR CRATER  EDITIONThe new NANOBOOK 3.0 takes one small step, and one giant leap, with the Meteor Crater Edition.We took everything you loved about the NANOBOOK and gave it a fresh, new look. It’s crisper, sharper, and with an extra-terrestrial Lunar Surface cover finish that’s made to last anywhere you take it. Why the Lunar Surface? We wanted to create a new cover design that was both rugged and eye-catching. Something that stood out and took our backers’ feedback into account.With solid titanium construction and its signature stone paper, the new NANOBOOK 3.0 really is out of this world. Waterproof and Greaseproof Here’s the NANOBOOK 3.0 - Meteor Crater Edition in a nutshell:
Designed to be small enough to fit comfortably in your hand when you’re outdoors—wherever that might take you.
Built from stone paper and Grade 5 titanium, this next-generation notepad is made from non-organic materials, and zero trees were harmed in its production.
One paper for any type of weather. The NANOBOOK will survive sweat, rain, mud, snow, oil, grease, and the wear-and-tear of daily use.
No pen? No problem. You can write on stone paper with any pointed object you might have on hand—even your keys.
 The combination of titanium alloy with stone paper has a flame retardant effect, especially when the NANOBOOK is closed. The stone paper alone will burn eventually, but it’s far more resilient than regular paper, meaning you have more time to put it out and save your writing. The titanium cover is fire-resistant and will protect the notes inside. Lunar Surface Cover​  Our robust, waterproof stone paper goes hand in hand with the new and durable Grade 5 titanium Meteor Crater cover. Whether you spill your coffee, run over it with your car, or it just gets exposed to everyday wear-and-tear, the legendary strength of the featherlight titanium in the new NANOBOOK will withstand all the obstacles that life throws at you.  Stone paper is a revolutionary new medium whose composition is owed more to stone than organic material. Its production process creates a product that’s 100% tree-free, water-free, acid-free, bleach-free, and produces zero waste.Better still, stone paper is much stronger and resilient than regular paper. Stretch it. Crumple it. Crush it. Burn it. Stone paper can take it.   We made it our mission to create a notepad that you can carry and write on, wherever you are.NANOBOOK is small enough that you can easily hold it in one hand, which means it can be used in any circumstance, regardless of what Mother Nature throws in your path. It can cope with all kinds of writing outdoors, even when you don’t have access to a table or a stable surface to write on.   NANOBOOK has a tremendous feature: you can write on it with any pointed object. So the edge of a coin, most keys, rocks, sticks, knives, even the end of your shoelace. This means you can quickly and easily make essential notes in a tight spot, even when you don’t have access to a pen. Using Any PenUse Anything As a Pen​  The refillable system is perfectly designed so you never run out of space. Simply take out the old paper, clip in your choice of new inner refill pads, and you’ve got a new NANOBOOK ready to go. Easy to Add or Remove Pages​​  NANOBOOK Classic: Measuring just 2 x 3 inches, our smaller size is ideal for taking notes on the go when you have limited space. The titanium and stone paper design is strong enough to hold in one hand while writing with the other.NANOBOOK Plus: Roughly the size of your smartphone, the NANOBOOK Plus size is ready for wherever your next trip takes you. Measuring 3 x 5 inches, it gives you more room for your notes. It’s functional and durable, yet small enough to slip in your pocket while you go mountain biking or to store in your backpack when on your next hike.    Choose from BLANK, SQUARED or DOTTED GRID paper—whichever suits your note style best.   We’ve been working together with our trusted manufacturer for a long time now, so we know that they’re able to deliver a superior product. With utmost efficiency and stringent quality gates along each step of the way, we’re confident to fulfil this project and deliver your rewards on Mar 2021, as promised.

story:
Here is Nanobook, in a nutshell:

  • Designed to be small enough to fit comfortably in your hand (8cm x 5cm) when you’re outdoors.
  • Nanobook made from stone, not trees. This next-generation material is non-organic and zero trees were harmed in its production.
  • Any weather, one paper. Will survive sweat, rain, mud, snow, oil, grease, and the wear-and-tear of daily use.  
  • Any pen, even your key. Can use Several Means to write on Stone paper, even your key in case there is no pen on hand. 

Nanobook revolutionized taking notes in challenging conditions.

Nanobook is small enough that it can be grasped in one hand, meaning that it can be used in all circumstances, regardless of what Mother Nature throws in your path. It can cope with all kinds of writing outdoors, even when you don’t have access to a table or another platform to write on. We made it our mission to create a notebook that you can carry and write on, wherever you are.  

 

Nanobook is small enough that it can be grasped in one hand, meaning that it can be used in all circumstances, regardless of what Mother Nature throws in your path. It can cope with all kinds of writing outdoors, even when you don’t have access to a table or another platform to write on. We made it our mission to create a notebook that you can carry and write on, wherever you are.  

The world‘s smallest notebook.

Tear resistant.

100% Waterproof.

 

Stone paper is a revolutionary new medium whose composition owes more to stone than organic material. The result is a Tree-free brilliant white paper which is as easy to use as normal paper, but has many more substantial benefits. 

Environmentally safe and eco-friendly.

Don’t compromise between quality and sustainability.

 

Nanobook has a tremendous feature: it can be written on with coins, most keys and even using a tip of a bullet. This means you can take your important notes in a tight spot easily and quickly even without a pen. 

When writing on stone paper there are no limitations and it can absorb almost all ink types like regular paper.  

 

Regardless of the terrain you’re tackling, or the weather conditions you’re experiencing, Nanobook’s durable technology will cater to all of your note-taking needs.   

 

Measuring just 8 cm x 5 cm, It's the ideal size for taking notes on the go and strong enough to hold in one hand while writing with the other. One Nanobook=100 pages/50 sheets

Nanobook can be taken ANYWHERE.

 

Our team with a passion for designing creative projects. We are dedicated to finding new and fresh ways to bring exciting functional products to market. It is our mission to invent products which enrich our lives and make life easier for everyone.

Thank you for reading our proposal and if you share our passion, please remember to share our project.

story: Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.
story_txt: Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for eCommerce start-ups.

story:
How it all started..

When I started my first business (web design) in 2011, I wanted to shut it down.  I was stressed and couldn't cope.  But it wasn't the work that will killing me, it was the stress of the admin - documenting contracts, sending emails, preparing invoices, collecting payments and tracking everything else that needed to be done.  So I was either going to solve the problem or shut down the business.

But I did not shut it down.

I decided to create a tool that can help me manage it all.  This is how the idea of My Centre Office was born, called MyCo for short.

MyCo makes the life of every solopreneur/business owner easier when it comes to managing a business.  And if you run a charity or non-profit initiative of some sort, MyCo is a dream come true too.

I designed MyCo to be an all-in-one solution that can handle it all, and we've already launched our beta version which includues customer management, email marketing, SMS marketing, appointment booking, invoicing, contract management, payments collection and collection of customer reviews.  This is easier than using many apps to do different things.  MyCo gives you many things in one. 

For NGOs and charities, it helps manage stakeholders (volunteers, sponsors, donors, partners), helping you to keep a complete database of your stakeholders and automate email campaigns that keep stakeholders updated on your projects.  The result is that it helps you build better relationships with your stakeholders and get more support.

Can you see how our tool helps businesses and non-profit organisations?

But we can't do it alone.  Although we've launched, we would love the support of the community to help us raise some funds which we will use to:

1) Develop the solution further

2) Grant discounted access to small businesses so they can use it to operate and grow their businesses

3) Grant FREE access to some selected new/growing charity organisations so they can use it to operate their charity activities.

A donation as low as £10 goes a long way, and if you want to use it for your personal business, we would love to give you 1 year access for only £29.

Thank you so much.

story:
With all of today’s essential electronics, most desktops are a tangled mess of cords, complicated adapters, storage gadgets, phone chargers, and other device accessories. We asked ourselves… what if we build a product that combines them all in one elegant, effective solution?

 

Introducing Fophie, a reinvented desktop partner. It’s a 7-in-1 USB-C hub that includes every port you’ll need in your daily life, and a convertible phone stand that provides up to 15W ultra-fast Qi wireless charging. Its versatility gives you a hand to get things done in an efficient and easy way.

 

 

The answer to that question is Fophie. It transforms a single USB-C port into 7 useful connections, including 4K HDMI, MicroSD, SD, 2 * USB 3.1, and USB-C power delivery & data transfer along with a 15W Qi wireless phone charger. Fophie takes care of all power needs, lets you make multiple simultaneous connections and cleans up your desktop!

 

For the ultimate in versatility, we created two versions, Fophie is equipped with a USB-C for Power Delivery and a USB-C for Data Transfer, while Fophie Pro is equipped with two USB-C Dual Role Port (both Power Delivery and Data Transfer).

 

  •  Compatible With Multiple Devices 

Laptop, monitor, hard drive, flash disk, sd card, even Switch, and more

 

Wireless charging is becoming the standard for flagship smartphones so Fophie utilizes the latest Qi wireless charging protocol that supports up to 15W ultra-high speed charging to juice your phone up fast without the need to carry an extra cable.

 

Wirelessly charge your phone flat or while upright, in landscape or portrait mode with a convertible phone stand that keeps your phone at the perfect angle for viewing, swiping, or taking calls. Fophie charges reliably in all positions with 3 built-in wireless charging coils to ensure that there are no charging blind spots. 

 

 

 

  •  Connect your laptop to Fophie using any USB-C port. 

 

Get centralized! With Fophie, a single USB-C port becomes the central hub for all your power and data transfer needs. It adds practicality to your MacBook or PC by seamlessly connecting all your peripherals instantly with every port you will ever need including 4K HDMI, MicroSD, SD, and dual USB 3.1 ports using a single USB-C.

 

  •  Thanks to the foldable and lightweight design, Fophie is ideal for on-the-go work. 

Fophie is a powerful desktop central connection hub but its compact design and portability make it just as good on-the-go. Take it with you wherever your busy day takes you for meetings and business travel. It adds power to presentations and efficiency to applications that benefit from dual monitors and fast data transfer.

 

 

  • Fophie also connects your Switch to a big screen for a better gaming experience.

 

Don’t settle for less when using handheld gaming platforms. Take Fophie along and supersize your Nintendo Switch output for big screen gaming at home or on the go. Elevate your gaming experience and level up fast. 

 

 

  • A Perfect Desktop Organizer

 

Say goodbye to tangled cables and messy desktops. Fophie immediately clears your desktop of redundant cords, cables and adapters so that you can work and think more clearly. Get organized, streamline your workflow and get more done with Fophie.

 

  •  Sleek & Compact Design 

Small yet powerful! Fophie is smaller than a typical smartphone and gives you unlimited versatility in a sleek, compact, modern design that fits in any pocket for go-anywhere convenience.

 

Since 2014, YOOTECH has been a worldwide leader in wireless charging. Our mission is to provide the best wireless power solutions that improve the experience for our users. Yootech wireless chargers are intuitive and easy to use and we are devoted to continually innovate with stylish, high-quality, and affordable products for everyone.

story:
Maotoam is more than just a hub. Its innovative design turns your laptop into a full-featured workstation. It can be adjusted to any angle to reduce screen glare, improve typing ergonomics while providing connectivity and data transfer for all your essential devices.

 

 

 

How can Maotoam’s quadruple-monitor display benefit you? Multiple displays add convenience and efficiency for information research, document editing, presentations, and viewing multiple web-pages simultaneously. With Maotoam, your workflow is enhanced.

Maotoam supports high-resolution output up to 4k@60hz. 4k high-definition monitors provide significantly more detail for programming, video editing, design work, and more. And the 60Hz refresh rate delivers users a more stable visual experience that achieves extreme visual fidelity. 

Maotoam can deliver a massive 100W of total power, which is more than enough to charge a laptop and refill your phone at blazing fast speeds with the 18W PD output. It’s bidirectional, which means connected devices can both send and receive power – at the same time, to top it all off. Maotoam also lets you charge up to 5 connected devices simultaneously. 

Maotoam is widely compatible with the USB 3.2 Gen2, USB4, Thunderbolt 3&4. With 10Gbps transfer speed, Maotoam lets you transfer files, photos, and videos in seconds.

 

 

 

Maotoam’s durable aluminum construction is stylish and sleek. Two silicone pads on the bottom keep the stand from moving around on the desk surface and protective hooks ensure your computer does not slide off the stand. To maximize airflow and prevent laptop overheating, the stand has adequate ventilation holes on the laptop cradle for air circulation. 

 

Maotoam is designed to support all USB-C based devices, from the latest MacBook lineup and iPads to all the flagship Android and Windows-based tablets.  

UPDATE: Great news! Finally, we have completed the sample preparation and just shipped it to reviewers!!! So exciting to looking forward to the product review, and all of the reviews will be post as soon as possible! Yeah, we hear you and try our best for the trust between us.
story_txt:
Maotoam is more than just a hub. Its innovative design turns your laptop into a full-featured workstation. It can be adjusted to any angle to reduce screen glare, improve typing ergonomics while providing connectivity and data transfer for all your essential devices.
 

 

 
 

Maotoam combines an infinitely adjustable laptop stand and a 13-in-1 USB-C hub. The hub is equipped with 13 useful ports, supports USB 3.2 Gen2 as well as USB 4 for transmission speeds up to 10Gbp/s and 100W USB-C power delivery which can power 5 connected devices simultaneously and never encounter a power drain while you are working. It lets you work more efficiently and boosts productivity with quadruple monitor display output at the latest 4K@60Hz ultra-high-definition video. Maotoam provides an ergonomic laptop experience and creates a more comfortable working environment.

 

 

The triple display drivers deliver an unparalleled visual experience with dual HDMI ports and a PD (Power Delivery) port - a specification for handling higher power that allows a range of devices to charge quickly over a USB connection.  This system allows up to 4 high-quality displays including your laptop monitor. Extend your desktop, work on multiple apps simultaneously, or enjoy exceptional quality, for games and entertainment. Maotoam can help you to relax and also boost efficiency while multitasking. 
 

 
How can Maotoam’s quadruple-monitor display benefit you? Multiple displays add convenience and efficiency for information research, document editing, presentations, and viewing multiple web-pages simultaneously. With Maotoam, your workflow is enhanced.

 

Maotoam supports high-resolution output up to 4k@60hz. 4k high-definition monitors provide significantly more detail for programming, video editing, design work, and more. And the 60Hz refresh rate delivers users a more stable visual experience that achieves extreme visual fidelity. 

 
 

With a full spectrum of ports, this multi-port hub and docking station is the solution to effectively improve your day-to-day workflow while at home or in the office. 

 

Maotoam can deliver a massive 100W of total power, which is more than enough to charge a laptop and refill your phone at blazing fast speeds with the 18W PD output. It’s bidirectional, which means connected devices can both send and receive power – at the same time, to top it all off. Maotoam also lets you charge up to 5 connected devices simultaneously. 

 

Maotoam is widely compatible with the USB 3.2 Gen2, USB4, Thunderbolt 3&4. With 10Gbps transfer speed, Maotoam lets you transfer files, photos, and videos in seconds.

 

 
 

The Maotoam adjustable laptop stand is integrated with a 13-in-1 USB-C hub, so you can expand peripherals, charge devices, and transfer data all at once while having a perfectly organized desk.
 


 
 

Find the most comfortable ergonomic posture with unlimited adjustable angles. Whether you want to read, type, take notes, draw, or use external keyboards with laptops and tablets, Maotoam provides optimal comfort and screen angles and puts your hands and wrists in the proper position to avoid the fatigue of your neck, arms, wrists, or eyes.
 

 

 

 
 

Maotoam uses a patented spindle design and silicon base that has been rigorously tested to perform perfectly for over 20,000 uses. This design is made for durability and keeps your laptop stable and secure at all times.
 

 
Maotoam’s durable aluminum construction is stylish and sleek. Two silicone pads on the bottom keep the stand from moving around on the desk surface and protective hooks ensure your computer does not slide off the stand. To maximize airflow and prevent laptop overheating, the stand has adequate ventilation holes on the laptop cradle for air circulation. 
 

 

 

Maotoam is designed to support all USB-C based devices, from the latest MacBook lineup and iPads to all the flagship Android and Windows-based tablets.  


 
 


 


 


 
 

 

 

 


 
 


 
      

 
 

 

 
 

Maotoam is a professional team with over 10 years’ experience in the field of electronics technology. Our team has successfully developed computer accessories, including chargers, data saving and connection products, and more. Our brand ethos is focused on the perspective of users and we are dedicated to bringing them the best experience and quality assurance. So, quality and innovation are what we pursue. We established a Maotoam laboratory in 2019, where our designers and team of 15 engineers perform quality inspections for each design to ensure that all products can maintain excellent performance under a variety of use cases. The Maotoam team is committed to creating computer accessories products with an attitude and giving users products with both aesthetic and practical value. 


 

 
UPDATE: Great news! Finally, we have completed the sample preparation and just shipped it to reviewers!!! So exciting to looking forward to the product review, and all of the reviews will be post as soon as possible! Yeah, we hear you and try our best for the trust between us.

story:
FocusBuds by Potential X is the world's first pair of productivity boosting earbuds - the way they work is that embedded biosensors monitor your brain activity and remind you to refocus whenever you are distracted. 

This process known as EEG Neurofeedback trains your brain to better focus and block out distractions over time. 

The patent-pending technology behind FocusBuds is designed from the ground up to help your brain get into deep focus and enter the 'Flow State' at will.

FocusBuds provides real-time feedback — training your brain to concentrate and eliminate procrastination. Achieve focus like you have never imagined. 

With FocusBuds, you can get focused and stay focused quickly and easily. FocusBuds are also integrated with a host of premium features such as Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity, one-touch voice control and noise isolation - making them the perfect pair of work earbuds. 

What is Flow State?

‘Flow State’ is a state where your brain is so hyper focused and immersed on a single task that hours go by without you noticing. FocusBuds trains you to slip into flow state faster and helps you stay there longer — giving you unparalleled productivity.

 

You’ve Never Had Earbuds Like These

For people serious about reaching their full potential, FocusBuds by Potential X is an advanced cognitive enhancing wearable that is the most effective at helping you boost your focus. 

Not only does FocusBuds use EEG Neurofeedback to actively help you concentrate, it’s also a powerful set of earbuds with noise isolation technology. Listen to your music wirelessly and without distractions or noise, while you dive deep in your work.

FocusBuds first tracks your brain activity in real-time with embedded EEG biosensors.

Our advanced machine learning platform then learns the patterns in your EEG signal to determine your focus levels using approximately 400 calculated metrics.

Whenever your focus drops — FocusBuds gently guides your brain back into peak focus through auditory feedback. 

The brain is malleable and is constantly being shaped by our experience due to neuroplasticity, every repetition of a thought or emotion can create and reinforce a neural pathway.

This form of Neurofeedback has been scientifically & repeatedly proven to enhance performance (Gruzeier, 2016) and is as powerful as Ritalin (Fuchs, 2016). Plus, it works even when you take FocusBuds off — leaving behind a more focused brain better at tuning out distractions.

We spend an average of 23 minutes to focus, yet we are interrupted every 11 minutes. Over the course of our careers — 20,000 hours are wasted on being distracted in the workplace.

Does any of the following sound like you? 

You know what you need to do to become successful, but the issue is staying focused enough to finish what you started. FocusBuds is a non-invasive solution to help you concentrate, stay focused and get work done.

With FocusBuds, you can regain your lost hours and maximize your productivity every single day — saving you 20,000 hours over your career, enough time for you to become an expert at any skill, twice! 

 

EEG Neurofeedback is a clinically-proven technology developed as a non-invasive training method to help people stay focused. EEG sensors provide real-time displays of brain activity. A program then interprets the brain activity and provides immediate audio or visual feedback when needed train the brain.

This technology has been proven repeatedly to enhance cognitive performance in numerous medical studies and has been used for the last half decade for therapeutic use and performance enhancement.

 

Previously, EEG Neurofeedback was only accessible to Fortune 500 CEOs and NASA astronauts and cost up to thousands of dollars. Now, with FocusBuds, you can get it at a fraction of the usual cost.

Rapid advances in signal processing techniques and material science over the last decade have made these earbuds possible.

Working with our team of neuroscientists and machine learning engineers for the last 1.5 years, we found a way to re-create the clinical grade effectiveness of industrial EEG machines in just 8 EEG sensors that are embedded throughout the earbuds. 

By going directly to the original manufacturer for these EEG sensors, we are also able to cut out the middleman and offer this technology to you at a much more affordable price.

By constantly reinforcing your focus behavior, FocusBuds helps you reach peak productivity & enter ‘Flow State’ consistently and effortlessly — even when you’re not using it.

The 80/20 Rule

20% of our actions lead to 80% of the results. This is because we waste so much of our actions, energy and thoughts being distracted. The 20% of results-driving action comes from focused, purposeful, distraction-free work.

Imagine if you were so focused, ALL your actions led to powerful, purposeful results. How much more meaningful work would you get done? How much time would you save to get double or triple the output?

By increasing your focused actions from 20% of your work-time to 100%, you’re essentially multiplying your efficiency and efficacy by five-times! That’s 5x the results or 5x less time you’re spending to get the same work done now. 

Since FocusBuds helps you enter flow state faster and keeps you there longer, you can truly maximize that 20% and get even more done.

Using advanced machine learning models, FocusBuds is able to track and analyze your brain activity to find patterns in your work habits. 

You’ll be able to see what environments, times of day, habits and activities keep you focused and engaged — and what distracts you. Using this data, you can optimize your life by identifying your personal peak times and environment, while avoiding areas and habits that are distracting.

Overtime, FocusBuds becomes your own highly trained personal assistant that is able to provide insights on how you can take your game to the next level. 

Plan out your days more effectively by placing tasks that require a lot of focus during your peak hours, doing less important and low-focus work during other times, and planning rest times when your body needs it most.

In our future updates, we will also create an intelligent music platform which will learn what type of music boosts your productivity. Based on this music, our model will generate unique personalized music tailored and designed to bring your productivity to a whole new level. 

With FocusBuds, you’re rewiring your brain to be more focused and productive. By constantly reinforcing your focus behavior through operant conditioning , FocusBuds TRAINS your brain to tune out distractions, concentrate faster and stay focused longer. 

So even if you work without your FocusBuds, your brain will naturally enter a focused mode for extended productivity.

FocusBuds features a proprietary noise-isolation sound seal technology that localizes external sounds and isolates them so you can better block out distractions and work in focused silence.

This is different from other active noise cancellation methods — our noise isolation technology keeps a low level of background murmur and specifically targets high-stimulus sounds and distracting noises. This helps induce a more natural state of flow and better trains your brain to focus even in noisy environments.

We made sure FocusBuds have great sound quality. Everything, from the drivers to the earpiece, was designed & engineered by award-winning engineers. Experience premium sound and music with extraordinary highs and deep, rich lows all while getting into a deep flow state. 

An embedded microphone in FocusBuds lets you jump on phone calls without skipping a beat. Get targeted voice recognition and isolated sound for crystal clear calls. 

FocusBuds are powered by Bluetooth 5.0 which ensures a secure, seamless connection between you and your music — allowing you to focus on your work without wasting time untangling wires. 

Enjoy a wireless experience with unparalleled sound detail & accuracy.

FocusBuds can last up to 8 hours of EEG Neurofeedback​ + music use and up to 14 hours of audio only playtime. You’ll be able to stay focused throughout your entire workday without worry.

The controls are designed to optimise your workflow. With a simple switch, you can turn EEG mode on or off. 

Our one touch control also allows you to access Siri or Google Assistant to get things done while you focus on more important matters.

Stay hyper-focused and go deeper into your work. See details otherwise lost and gain new ideas as you unlock your mind and the creative power within using FocusBuds. 

*FocusBuds does not require a subscription, Brain FM is just a free bonus we arranged! 

FocusBuds uses a supervised binary classification algorithm to classify the EEG data, predicting mental states in real time with high accuracy. The classifier is first pre-trained on existing data prior to fine-tuning on the user’s personal EEG data. These classifications are then aggregated and contribute towards behavioral feedback as well as providing augmented insights — significantly out-performing traditional techniques.

 

Measuring concentration via EEG
Berka, Chris, Gene David, Richard E. Olmstead, and Patrick L. Craven. "EEG Correlates of Task Engagement and Mental Workload in Vigilance, Learning, and Memory Tasks." Aviation, Space, and Environmental Medicine 2nd ser. 78.5 (2007): 231-43. Pubmed. Web.

Neurofeedback as effective as Ritalin
Fuchs, Thomas, Niels Birbaumer, Werner Lutzenberger, John H. Gruzelier, and Jochen Kaiser. "Neurofeedback Treatment for Attention-Deficit/ Hyperactivity Disorder in Children: A Comparison With Methylphenidate." Applied Psychophysiology and Biofeedback 28.1 (2003): 1-12. Web.

Distraction and Mind Wandering Hinders Learning
Smallwood, Jonathan, Daniel J. Fishman, and Jonathan W. Schooler. "Counting the Cost of an Absent Mind: Mind Wandering as an Underrecognized Influence on Educational Performance." Psychonomic Bulletin & Review 14.2 (2007): 230-36. Web.

Neurofeedback for Performance Enhancement
Gruzelier, JH. "EEG-neurofeedback for Optimising Performance. I: A Review of Cognitive and Affective Outcome in Healthy Participants." Neuroscience & Behavioral Reviews 44 (2014): 124-41. PubMed. Web.

Neurofeedback for Professional Athletes
Perry, Frank D., Lindsay Shaw, and Leonard Zaichkowsky. "Biofeedback and Neurofeedback in Sports." Biofeedback 39.3 (2011): 95-100. Web.

At Potential X, we are a group of people working together to make accessible and affordable tools for unlocking human potential. We created FocusBuds because we wanted to bring the powerful technology of EEG Neurofeedback to everyday consumers like you and I. With other products in the pipeline, our mission is to help make the world a better place by unlocking the potential of humanity, one person at a time.
story_txt:
FocusBuds by Potential X is the world's first pair of productivity boosting earbuds - the way they work is that embedded biosensors monitor your brain activity and remind you to refocus whenever you are distracted. 
This process known as EEG Neurofeedback trains your brain to better focus and block out distractions over time. 
The patent-pending technology behind FocusBuds is designed from the ground up to help your brain get into deep focus and enter the 'Flow State' at will. 

FocusBuds provides real-time feedback — training your brain to concentrate and eliminate procrastination. Achieve focus like you have never imagined. 

With FocusBuds, you can get focused and stay focused quickly and easily. FocusBuds are also integrated with a host of premium features such as Bluetooth 5.0 wireless connectivity, one-touch voice control and noise isolation - making them the perfect pair of work earbuds. 
What is Flow State?
‘Flow State’ is a state where your brain is so hyper focused and immersed on a single task that hours go by without you noticing. FocusBuds trains you to slip into flow state faster and helps you stay there longer — giving you unparalleled productivity. 

 
You’ve Never Had Earbuds Like These

For people serious about reaching their full potential, FocusBuds by Potential X is an advanced cognitive enhancing wearable that is the most effective at helping you boost your focus. 
Not only does FocusBuds use EEG Neurofeedback to actively help you concentrate, it’s also a powerful set of earbuds with noise isolation technology. Listen to your music wirelessly and without distractions or noise, while you dive deep in your work.

FocusBuds first tracks your brain activity in real-time with embedded EEG biosensors.
Our advanced machine learning platform then learns the patterns in your EEG signal to determine your focus levels using approximately 400 calculated metrics.
Whenever your focus drops — FocusBuds gently guides your brain back into peak focus through auditory feedback. 

The brain is malleable and is constantly being shaped by our experience due to neuroplasticity, every repetition of a thought or emotion can create and reinforce a neural pathway.
This form of Neurofeedback has been scientifically & repeatedly proven to enhance performance (Gruzeier, 2016) and is as powerful as Ritalin (Fuchs, 2016). Plus, it works even when you take FocusBuds off — leaving behind a more focused brain better at tuning out distractions.

We spend an average of 23 minutes to focus, yet we are interrupted every 11 minutes. Over the course of our careers — 20,000 hours are wasted on being distracted in the workplace.

Does any of the following sound like you?  

You know what you need to do to become successful, but the issue is staying focused enough to finish what you started. FocusBuds is a non-invasive solution to help you concentrate, stay focused and get work done. 

With FocusBuds, you can regain your lost hours and maximize your productivity every single day — saving you 20,000 hours over your career, enough time for you to become an expert at any skill, twice! 

 


EEG Neurofeedback is a clinically-proven technology developed as a non-invasive training method to help people stay focused. EEG sensors provide real-time displays of brain activity. A program then interprets the brain activity and provides immediate audio or visual feedback when needed train the brain.

This technology has been proven repeatedly to enhance cognitive performance in numerous medical studies and has been used for the last half decade for therapeutic use and performance enhancement.
