story:
What is µRuler?

µRuler is a micro-ruler to measure micro-objects, especially working with a loupe or microscope.

For the ruler in daily life, usually the minimum scale is 1mm, in µRuler, 1mm will be divided into many small scales.

Two different µRulers were designed for dedicated purpose to meet multiple application: µRuler M and µRuler Q.

µRuler M

µRuler Q

 Why you need µRuler?

When we measure everyday items most of us will grab a ruler in order to make a measurement. When we observe the micro-objects using a loupe or microscope, it is extremely important to know their size because we lacks the sense of size in micro-world.

Therefore, like for the everyday items, we need a micro-ruler to measure the size in micro-world.

How to use µRuler?

Direct measure

µRuler can be  used directly under a microscope or loupe for speedy measuring of small parts, grooves, slots, line widths, holes, and chamfers.

Overlap the µRuler with sample

Observe with a Microscope or Loupe

To calibrate the reticle

With the eyepiece reticle installed on microscope, put µRuler under the microscope, focus so that both scales are clear in focus and lined up at the "0" point to make calibration of the reticle. 

Align µRuler with the reticle to compare and calibrate

To calibrate the software scale-bar

Dedicated software for microscope usually enable the embedding of a soft scale-bar on the micrograph, it needs to be calibrated to ensure accuracy. 

 

Get the software scale-bar calibration with µRuler

 

Why µRuler is such a low cost yet high accuracy?

Traditional micro-ruler usually is made by etching on glass/metal substrate with low volume production. Therefore traditional micro-ruler is very expensive. 

µRuler is made with photomask technique in the semiconductor industry, which is one of the process to make IC chips. So its accuracy and quality is ensured.  

On the other hand, instead of glass/metal, µRuler were made on large PET sheets in large scale and cut into each piece of µRuler (6x9 cm) by mass production, thus µRuler can be controlled at a low cost for large scale production.

In addition, µRuler will be designed by integrate different patterns into one, this further increase its value/cost effectiveness. In this project, two different model  µRuler M and µRuler Q were designed and will be produced. Each one will integrate 5 different patterns.

µRuler M and the 5 patterns

µRuler Q and the 5 patterns

 

Pilot test and accuracy validation

A small amount of µRuler M was already made, the quality and accuracy were validated. 

Pilot sample

Check under microscope to validate accuracy, 0.1mm DIV

Check under microscope to validate accuracy, 0.1mm DIV

 

Calibration certificate

In addition to the internal quality verification by microscope, one μRuler was submitted to third party authority, National Center of Measurement and Test for East China to test the accuracy. Calibration certificate reported U=1.5μm, k=2. That means when coverage factor k=2, the expanded uncertainty U=1.5μm. In other words, with a probability of 95%, the value of the measurement is within the range of ±1.5μm. It is a very good accuracy for μRuler.

Calibration certificate results

 

Time Line

  

Rewards

Why your support is so important?

We plan to start this project to build this affordable yet high accuracy micro-ruler, So more people can benefit from it. Your support is highly appreciated and very important for this project, as a minimum volume need to be reached for µRuler production in large scale at a controlled cost.

About us

We (Shanghai QingYing  E&T LLC,  www.mobile-scope.com) focus on the development and manufacture of micro-photography product. We started quite a few years ago and get several patents authorized on this field since April of 2012.

We built several products line to help our customer with the best smartphone based tools and instruments in different application:

     Industry– PCB, printing, fabrics, fine mechanics , abrasives

     Medical– in hospital dermography, parasite

     Garden– plants, insects

     R&D– failure analysis, material observation, defects observation

     Hobby– banknote, postage, vintage

     Daily life– education, office application

     Forensic  – observation and records

Join us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/iSEEING

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Victor_LiCui

 

Risks and challenges

Development of this product has gone through prototyping, evaluation and improve the concept cycle many times. a low volume has already been made and validated. 

In order to reduce the cost, a large scale manufacture is essential. So your support is very important to make this product to be available to microscope community at an affordable price.

story:
Hello!

Economic crises destroy lives ☹️. We want to change that so people live better while growing financially. It's the first shopping meets finance app: Zestefy is a life planner for your shopping and goals using automated financial planning.

  • Shop for electronics, vacations, cars, houses, and deals.
  • Explore goals like jobs, where to live, starting a family.
  • Automatically grow your financial stability.
     

...think navigation for your life :)
 

We need your support to transform the prototype into a super app and improve the AI. People love our approach: we won a startup pitch competition with 76% of the votes! Pitch video above (second one) or way below.

 

Summary below and prototype (gifs, videos, screenshots)...

 

 

Problem...Yikes!

Shopping is very easy, but affording everything we want is very hard.

Examples:
You bought that pricey car...then you cannot afford that vacation and it delays destroying debt. You traveled a bunch, lost your job...then you don't have enough savings to cover months of expenses.

Attempts:

  • You can spend weeks learning and applying general advice from books and videos -- like don't eat out, make and don't buy coffee, save money, invest (in yourself and stocks) -- but all of that is not fast and easy like shopping!
  • Budgeting and savings apps do not solve the problem. We need smarter.

 

 

To me, the overspending and mishaps are...not...your...fault. 


 

Solution...Woo!

People need intelligence at the speed of their consumption...personalized and convenient. It requires blending these fields: shopping, lifestyle, finance, income, psychology, and artificial intelligence. Our approach...
 

Zestefy is a life planning app for your shopping and goals using automated financial planning.

What you want + financial stability...

  • Shop smarter:
    • See what you can afford, when, how, and get deals.
    • Vacations, devices, cars, houses, furniture, appliances, gifts, events. 
    • Financial and insurance products.
  • Explore goals:
    • If I get a raise or get a lower-paying job, then what can I afford?
    • If I want a pricier house, then what kind of car can I afford?
    • Where should I live, given my income and family?
       

Get more with intelligence (mock-ups):


 

App learns from your likes (clip from prototype):
 

 

App shows what you can afford, when, how (clip from prototype):
 


 

Who This is For

  • The savvy shopper: you look for deals, you shop around before buying...takes a lot of time, you hate overpaying.

     
  • The analytical saver: you analyze money, you plan in spreadsheets, you research...takes a lot of effort, you like being smart.

     

 

People Want This

Great signs...

  • A big company wants the "Google Maps for Money", and we want to lead the way https://a16z.com/2019/10/01/google-maps-for-money/
  • Survey on April 26, 2021, of general prospects (before our pitch win) found that 73% want our service, based only on watching our crowdfunding video.

 

Video of Winning Pitch

We won a startup pitch competition with 76% of the votes...

 

 

Proof of our "runaway victory":
https://www.youtubestartend.com/view.php?v=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZS5jb20vZW1iZWQvalhiZGpEeDZtVTQ/c3RhcnQ9NDE0MiZlbmQ9NDE4MyZ2ZXJzaW9uPTM=

 

Cool convo with CEO of Founders Live:
https://founderslivepodcast.buzzsprout.com/6531...

 

 

Our Mission

To empower people with financial wellness and success in life.

The world needs this mission! For you, your family, your city, and society.

We define financial wellness as financial contentment and stability to afford life. We're starting with smarter shopping for cars and experiences, but we're aiming toward the mission (life planning), which is massive -- it's not just financial, it's economic.

We are a financial wellness startup -- a social impact company.

 

Me, Our Founder

I'm Ihsan (eh-son), a data scientist and applied mathematician:

  • I've worked in media, marketing, consulting, and personal finance. 
  • I've been exploring the problem and building the core solution since 2015.
  • I've seen and felt economic pain since 2001 -- this is my life's passion.
  • I like practical solutions. Word I hate: perfect. 
  • Yes, I'm all in my startup.
  • My profile on LinkedIn.


 

What We Need

$20,000...but much more...because our mission is massive.

Currently, the team is just me. We want to improve and transform the prototype into a phone app that can launch in 2022.

The funds will signal to potential employees and investors that people want the Zestefy service! Use of the $20k is roughly...

  • $2k so I can improve the AI system with possibly licensed software.
  • $3k for testing and scaling the prototype on a cloud provider.
  • $3k in labor as CEO and lead scientist.
  • $8k in labor for phone app development.
  • $4k for app design and interface (UI, UX).


But yea, we need way more to build the team and product for years to come.

 

What You Get

Reward based on level of support:

  • Limited quantity! Flexible phone/tablet holder (ETA 8/2021) + 1 year of our Premium Life Planner (ETA 6/2023). Focus on watching or listening without fussing with your phone.
  • Quality shirt (ETA 8/2021) + our premium Life Planner (ETA 2023), free forever + (if you'd like) public recognition as our early-and-bold supporter.
  • 1 year free of our Premium Life Planner (ETA 2023).
  • Virtual red carpet for a private trial of our Life Planner. Beta test, celeb style (ETA 2022).
  • A private edu-taining video about Zestefy's vision with research (ETA 10/2021).

 

Risks & Challenges

I've been bootstrapping on my own funds, but this startup can fail if I run out of cash.

I need to build a team (and pay them) to transform the prototype with me into a service people can have. 

Examples of challenges:

  • If the app is too nerdy about finances.
  • If the app is too much about shopping.
  • If the app is not flexible enough for your scenarios.
  • If the app does not show enough product inventory.
  • If the AI is not insightful enough.
  • If the AI is too slow.


We are a social impact company with a revenue-generating business model, but we have to focus on building and hunting. I'm a realist: high impact + high revenue = very hard.
 

 

Video of Prototype

Starts with intro, then demo with explanations...

 


 

Screenshots of Prototype

 

 

Ways to Contact

  • On Indiegogo
  • info@zestefy.com
  • @zestefy_inc on Twitter
  • Me on LinkedIn

 

Lastly...

 


 

Thank youuu!
story_txt:
Hello!
Economic crises destroy lives ☹️. We want to change that so people live better while growing financially. It's the first shopping meets finance app: Zestefy is a life planner for your shopping and goals using automated financial planning.

Shop for electronics, vacations, cars, houses, and deals.
Explore goals like jobs, where to live, starting a family.
Automatically grow your financial stability. 

...think navigation for your life :) 
We need your support to transform the prototype into a super app and improve the AI. People love our approach: we won a startup pitch competition with 76% of the votes! Pitch video above (second one) or way below.
 
Summary below and prototype (gifs, videos, screenshots)...
 
 
Problem...Yikes!
Shopping is very easy, but affording everything we want is very hard.
Examples:You bought that pricey car...then you cannot afford that vacation and it delays destroying debt. You traveled a bunch, lost your job...then you don't have enough savings to cover months of expenses.
Attempts:

You can spend weeks learning and applying general advice from books and videos -- like don't eat out, make and don't buy coffee, save money, invest (in yourself and stocks) -- but all of that is not fast and easy like shopping!
Budgeting and savings apps do not solve the problem. We need smarter.

 

 
To me, the overspending and mishaps are...not...your...fault. 
 
Solution...Woo!
People need intelligence at the speed of their consumption...personalized and convenient. It requires blending these fields: shopping, lifestyle, finance, income, psychology, and artificial intelligence. Our approach... 
Zestefy is a life planning app for your shopping and goals using automated financial planning.
What you want + financial stability...


Shop smarter:
See what you can afford, when, how, and get deals.
Vacations, devices, cars, houses, furniture, appliances, gifts, events. 
Financial and insurance products.



Explore goals:
If I get a raise or get a lower-paying job, then what can I afford?
If I want a pricier house, then what kind of car can I afford?
Where should I live, given my income and family? 



Get more with intelligence (mock-ups):

 App learns from your likes (clip from prototype): 
 
App shows what you can afford, when, how (clip from prototype): 

 
Who This is For


The savvy shopper: you look for deals, you shop around before buying...takes a lot of time, you hate overpaying. 

The analytical saver: you analyze money, you plan in spreadsheets, you research...takes a lot of effort, you like being smart. 

 
People Want This
Great signs...
A big company wants the "Google Maps for Money", and we want to lead the way https://a16z.com/2019/10/01/google-maps-for-money/

Survey on April 26, 2021, of general prospects (before our pitch win) found that 73% want our service, based only on watching our crowdfunding video.
 
Video of Winning Pitch
We won a startup pitch competition with 76% of the votes...

 
 
Proof of our "runaway victory":https://www.youtubestartend.com/view.php?v=aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cueW91dHViZS5jb20vZW1iZWQvalhiZGpEeDZtVTQ/c3RhcnQ9NDE0MiZlbmQ9NDE4MyZ2ZXJzaW9uPTM=
 
Cool convo with CEO of Founders Live:https://founderslivepodcast.buzzsprout.com/6531...
 
 
Our Mission
To empower people with financial wellness and success in life.
The world needs this mission! For you, your family, your city, and society.
We define financial wellness as financial contentment and stability to afford life. We're starting with smarter shopping for cars and experiences, but we're aiming toward the mission (life planning), which is massive -- it's not just financial, it's economic.
We are a financial wellness startup -- a social impact company.
 
Me, Our Founder
I'm Ihsan (eh-son), a data scientist and applied mathematician:

I've worked in media, marketing, consulting, and personal finance. 
I've been exploring the problem and building the core solution since 2015.
I've seen and felt economic pain since 2001 -- this is my life's passion.
I like practical solutions. Word I hate: perfect. 
Yes, I'm all in my startup.

My profile on LinkedIn.

 
What We Need
$20,000...but much more...because our mission is massive.
Currently, the team is just me. We want to improve and transform the prototype into a phone app that can launch in 2022.
The funds will signal to potential employees and investors that people want the Zestefy service! Use of the $20k is roughly...

$2k so I can improve the AI system with possibly licensed software.
$3k for testing and scaling the prototype on a cloud provider.
$3k in labor as CEO and lead scientist.
$8k in labor for phone app development.
$4k for app design and interface (UI, UX).

But yea, we need way more to build the team and product for years to come.

 
What You Get
Reward based on level of support:


Limited quantity! Flexible phone/tablet holder (ETA 8/2021) + 1 year of our Premium Life Planner (ETA 6/2023). Focus on watching or listening without fussing with your phone.

Quality shirt (ETA 8/2021) + our premium Life Planner (ETA 2023), free forever + (if you'd like) public recognition as our early-and-bold supporter.

1 year free of our Premium Life Planner (ETA 2023).
Virtual red carpet for a private trial of our Life Planner. Beta test, celeb style (ETA 2022).
A private edu-taining video about Zestefy's vision with research (ETA 10/2021).


 
Risks & Challenges
I've been bootstrapping on my own funds, but this startup can fail if I run out of cash.
I need to build a team (and pay them) to transform the prototype with me into a service people can have. 
Examples of challenges:

If the app is too nerdy about finances.
If the app is too much about shopping.
If the app is not flexible enough for your scenarios.
If the app does not show enough product inventory.
If the AI is not insightful enough.
If the AI is too slow.

We are a social impact company with a revenue-generating business model, but we have to focus on building and hunting. I'm a realist: high impact + high revenue = very hard. 
 
Video of Prototype
Starts with intro, then demo with explanations...

 
 
Screenshots of Prototype












 
 
Ways to Contact

On Indiegogo
info@zestefy.com
@zestefy_inc on Twitter
Me on LinkedIn

 
Lastly...


 

 
Thank youuu!

story:
Ever since it first hit the market, the laptop has been a useful tool, giving us the freedom to work remotely. But we have all experience the frustrating experience of being limited by the laptop’s single small screen. With the Vinpok Split, this problem becomes a thing in the past.

Vinpok Split turns your laptop into a full-blown desktop, but a lot more compact. Weighing only 1.4lbs, this 15.6’’ monitor is your ultimate tool for boosting your efficiency when working remotely. 1080P high resolution and touchscreen functionality, working remotely with efficiency has never been easier.

Best Tool For Your Macbook

We notice a shifting trend in people’s working behavior, that more and more employers are investing in building more screen space for their employees, studies have shown that having one even two extra monitors can boost productivity by up to 50%. Vinpok Split is the best tool for your Macbook to build your 2-screen or even 3-screen system.

Works with all laptops

Vinpok Split works with all laptops, so it doesn’t matter what type of computer you are using, you can always enjoy the practicality and productivity brought by a larger screen. Macbook, Windows, Linux supported.

Turn Android Smartphone Into Work Station

With the rapid development of nowadays’ technology, smartphones are getting more and more powerful. A lot of time when you are away and don’t have access to a computer and need to finish that one important task or one important email, but working on smartphone is just not practical. You can simply just connect your Android smartphones into Vinpok Split to turn it into a work station. Fear not when you don’t have a computer around.

Gospel For Gamers

It’s not just business with Split, use with your gaming system as well, simply plug in your gaming console and start running your favorite games. What makes it even more awesome is your don’t even need the dock that comes with the console, just use the type-c cable we provided! Split is compatible with PS4, NS, Xbox and any other gaming consoles.

New Full Instructions About How To Use Vinpok Split

 

How To Use Vinpok Split To Connect New iPad Pro

Use Vinpok Split to turn smartphone into a working station

Use Vinpok Split to play games on PS4

Use Vinpok Split to play games on Switch

How To Set Up Vinpok Split Using The Clip

How To Set Up Vinpok Split Using Magnetic Stand

For more tutorials and videos, check out our Youtube Channel: http://bit.ly/2PDWrOB , and we will keep uploading videos

Founded in 2017, Vinpok is formed by a team of dynamic, creative designers and entrepreneurs who fond of the minimalist aesthetic, such passion and belief bring them together. Vinpok strives to offer customers the highest quality Apple peripheral accessories and solutions, and make their everyday life more convenient in a fast-paced world.

We love minimalist design, high-quality products, and this idea is not only reflected in the Split Monitor, but all products in the brand portfolio. Vinpok is committed to offering customers the most innovative products, and the highest quality in every detail through advanced technology.

Time is always the most challenging part when trying to bring a product to life as there are so many procedures that must be managed. However, with this being our fourth Indiegogo campaign, we can confidently say that we are already familiar with the Crowdfunding process. Most importantly, the electronic product design and production are no strangers to us. We believe that our experienced team can well mitigate all potential risks in this journey. And will strive for excellence from project planning, production to order shipping. If there’s any obstacle, we will definitely keep you in the loop. Thanks for supporting us! Due to different countries' laws and regulations of custom duty, there are chances that backers need to pay custom duty.

story:
Perhaps you’re already going back to working and collaborating in the office, or like many of us, you’re hoping that will be a reality soon. (Fingers crossed for 2021!)

Either way, when we return to those days of daily commutes and takeaway coffees, we can’t underestimate the convenience a card holder can bring to our day to day.

But most solutions don’t work well and often don’t last very long.

 

Carry With Confidence

 
 

Introducing the Orbitkey ID Card Holder System – a durable and sleek card carry solution to help you move effortlessly through your day.

Available in 2 colours (Black and Stone) and 2 models to suit any style and preference.

Friendly Worldwide Shipping – We’ve partnered with warehouses and fulfilment centres across the globe – in the USA, Netherlands, Hong Kong, and Australia. Your rewards will be shipped from your nearest centre.

Press Kit – orbitkey.com/IDC-press

For Press Enquiries – press@orbitkey.com

 

Quick and Easy Tap and Go 

 

The ID Card Holders allow you to easily scan your ID, access or public transport card while you’re on the go.

 

Reduces the Spread of Germs

Keep your ID or public transport card easily accessible, so you don’t have to rummage through your pocket or bag and avoid touching your other belongings.

 

Made to Last

The unique swivel belt hook allows the retractor to rotate in the direction you pull the Card Holder in – minimising wear on the retractor cord and creating a truly seamless interaction.

Our custom-made retractor is also more durable and silent compared to standard retractors – made from high-quality materials and built to last for years to come.

 

Protect Your Privacy

If you’re leaving the office and want to hide your ID, simply pull down and flip your card around. With the built-in privacy feature, the card holder sits within a cavity in the retractor casing and ensures that it doesn’t flip back around – so that your personal details remain personal.

 

Additional Card Storage

The ID Card Holder has space for an additional non-RFID card for quick and convenient access – perfect for a business or coffee loyalty card.

 

Wear It Your Way

Can’t clip a retractor to your outfit or prefer not to? Opt for the detachable lanyard so you can wear your Retractable Card Holder around your neck instead. The comfortable woven lanyard also has a breakaway release for added safety and convenience.

 

Also compatible with other lanyard types. Please note that the privacy feature is not guaranteed when used with swivel hook lanyards.

 

 

Extra Storage and Security

The ID Card Holder Pro can hold not 1, but 2 additional RFID cards (such as credit cards and public transport cards) – with RFID blocking technology to protect from digital theft.

 

Interference-Free Scanning

With the Pro model, you can carry multiple RFID cards and still scan your ID or primary access card without removing it from the card holder.

 

Hidden Storage for Small Items

The Pro model also has extra storage for small items, such as a key and emergency cash, hidden in a cavity under your ID card.

 

Dual Orientation Enabled

The ID Card Holder Pro even supports cards in both portrait and landscape orientations. Just transfer the hook from one leather loop to the other.

Crafted from Durable and Premium Materials 

These features all come together in a sleek and minimal design with high-quality materials – like ethically sourced top grain leather and 100% recycled woven polyester – so you can feel proud, professional and confident with an elegant card holder that you can rely on, day after day.

 

Model Comparison

 

Rewards Chart

Pick from our menu of rewards! You can make your colour selections once the campaign ends.

Friendly Worldwide Shipping – We’ve partnered with warehouses and fulfilment centres across the globe – in the USA, Netherlands, Hong Kong, and Australia. Your rewards will be shipped from your nearest centre.

 

Specifications

Product Demonstration

 

ID Card Holder

 
ID Card holder Pro
 
 

Timeline

 

Track Record

 

Previous Press Coverage

 

 Design Process 

 

We always try to be conscious of what we’re designing – focusing less on the quantity, and more on the quality of a small, but considered selection of products. Our hearts, minds and even weekends were poured into this new product, and here’s a small lookbook to give you an idea of how we went about designing the Orbitkey ID Card Holder System.

 

 

About Orbitkey

 

We believe in clever organisation for better living.

Since 2013, we've launched 5 crowdfunding campaigns, with over 42,530 backers, raising over US$2.92 million.

We love Indiegogo. Not only did you help bring Orbitkey to life, you also allow us to focus on making great products and keep doing the things we love – without the influence of outside investors.

We are a team of 22 passionate individuals based in Melbourne, Australia – driven by design, innovation and clever organisation. This new project is the result of continuous feedback and hard work over the past year. We hope to have you join us on our journey towards better living.

 

 

Here at Orbitkey, we’ve been taking scalable steps to permanently reduce our carbon emissions, and in April 2020, we became a Climate Neutral Certified Brand!

Climate Neutral is an independent non-profit organisation that provides tools for companies to:

Measure their carbon footprint through economic modeling;

Reduce​ their emissions by developing and implementing carbon reduction plans;

Offset​ their emissions if they cannot be immediately reduced by purchasing carbon credits; and

Use the label to empower customers to choose brands that choose to pay for their carbon emissions.

Carbon credits are in turn invested into reducing and capturing carbon dioxide, and can support a range of projects such as forest conservation and renewable energy.

This year, we will ensure that at least 50% of our new products will be made from LWG certified leather and recycled fabric materials. Likewise, 80% of our packaging will be produced from recyclable materials. We will also reduce our air freight shipments company-wide by 40%, and at our headquarters in Melbourne, we will reduce our paper and toner emissions by 60%. But we know that this is only the beginning, and we will continue to improve our processes and further reduce our emissions every year.

 

Risks and challenges

We have a pretty good track record with our previous 5 campaigns – with most rewards being shipped on time or with a 1-month delay at most. Our previous campaigns have also given us valuable experience in all aspects of bringing a product to life and running a crowdfunding campaign.

It has better prepared us in the challenges associated with tooling, production, logistics, communication, and delivering a high-quality product.

However, there are always challenges and unforeseen obstacles that arise when trying to bring a product to life.

In the case of encountering unavoidable obstacles, we have always handled them swiftly and efficiently, and have always conducted things in the best interest of our backers and Orbitkey family. We always keep our backers updated with complete transparency.

We will do our very best to ensure we deliver what we promise and to go the extra mile whenever possible. Thanks for believing in us!

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

We've made a commitment that everything we do and build needs to add value and help our community live better lives. If they don’t, we should rethink why we’re doing it, and work out a better approach. Our products are designed with the best materials and built to last – tested thoroughly to withstand heavy use. We love that we're still seeing plenty of backers from our first Indiegogo campaign in 2013 still using the rewards they received then.

 

Reusability and recyclability

Our products are designed to last. However, should you encounter any problems with any of the parts, you can let us know and we'll be able to send you a specific replacement part.

 

Sustainable materials

The leather that will be used in the production of the ID Card holder System is LWG-certified gold-rated leather. It means that the leather is produced in a sustainable way with a focus on minimising environmental impact. The lanyard is also made of 100% recycled woven polyester thread. We pride ourselves in using no plastic in our packaging and ensuring that any paper material can be recycled.

 

Environmentally friendly factories

All our factories have been carefully selected and are partners we've been working with for several years. We have team members on the ground who visit the factories on a regular basis to ensure that quality, ethical and environmental standards are upheld.

 

Sustainable Distribution

We plan to optimise our shipping routes by utilising sea freight to transport bulk quantities to local warehouses to reduce the carbon footprint of our delivery plan.

story:
When you’ve got a job to do, you need a tool that won’t let you down. The fanttik NEX L1 is exactly that tool. It’s a new smart-control electric screwdriver that gives you easy, efficient, and reliable use. The smart torque control makes it highly adaptable, while the powerful rare earth motor combines unparalleled power and efficiency with low weight and a handy form factor. The patented shark chuck allows for easy one-handed installation of the bit, and the electronic brake gives you full control at all times. fanttik NEX L1 is innovative, versatile, powerful, efficient, comfortable, and safe – exactly what you need for DIY tasks large and small.

 

The fanttik NEX allows you to digitally select from 6 torque settings, ranging from 0.5 N.m to 6 N.m, giving you both superb control and all the power you need. You can start low for perfect precision, and gradually throttle up the torque until you reach the optimum balance for each task. 

From assembling large items to tinkering with intricate clockwork, the fanttik NEX provides enough force while maintaining the precision you need. This perfect marriage of power and control allows you to avoid strain on your hands and wrists, keeping your DIY projects fun instead of fatiguing.

The fanttik NEX features an advanced 3rd generation neodymium motor: the world's smallest rare earth motor available on the market. This advanced technology allows for a 25% smaller, 30% lighter, yet 30% more powerful motor, with a longer service life than comparable devices.

 

The fanttik NEX features a continuously variable transmission (CVT), which allows for stepless speed changes and maximum flexibility. With a maximum rate of 220 RPM, the fanttik NEX L1 Pro is a perfect partner no matter what you need by simply pressing the trigger. The tighter you press, the higher speed you get. The L1 works at a constant speed of 320RPM.

The fanttik NEX electronic braking system means the head stops the instant you release the trigger, offering you total control. This improves precision and greatly reduces the chance of damaging your materials or injuring yourself.

 

The patented shark chuck allows you to lock or release the bit quickly and easily one-handed with a single click. The automatic mechanism has been tested to last 20,000 times and locks the bit firmly in place, preventing it from coming loose, falling out, or getting stuck somewhere inconvenient. 

 

Even for the toughest jobs, the fanttik NEX can keep working as hard as you do, thanks to our long-life, highly efficient, lightweight Samsung lithium-ion battery. With a capacity of 2000mAh, fanttik NEX provides enough charge to assemble a whole room’s worth of furniture, and with USB-C charging you can charge quickly and easily anywhere.

 

The fanttik NEX features a built-in digital display with drill direction, torque, and battery indicators, allowing you to see everything you need at a glance. When switching the drilling direction or adjusting the torque you’ll always know the exact setting.

The Fanttik NEX isn’t just efficient, effective, and intuitive, it’s also lightweight and easy to bring to bear wherever you need it. Weighing just 340 grams, the ergonomic design is compact and easy to use, and it’s so light your arms won’t tire even after hours of use. The design is inspired by the shape of a boomerang, and is designed to meld comfortably into the palm of your hand.

No tool is useful if you can’t see what you’re doing with it, so the fanttik NEX comes equipped with a ring of LED lights that acts as a built-in flashlight. Even in dim environments like the inside of cabinets, the fanttik NEX allows you to see screw heads clearly, reducing the chances of making mistakes or damaging your materials.

 

The fanttik NEX has two versions more than capable of fulfilling your needs, the NEX L1 and the NEX L1 Pro. The L1 Pro comes with all the features discussed here, while L1 works at a constant speed and doesn't have the shark chuck.

The fanttik NEX isn’t just a traditional workman’s tool. It can also be customized to express your unique, personal style. The NEX L1 Pro comes in Moon Grey and Midnight Blue, while the NEX L1 model comes in Moon Grey, Matcha Green and Rose Red.

 

The fanttik NEX itself is just one part of a whole system of tools and parts that provide everything you need to finish the job. Our accessories include 12x 1-inch S2 alloy steel bits, 1x 2-inch bit, 1x 60mm extension rod, 1x USB-C charging cable, and a storage box. These accessories are high precision tools constructed of tough, resilient materials, perfect for use in all your projects.

For DIY-enthusiasts with lots of work to do, fanttik has you covered too. We offer a variety of extra bits and other accessories that have the same toughness and durability as our regular parts. Extra bits are ideal for regular users who expect to be doing plenty of screwdriving. The heavy-duty carry bag allows you to transport your tools in comfort and style, while we also offer precision bits perfect for small spaces and tasks requiring tiny, delicate screw heads.

 

fanttik is a brand of technological innovation in a full range of HOME & DIY power tools which draws from “fantastic”, meaning passion, focus and challenge. We are trying to explore human ingenuity in tools, and interpreting the ultimate interaction between tools and life. 

What fanttik pursues is not the type of traditional power tool, but the new, innovative and interactive one which is based on the users’ needs. We not only cares about the product's performance but also the experience of the users. We hope people can feel and experience totally different products. That’s why fanttik NEX L1 and fanttik NEX L1 Pro were created.  

 

 

fanttik products have entered the mass production stage. As a group of DIY lovers who pursue the innovative power tool, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with customers. We promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. You will always have our back!
story_txt:

It’s a new smart-control electric screwdriver that gives you easy, efficient, and reliable use. The smart torque control makes it highly adaptable, while the powerful rare earth motor combines unparalleled power and efficiency with low weight and a handy form factor. The patented shark chuck allows for easy one-handed installation of the bit, and the electronic brake gives you full control at all times. fanttik NEX L1 is innovative, versatile, powerful, efficient, comfortable, and safe – exactly what you need for DIY tasks large and small.
 




The fanttik NEX allows you to digitally select from 6 torque settings, ranging from 0.5 N.m to 6 N.m, giving you both superb control and all the power you need. You can start low for perfect precision, and gradually throttle up the torque until you reach the optimum balance for each task. 


From assembling large items to tinkering with intricate clockwork, the fanttik NEX provides enough force while maintaining the precision you need. This perfect marriage of power and control allows you to avoid strain on your hands and wrists, keeping your DIY projects fun instead of fatiguing.

The heavy-duty carry bag allows you to transport your tools in comfort and style, while we also offer precision bits perfect for small spaces and tasks requiring tiny, delicate screw heads.

 

fanttik is a brand of technological innovation in a full range of HOME & DIY power tools which draws from “fantastic”, meaning passion, focus and challenge. We are trying to explore human ingenuity in tools, and interpreting the ultimate interaction between tools and life.

We not only cares about the product's performance but also the experience of the users. We hope people can feel and experience totally different products. That’s why fanttik NEX L1 and fanttik NEX L1 Pro were created.  


 










 




fanttik products have entered the mass production stage. As a group of DIY lovers who pursue the innovative power tool, we honor our brand and also cherish our relationship with customers. We promise guaranteed delivery as an official team. You will always have our back!

story:
As a cat owner, you know that typical old-school cat litter boxes are not a good choice to avoid odors and litter tracking and are inconvenient to maintain in your busy life. Other litter boxes with various automatic features are complicated, unreliable and very expensive. 

 

 

That’s why we created Igloo, an affordable automatic modern cat litter box with fully enclosed design. Igloo is a revolutionary litter box that all cat owners need. Not only better for you, but also better for your cat!

 

 

Igloo was designed to free you from the unpleasant and time-consuming chore of scooping. It uses a more convenient and sanitary method. Each time after your cat finishes their business, Igloo starts a one hour countdown to make sure cat feces is dry and then initiates a cleaning cycle that funnels all wastes into a tightly-sealed receptacle. All you have to do is to discard the waste bag once in a while. 

 

 

Each cleaning cycle takes about 90 seconds. The built-in cat recognition sensor detects whether your cat is entering or exiting the box. If your cat hops back in during a cleaning cycle, Igloo will pause the cycle automatically.

 

 

 

After each visit from the cat, the waste is stored in the waste drawer. When full (about once per week for a single cat) a notification is sent by app. Then, simply press the button on the litter box or the Igloo app. This will seal the waste bag automatically, making it ready for you to discard at your convenience.  After discarding, Igloo will automatically replace the waste bag with a clean one. 

 

 

 

 

With a fully enclosed design and automatic cleaning system, the waste receptacle is concealed and kept as airtight as possible. There won't be any waste exposed to the open air. Igloo keeps the air fresh both inside and outside. 

 

 

Litter tracking and spillage are minimized with Igloo. Holes on the soft silicone doorstep help stretch cats' paws to catch litter granules before the cat exits. 

 

 

 

 

Your cat’s wellbeing is one of the most important things to us. Designed with a gravity sensor, Igloo is totally safe and secure. When your cat enters and exits the litter box, the sensor will detect immediately and the machine will not enter the cleaning cycle and it will stop the machine if it is already rotating.

 

 

The litter cleaning cycle has a failsafe, if the cat feces is stuck or any blockage occurs, Igloo will immediately stop rotating and reverse to release the stuck unit. At the same time, users will receive notification immediately through the APP.

 

 

 

Easily Convert Between Three Modes

 

 

Igloo can switch to various working modes, such as auto, manual and night mode, to perfectly suit the needs of you and your cat.  

 

App Control 

 

 

Connect Igloo with your home Wi-Fi. It'll stay connected thus you can control it in the Igloo App wherever you're at.

 

 

With Igloo App, you can view the waste drawer level and get notifications at any time. Igloo will indicate when there is an error of any kind. The system even weighs your cat’s body weight when inside so that you can gain insight into your cat's health.

 

Easy to Use

 

 

You can use the App to initiate the Automatic cleaning mode or select Manual cleaning if you wish.  

Change Litter once a week.

 

 

For a single cat, auto-packing the waste once per week is sufficient.

 

Multiple Cats? No Problem!

 

 

Igloo is designed to accommodate multiple cats of any size. It has a large enough waste capacity for up to 3 cats per Igloo unit.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

2020.11.13 Shipping Update

2020.11.19 Shipping Update

story:
What is Lifeclocc?

It’s a desk clock that counts down the seconds you have left to live. (Refer to the FAQ for how we calculate this)

Lifeclocc was inspired by an obsession with time. It’s such a limited resource, and yet we waste so much of it. Having a physical clock makes it harder to ignore the time that is slipping away. Put it on your office desk, next to your television, or even next to your bed. Guilt yourself into living life meaningfully. If nothing else, it’s definitely a conversation starter.

This is a follow-up campaign to the successful Kickstarter one, and will probably be the final batch I’m producing for this version. There are three editions to choose from, all come with a free existential crisis*.

* not guaranteed

Maker edition:

This runs on a teensy and has 10 digits. It also has a breakout for all the pins on the teensy so it’s great if you are planning on hacking more functionality onto the device. You could say, install a wifi module to ensure the clock automatically updates for daylight savings.

 

Days Edition

This runs on an Arduino nano and comes with 11 digits. Yes, that means it goes down to 0.1 seconds. This will keep you mesmerised as you watch your seconds tick away. The days edition also splits the clock into days and seconds. Did you know you have about 29000 days to live?

 

Seconds Edition (New)

A new edition of Lifeclocc that is new to this campaign. This runs on almost the same hardware as the Days edition, but the print indicates the seconds, similar to the maker edition.

 

Features

  • Cool exposed integrated circuits

  • Completely hackable

  • Sometimes works as a clock

  • Extra motivation to get work done

  • Free existential crises

  • Integrated with electricity

This works great as a gift, or just a fun project to practice your soldering skills. If you are looking for a version that looks less like an electronics project, sign up for the mailing list and you'll be kept updated on any new versions we make.

 

Development Process

This process started back in 2017, where I started obsessing over time. I went over multiple iterations of the project before arriving at something that I felt comfortable making public. If you are interested you can check out my post on how I created Lifeclocc here.

 

Rewards

PCBs Only
PCBs by themselves aren’t very useful, but I think they look cool. Instructions, part lists and source files are all provided so you could still build a complete Lifeclo.cc if you wanted to down the line.

DIY Kit
Parts to build one Lifeclocc. Some assembly required. Soldering iron not included. Comes with a 3D printed table stand.

Assembled Clock
One Lifeclocc, ready to go. Comes with a 3D printed table stand.

Surprise Me: DIY Kit
Similar to the DIY Kit Tier
Cheaper, but you don’t get to choose your edition or colour. This is to help me keep my logistics under control and to give me options to redistribute parts if I need to. For that you get a discount.

Surprise Me: Assembled Clock
Similar to the Assembled Clock tier
Cheaper, but you don’t get to choose your edition or colour. This is to help me keep my logistics under control and to give me options to redistribute parts if I need to. For that, you get a discount.

 

Addons

If you want to get multiple perks, or just get 2 Lifecloccs, choose any of the rewards and you will be able to choose additional perks on the addons page. You will be given the option to add additional kits at a reduced cost and reduced shipping.

If you want something that isn't available with the given options, please send me a message by clicking on Ask a question just below my name at the top of the page. We'll see if we can work something out.

 

Detailed Specifications

The Seconds edition follows the same specs as the  Days Edition

 

Timeline

Since this is an in-demand campaign, there isn’t a hard end date. I will simply put in the orders once I reach the minimum order quantity and assemble and ship them out. Some units will be shipped out immediately as I have excess inventory, but some others will have to wait till the next batch.

Once this campaign is over, it’s unlikely that I will be producing another batch of these versions so get yours while you still can!

 

Open Sourced

The files used to make this project are currently available for download here and all updates I make will also be put online for the benefit of the open-source community. They are released under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License.

Yes, that does mean it's free to get and you don't actually have to back a perk on Indiegogo. See the FAQ on why you should still back this.

 

Who am I?

I’m a part-time hobbyist with too many ideas and too little time. I have successfully fulfilled this campaign before, and I want to continue sharing my creation with more people. The greatest happiness is seeing someone else enjoy what I've created.

If you want to be kept up to date with the random things I make, here's a mailing list you can sign up for.

 

Risks and challenges

The main risk is that the costs of electronic components are going up, and product delays are happening due to the worldwide chip shortages. That being said, I don’t expect to be putting orders in the thousands so there shouldn't be too many problems acquiring the parts. The assembly will be done by myself and I do have a bunch of leftover parts from the previous campaign that should tide me through the initial orders.

story:
Inspired by spacecraft, sci-fi, and all things cosmos - Hoverpen 2.0: Interstellar Edition is our boldest, most radical design yet.

We've designed the most mesmerizing, most fidget-able pen in the galaxy.

 

 

Hoverpen 2.0: Interstellar Edition can't help but be the centerpiece of your desktop setup, where it will be met with awe and envy alike.

 

 

Hoverpen 2.0: Interstellar Edition was designed to impress, resisting gravity at a 23.5 degree angle. Perfectly balanced thanks to its painstaking craftsmanship, the way Hoverpen 2.0 defies gravity makes it impossible to ignore. 

 

 

Just as Earth's gravity loses its authority in space, so too does gravity flounder against Hoverpen 2.0 as it pushes back against the laws of physics.

 

 

With its new ridged design the Hoverpen 2.0 becomes a mesmerizing marvel to watch when spinning, as its circular acceleration and deceleration are now fully visible. A simple twist will send the pen spinning for up to 20 seconds in flawless, kinetic motion.

 

 

Fun to fidget, hypnotic to watch - Hoverpen 2.0 provides much needed entertainment during those dull workdays. Give it a spin, sit back, and ponder on the mysteries of the universe as the Hoverpen 2.0 revolves over and over.

 

 

According to numerous studies, task switching has been shown to improve creativity and problem solving. Researchers found that by constantly switching tasks, people improved both their convergent thinking (logical thinking) and divergent thinking (out-of-the-box thinking) when faced with creative tasks. A study by Harvard Business Review found that frequently interrupting your brainstorming with consistent micro-breaks resulted in more idea generation than no breaks.

 

 

The Hoverpen was designed around this idea. Picture the scene: you're hard at work on a new project. You arrive at a seemingly impossible problem and are mulling it over when you spot the Hoverpen on your desk and give it a spin. Over the next hour, you look up and spin the Hoverpen from time to time. Without even realizing it, you've reformatted your brain into an idea generation machine and crunch through the problem effortlessly.

We designed Hoverpen as the ultimate task-switching tool. Every now and then, take a moment out of your day, spin the pen, and boost your creativity like never before.

 

 

Here are some task switching articles for your big brain to chew on:

 

Inspired by the shape of famous science fiction spacecraft such as the USS Enterprise, Naboo Starships, and Interstellar's Ranger spacecraft - the design elements of the Hoverpen 2.0 are a delight to science fiction fans like ourselves. 

 

 

The sleek, dynamic lines of the pen body offer a glimpse of the advanced future we've all read about and seen on the silver screen.

 

 

While the pen is ergonomically shaped to feel soft and gentle in the hand, the Hoverpen 2.0's pedestal takes on a new shape inspired by Star Trek's USS Enterprise. Its magnetized ring design keeps the pen suspended in place, giving it that "floating in space" flair that we know fans of sci fi and space exploration will come to love.

 

 

The casing of Hoverpen 2.0's body is crafted from a single piece of aircraft grade aluminum. It is uniquely machined as one long piece of metal - giving it it an aura of high quality craftsmanship rarely seen in other pens. 

 

 

While the head is a separate screw-on - so that reloading the cartridge is possible - the rest of the pen is constructed from what we like to call a "uni-body" design.

 

 

The material for the body is carved from high quality aluminum sourced from a premium supplier. With a long-lasting aircraft grade aluminum body, Hoverpen 2.0 is designed to last for decades.

 

 

Hoverpen 2.0 also comes in a stunning premium upgrade option: 18k gold plating. These real 18k gold embellisments will take your Hoverpen 2.0 from extravagant to extraordinary. The gold-plated Hoverpen 2.0 is truly an incredible sight to behold, as light glints off the precious metal adornments making your Hoverpen 2.0 seemingly glow as the pen spins against gravity.

 

 

We have a limited quantity of gold-embellished Hoverpen 2.0s as part of this campaign, at a $30 discount. Instead of paying $149 MSRP, limited gold edition Hoverpen early bird pledges are available for only $119.

 

 

To add gold plating to your ALL-IN, 2x, 6x, 15x, or Meteorite pledge, simply add $44 per pen. 

 

 

With a soft ergonomic finish, Hoverpen 2.0: Interstellar Edition feels like satin in the hand. Soft and gentle to the touch, our latest Hoverpen was designed to make long, strenuous writing sessions feel light and enjoyable.

 

 

Hoverpen 2.0's curved lines are not only visually stunning, they sit right along the hollow of your hand, making for a more pleasurable writing experience.

 

 

At Shanpo, we're obsessed with magnetism - it's why we've even made the cap for the Hoverpen 2.0 magnetically snap into place. Just holding the pen a small distance from the lid is enough for the cap to get sucked onto the pen.

 

 

Just playing with the magnetic cap can provide hours of fidgeting bliss. We've designed every element of Hoverpen 2.0 to fit into your daily work life.

 

 

With a pen and premium as the Hoverpen 2.0, it'd be a shame to load it with anything but the best ink cartridges. Hoverpen 2.0 comes equipped with Schmidt ballpoint cartridges, the German-engineered luxury standard in ballpoint pens. Versatile yet flexible, Hoverpen 2.0 promises no spills, no spotting, and definitely no explosions.

 

 

Like most other high-end luxury pens, the Hoverpen 2.0 is complete reloadable. Simply pull out the cartridge using the included pincher tool and re-insert any D1 sized refill. Quick and easy reloads make the Hoverpen 2.0 one of the most versatile pens on the market for a fraction of the price of a luxury designer pen.

We also include one free extra cartridge in each pledge (or an extra graphite rod if pledging for the graphite pencil option).

 

 

 

Already have the original Hoverpen and looking for something different? Or maybe you're an engineer or artist looking for something you can draft with? Hoverpen 2.0 is now available as a graphite pencil. That's right, we've finally designed a Hoverpencil! Mistake-makers rejoice!

 

 

Quickly and easily reload the pencil by stabbing the included pincher and reinserting any 2mm graphite pencil lead. Just like with the pen version, we've included an extra refill with every pledge. We've also included a free sharpening module, pictured above, to keep your writing nimble and clean.

 

 

We said we're fans of space, cosmology and astronomy, and we know you are too. We'd be letting our backers down unless we offered them something truly unique, something truly one-of-a-kind.

So we went out and found a real meteorite. And then we added it to the tip of the Hoverpen 2.0: Interstellar Edition. That's right, now you can have a genuine piece of outer space sitting right there on your work desk.

 

 

We obtained this meteorite at an auction from a member of the IMCA (International Meteorite Collectors Association), so it is fully authentic. Each Meteorite edition of the Hoverpen 2.0 will be completely unique. No two pens will have the same pattern thanks to a special acid process used to bring out the details of the meteorite and the imperfections etched by space and time itself. Every Meteorite pledge will receive a unique numbered card with information on their extremely special pen and its origins.

 

 

The Muonionalusta meteorite landed in northern Scandanavia over one million years ago. Muonionalusta meteorite is the oldest meteorite on Earth, and now you can own a piece of it - a piece of cosmic history, a symbol of the ageless expanse of the universe - sitting in the palm of your hand. This is truly an incredible, rare, and legendary upgrade to the Hoverpen 2.0

 

 

We only have 50 of these incredible pens available as Muonionalusta meteorite is so rare and difficult to acquire. If you're a student of the cosmos, or simply passionate about the universe beyond, don't miss out on bringing a mysterious piece of it to your desktop.

 

 

The meteorite on the end of the Muonionalusta Meteorite Hoverpen 2.0 is 20 million years older than the Earth itself. Not only can you now own a piece of this ancient beauty, you can write with it every day as it sits embedded onto the end of your Hoverpen. 

 

 

All Muonionalusta Meteorite pledges will come in a premium box and include every add-on from the ALL-IN pledge for free.

We're also going to include a special mystery gift for all Muonionalusta Meteorite backers - to be revealed at a later date!

For an extra $44, you can also enhance the Muonionalusta Meteorite Hoverpen 2.0 with the limited edition 18k gold plating upgrade to create a truly unmatched, legendary Hoverpen.

 

 

At Shanpo, we're not shy about our love of all things space. Science fiction, astronomy, the history of the universe - these things have made us the people we are today. When we started brainstorming what the ultimate Hoverpen would look like, we wanted it to be more than just a fantastic writing instrument and desktop marvel - we wanted it represent us and our journey. Some of our more overt inspirations include:

  • The ring of the zinc alloy pedestal is inspired by the saucer section of the USS Enterprise.
  • The landing dock on the pedestal is based on the spherical shape of planets and moons.
  • The curves of the pen itself borrows elements of famous rockets and shuttles.
  •  

 

Highly precise craftsmanship of the pedestal has the Hoverpen sitting in a ring of magnetic repulsion. Balancing against at a 23.5 degree angle, the pen itself is engineered to take a stand against gravity itself.

 

 

Our manufacturing has to be unbelievably precise, because a discrepancy of more than 1 mm in any direction will cause the pen to fall out of the ring. For this reason, we will be on the ground at the factory during production, doing product testing ourselves and assuring the top-tier quality standards our backers are used to. Our calculations need to be as flawless as a rocket scientist's prior to launch.

 

 

 

 

To really round out the experience of your Hoverpen 2.0, we've created a variety of luxury add-ons. 

To purchase an add-on, simply add the price of the add-on to your Indiegogo pledge. 

 

 

This classy decoration looks fitting next to the mysterious, shapely allure of the Hoverpen 2.0 and is just as soothing to fidget with. Spin the pen, fiddle with Saturn, and let your mind drift beyond the blue horizon.

 

 

Our beloved magnetic Shanpo notebooks are back! These notebooks are equipped with graph paper, making it the perfect notebook for engineers, designers, or drafters. They look classy, are made from high quality materials, and snap close thanks to its magnetic cover flap.

 

 

Add $20 to your pledge to pick up a branded notebook. With its dark color and magnetic flap, the Shanpo notebook is the perfect companion to the Hoverpen 2.0.

 

 

Just when you thought the Hoverpen 2.0 couldn't get any classier, we've upgraded the accent base in Hoverpen 2.0 to darkened glass. This 5mm near-black glass base reflects the artistic design of the Hoverpen 2.0, giving it a sense of luxury and prestige.

 

 

The glass accent base also comes with a metal name plate holder. Slip in a business card or name plate and express your excellent sense taste to your clients and colleagues. Whether you're a manager, sales person, lawyer or agent - this metal stand is perfect for any professional.

 

 

Add $32 to pick up the executive dark glass accent base. The dark glass accent base is studded with rubber feet, so there's no risk of scratching your desktop. You can sit back and admire the executive setting of your Hoverpen 2.0 as the dark glass reflects its dynamic, unique design.

 

 

Add $21 per Hoverpen and we'll engrave each one with a message of your choice! Messages have a maximum of 16 characters and can include symbols (such as !@#$%^&*). Letter characters must be English letters.

Pledge for the 15x bulk pledge package and you'll receive FREE engraving on every pen. The 15x pledge is the perfect gift for your team or small company - these gorgeous, custom-engraved  Hoverpen 2.0s will become the pride of your friends and employees.

 

 

This pledge level is exclusive to Indiegogo. Don't miss out on the chance to create a set of truly unique Hoverpens emblazoned with your brand or motto.

NOTE: All Hoverpens in the 15x pledge must have the same characters engraved. Custom engravings have a 15 character limit.

 

 

Add $44 to your pledge and enjoy a luxurious 18 karat gold plated upgrade to your Hoverpen 2.0. With flourishes on the tip and rim cap made from real gold, this upgraded Hoverpen 2.0 is on par with top-tier luxury pens for a fraction of the price. The price of this deluxe, limited edition upgrade is Indiegogo-exclusive - this is your only opportunity to get this gold-adorned Hoverpen at this price.

 

 

This gold plating upgrade is even available for the graphite pencil version of the Hoverpen 2.0, making it one of the most unique, exquisite pencils on the market. Stun and delight your friends and colleagues with this one-of-a-kind statement piece.

All Hoverpen 2.0 Gold pledges come with a FREE magnetic Saturn token!

You can even upgrade the Muonionalusta Meteorite Hoverpen 2.0 with the limited edition gold plating upgrade to create a truly unmatched, legendary Hoverpen.

 

 

Going on a trip? Putting the Hoverpen in your bag or briefcase? Now you can protect your investment with style.

 

 

This lightweight aluminum case is built with the same tensile strength as the pen, meaning both the case and the pen will be protected in transit. We’re also looking for ways to keep the pen fixed in place inside this gorgeous capsule so it is snug and secure inside.

We designed the aluminum carry case to be sleek and small, so it has a minimal space footprint. This add-on is available for just $22 and is an affordable, attractive way to transport your Hoverpen with finesse.

 

 

If you want multiple pens, but don’t need multiple pedestals, we are now offering an option to get a “Hoverpen 2.0 (no pedestal) + aluminum carry case” as an add-on for $54 (retail price $70). That way you can have an array of different colored Hoverpens, or both graphite and ballpoint so you can swap it out on its base as you please.

 

 

 

The first Hoverpen is now sold all over the world in high-end bookstores and jewelry stores. Our brand is now internationally known for its commitment to quality. Check out what previous backers had to say about our last campaign.

  Hoverpen 2.0: Interstellar Edition was designed to impress, resisting gravity at a 23.5 degree angle. Perfectly balanced thanks to its painstaking craftsmanship, the way Hoverpen 2.0 defies gravity makes it impossible to ignore.   Just as Earth's gravity loses its authority in space, so too does gravity flounder against Hoverpen 2.0 as it pushes back against the laws of physics.  With its new ridged design the Hoverpen 2.0 becomes a mesmerizing marvel to watch when spinning, as its circular acceleration and deceleration are now fully visible. A simple twist will send the pen spinning for up to 20 seconds in flawless, kinetic motion.  Fun to fidget, hypnotic to watch - Hoverpen 2.0 provides much needed entertainment during those dull workdays. Give it a spin, sit back, and ponder on the mysteries of the universe as the Hoverpen 2.0 revolves over and over.  According to numerous studies, task switching has been shown to improve creativity and problem solving. Researchers found that by constantly switching tasks, people improved both their convergent thinking (logical thinking) and divergent thinking (out-of-the-box thinking) when faced with creative tasks. A study by Harvard Business Review found that frequently interrupting your brainstorming with consistent micro-breaks resulted in more idea generation than no breaks.  The Hoverpen was designed around this idea. Picture the scene: you're hard at work on a new project. You arrive at a seemingly impossible problem and are mulling it over when you spot the Hoverpen on your desk and give it a spin. Over the next hour, you look up and spin the Hoverpen from time to time. Without even realizing it, you've reformatted your brain into an idea generation machine and crunch through the problem effortlessly.We designed Hoverpen as the ultimate task-switching tool. Its magnetized ring design keeps the pen suspended in place, giving it that "floating in space" flair that we know fans of sci fi and space exploration will come to love.  The casing of Hoverpen 2.0's body is crafted from a single piece of aircraft grade aluminum. It is uniquely machined as one long piece of metal - giving it it an aura of high quality craftsmanship rarely seen in other pens.   While the head is a separate screw-on - so that reloading the cartridge is possible - the rest of the pen is constructed from what we like to call a "uni-body" design.  The material for the body is carved from high quality aluminum sourced from a premium supplier. With a long-lasting aircraft grade aluminum body, Hoverpen 2.0 is designed to last for decades.  Hoverpen 2.0 also comes in a stunning premium upgrade option: 18k gold plating. These real 18k gold embellisments will take your Hoverpen 2.0 from extravagant to extraordinary. story:
Productivity experts all agree that adding a second external monitor is a huge advantage for work, study, design, or coding. A second monitor makes working with multiple documents and applications more efficient and helps overall workflow. 

However, when you grow accustomed to the ease and efficiency of working on two monitors, you will find it difficult to adjust back to single monitor use during business trips or travel.

With the BladeX, this problem becomes a thing of the past.

BladeX is one of the most lightweight and compact on-the-go external monitors available today. At under 2 pounds, it is easy to store and travel with. It’s available in 1080P and 4K high definition versions and this 15.6” monitor promises to boost your productivity by up to 50%. The BladeX is notable for its super slim 4.5mm profile and makes the perfect travel companion. Just plug into it with USB-C or HDMI and you’re ready to work with the convenience of double monitors wherever you are!

 

 

Shoot by Allen Ngo from the Notebookcheck
 






 


 

 

With USB-C and HDMI ports, BladeX can satisfy your daily screen needs on the job in every situation. A slim and compact extension monitor that serves as your business and personal travel companion.   

 

  • Stay Productive, Stay Energized
    ​

Working at home, on travel and double your productivity.
 

 These days a lot of people prefer two monitors on their desks. BladeX is a super slim 1.89 lb. monitor, perfect for turning your laptop into an optimized desktop, but in a much more compact way. Wherever you go, you can always stay productive and on task. 

 

  • Play Your Games On Big Screen​
     

​

Play your favourite game console everywhere.
 

Wherever you go, simply plug in your gaming console or smartphone and start running your favorite games. Your games become larger, more detailed and easier to play.

 

  • Turn Your Smartphone Into A Laptop​
    ​

​

Check emails and gaming on big screen.
 

Your smartphone* is an incredibly powerful computer. By connecting it to BladeX, you can do everything you can do on a laptop—and more. With desktop-class browsing, access to office applications, games, and email, the possibilities are limitless.  

* You smartphone needs to support Type-c 3.1 function.

  • Use anywhere
    ​

​

Working on your flight, coffee shop, and anywhere.
 

You can connect the BladeX to a laptop so that you can have a dual-screen setup to use at home or on-the-go. Or connect it to your smartphone or game console when traveling. It’s basically a big Surface Pro without a computer or a tiny TV without a tuner.  Even share the screen with a colleague when working remotely. It’s a great way for colleagues and remote teams to collaborate, share and increase productivity.
 

 

  • Portable 
    ​

Put this 4.5mm BladeX on our leather 
 

With an ultra-slim 4.5mm profile, BladeX is ultra-light and ultra-portable. Traveling with a monitor has never been easier.

 

  • Built-in Battery
    ​

​

The on-board battery lets you work with it everywhere
 

Its on-board 3000mAh battery delivers a solid three hours use-time between recharges.
 

  • Extra Efficient 
    ​

​

Touchscreen, USB-C PD charing and data transfer...

 

Type-C fast charging brings convenience and efficiency to your life. BladeX has two USB-C ports, one for PD charging and one for video input. The BladeX touchscreen works only with USB-C.

*BladeX 1080P supports touchscreen function through USB-C port.

 

  • One For All
     


​

Simply plug in Type-C/HDMI port, and you’re all good to extend your screen to BladeX. Laptop, iPad, smartphone, PlayStation4, NTD Switch, Xbox, you name it.

 

 

  • Landscape Mode
     

 

Versatile extension working mode
 

It broadens the view and assists with multi-tasking. You can either extend the monitor to create more productive desktop space or mirror the monitor to share the screen.

 

  • Portrait Mode 
     

Vertical mode for better reading ...
 

It stretches out the view for document reading, coding, and other extended applications.

 

  • Studio Mode
     

Flat down the BladeX  to watch video or drawing...
 

Lay the monitor down flat for a more comfortable watching/writing/drawing position, or when it’s time for entertainment!

 

 

Collected by Allen Ngo from the Notebookcheck
