Extra Efficient ​
​Touchscreen, USB-C PD charing and data transfer... Type-C fast charging brings convenience and efficiency to your life. BladeX has two USB-C ports, one for PD charging and one for video input. The BladeX touchscreen works only with USB-C.*BladeX 1080P supports touchscreen function through USB-C port. 
One For All ​Simply plug in Type-C/HDMI port, and you’re all good to extend your screen to BladeX. Laptop, iPad, smartphone, PlayStation4, NTD Switch, Xbox, you name it.  
Landscape Mode  Versatile extension working mode It broadens the view and assists with multi-tasking. You can either extend the monitor to create more productive desktop space or mirror the monitor to share the screen. 
Portrait Mode  Vertical mode for better reading ... It stretches out the view for document reading, coding, and other extended applications. 
Studio Mode Flat down the BladeX  to watch video or drawing... Lay the monitor down flat for a more comfortable watching/writing/drawing position, or when it’s time for entertainment!  Collected by Allen Ngo from the Notebookcheck

story:
CHUWI AeroBook Plus Start shipping！

 

CHUWI AeroBook Plus In Mass Production Now!

 

In 2019, the first laptop product in the CHUWI crowdfunding line – AeroBook – was introduced on Indiegogo and has been chosen by more than 10 thousands users around the world.

At the beginning of the project, we’ve received a lot of suggestions for AeroBook Plus from consumers. Apple's MacBook Pro has been considered as a benchmark for business laptop by many users, but not everyone can afford the price of MacBook Pro. CHUWI strives to refine laptops with more cost-effective prices but provide the same or even better hardware configuration. For one-third of MacBook Pro’s price, users can get even better using experience.
 

Everything we do at CHUWI, every choice we make, is inspired by what we think defines “radical innovation”. We realized that the advancements in 4K displays, size, and robust performance would benefit more than just businessmen, but anyone who is always on the go.

1. 4K Retina screen, more than 1.07 billion colour display

The most popular mobile PC form factor today is the 15.6-inch laptop. It provides a great balance of size and portability for the majority of home and office users.

Moreover, equipped with a 4K Ultra HD screen, visuals look their best, with wide viewing angles and vivid, accurate colours. 

Perfect for 2D design workflows. Apply text, graphics, colours and effects to design layouts fast and efficiently. And when it’s time to publish, you’ll have full confidence in your colours, thanks to the 4K UHD, 100% sRGB accuracy panel.

You will see sharper and clearer texts, when compared to 1080p for document processings.

 

2.Intel i5 6287U processor, the same as the Macbook Pro 

Featuring the Intel® Core™ processors seen in the MacBook pro, integrated Intel® Iris graphics and a full catalogue of high-quality, performance components, AeroBook Plus will never keep you waiting. Whether you’re creating complex documents, mining data, retouching photos, or editing videos, AeroBook Plus lets you do more — and do it quicker.

 

  • Top 4K UHD Retinal display screen

Using 15.6-inch high-spec display with a resolution of 3840x2160 up to 282PPI, AeroBook Plus can guarantee you crystal clear text as well as a vivid image.

The screen with 100% sRGB gamut uses the sRGB standard to define colour schemes, perfectly restoring the true colour.

An authentic, accurate and wider colour gamut can easily meet the visual needs of photography, design and other professional tasks. With a maximum of 340 nits brightness, the screen remains visible even outdoors.

 

  • Intel Core i5 series is equipped with professional-level Iris graphics cards.

Equipped with an Intel i5 6287U processor, dual-core, four threads, and a frequency of up to 3.5GHz, AeroBook Plus deals with complex documents efficiently, and easily handles large applications.

 

The Intel Iris Graphics 550 GPU, featuring 48 execution units (EU), ensures you a longer battery life while being able to produce stunning lifelike imagery. This next-generation technology enables you to seamlessly enjoy 4K videos, as well as large-scale online games.

 

  • Ultra-Thin Body, Full-metal Design

Having integrated high-performance hardware configurations into an ultra-thin full-metal chassis, AeroBook Plus easily fits into any office or entertainment environment. Keeping efficient productivity tools at your disposal anytime, anywhere.

 

  • 8GB DDR4 and 256GB SSD large storage

In terms of storage, AeroBook Plus features two SSD slots, a built-in 256GB SSD, the other for you to expand. The read/write speed exceeds 500MB/s, which results in a boot time of only 5 seconds and ensures faster loading of applications.

Meanwhile, You can insert up to 1TB PCIe NVMe high-speed solid-state hard disk, giving at least 3 times the performance of a traditional SATA solid-state with read/write speeds of up to 1500MB/s!

8GB DDR4 2133MHZ dual-channel RAM, easy to run large applications, switch multitasking optionally.

 

  • USB-C for ultimate flexibility

A comprehensive set of high-performance I/O ports gives AeroBook Plus the ultimate, hassle-free connectivity for versatile flexibility whether you’re in the office or on the road.

The full-featured USB-C interface, in addition to supporting PD2.0 fast charging, can also support audio and video transmission. Allowing you to connect a Hub to extend the number of ports such as HDMI, VGA, Mini DP interface, and Gigabit Ethernet port. Effortless expansion ability allows your inspiration to be shared any time.

 

  • Frost cooling system

Frost cooling system is built to dissipate heat in the limited space of a thin laptop. With high efficiency vacuum liquid cooling and a high-density copper alloy radiator, the core temperatures can be evenly distributed and dissipated faster, preventing overheating of the chassis and ensuring the delivery of performance is efficient and smooth.

 

  • Full-size keyboard with the same large pitch as traditional keyboards

Optimized key size and spacing and large keycaps allows us to achieve the same 2.4mm key distance standard as traditional keyboards.

In a limited thickness, we try to design the keystroke as deep as possible, providing familiar and precise feedback when you type.

Two levels of backlighting allows the user to easily adjust the keyboard brightness, perfect for working at night or in dark environments.

 

  • Safe fast-charging and longer-lasting battery

The large capacity high density polymer lithium battery provides up to 8 hours battery life. In addition to supporting DC charging, AeroBook Plus supports the current mainstream PD2.0 quick charge technology, the battery can be charged to 60 percent in just 1 hour. 

 

  • Faster, more stable Wi-Fi connection

AeroBook Plus includes dual-band 802.11ac Wi-Fi for a strong, stable signal and fast data-transmission speeds. As an added advantage, 802.11ac Wi-Fi is less prone to interference from other wireless devices operating on the same frequency band. It also supports Bluetooth 4.2 transmission technology to easily connect various peripheral devices such as external mice or even headphones.

 

  • Supports multiple systems

Meanwhile, it has more flexible options with the operating system. That's our surprise for you. Kindly stay tuned to our following updates. 

 

We would love you to join the AeroBook 15.6 movement and help by spreading the word on social media or telling colleagues and friends about our campaign. Any suggestions on ways in which we can improve our campaign or products, please don’t hesitate to reach out by email or social media. We would absolutely love to hear from you.

 

We are so proud of what we have created so far, but we need your support to push it over the line. As part of this campaign we formally invite you to join us on this journey to bring this product to life.

Funds raised will go directly to funding the final design process, manufacturing of the units ordered through the crowdfunding, and marketing costs.

As early backers, we were keen to reward you with some unique perks. All units claimed as perks will have at least 20% off the planned retail price and free shipping. First deliveries now start in Jun 2020 - only to AeroBook Plus Indiegogo backers.

 

Established in 2004 and located in Shenzhen of China, CHUWI has built a reputation for creating great tablet devices in our home country over the past fifteen years. We are always committed to designing and producing products that meet our customers’ requirements, allowing our supporters to enjoy our products in a new way.

 

1. Potential Delays 

We aim to provide rewards as scheduled, however, please understand that delays may occur due to supply chain or quality control issues. Including:

▲Certification delays

▲Production delays

▲Suppliers are unable to provide accessories on time

 

Currently, we have an initial prototype of the AeroBook Plus but building any new product is a huge task and there are risks involved. Our team has experience in delivering both software and hardware. Our aim is to have the product available for shipping to the first backers of our campaign in June 2020. We know this is an ambitious target but one which we truly believe is achievable with our team in place. As such, we will be providing our backers with regular updates on this progress. We know that some backers have ended badly in the past - but never from CHUWI - we’ll always keep in touch with you, and welcome any messages you wish to send.

 

2. About the product

Product specifications may change to ensure that the product is made as best as possible. If any changes occur, we will notify users in the “UPDATES” area of the crowdfunding page.

 

3. About the price

If the number of backers exceeds expectations or the exchange rate fluctuates significantly, the regular selling price may be lower than the planned selling price.

 

Since this is a crowdfunding project, please ensure you read the above points in advance.

Please, do not hesitate to contact us at crowdfunding@chuwi.com. We are looking forward to answering any of your questions. Thank you!

story:
Get Fluent In A New Language In Less Than 6 Months

A mobile app designed to unlock your ability to learn a new language & never forget it. No boring lesson plans or memorization exercises.

 

 


Rapid Language Learning Like Nothing You've Tried Before

Most language-learning tools force you to memorize translations - this type of learning makes foreign vocabulary and grammar easy to forget.

You'll learn words by associating them with images, other words, and sentences in your target language.

Everything you look at on a daily basis within the Fluent Forever App is a combination of your target language and pictures, and it's all customized to fit your specific needs.

Fluent Forever is different from typical language learning apps, lessons, and books; it changes what you're learning every day, and how you're learning it.
 


 
 
 

Yes, It Really Works!

A Proven Method With 4.5 Stars On Amazon


 


Our revolutionary method has been proven successful by thousands of language learners worldwide. Countless early customers have reached fluency in their target language by using the resources detailed in our best-selling book, which has sold over 160,000 copies and is currently available in 12 languages (and counting!). 
 


 

“As someone who struggled to learn Dutch with Tell me More, Rosetta Stone, Pimsleur, Duolingo, and numerous online websites, Fluent Forever is what finally got me to a place where I can maintain conversations with my husband's family in exclusively Dutch. My husband didn't even know I started using Fluent Forever and commented after only a few months of the Fluent Forever techniques that my Dutch progress had skyrocketed!”
- Jackye L.

“It truly opened doors for me. I considered foreign languages a chore when younger, but as trite as it sounds, using his method with the ANKI makes it almost a game.”
- Paul M.

“I'm happy to tell you that Fluent Forever changed my life...I've made far more progress than I ever did before. Being conversational is no longer a dream.”
- Roger A.

 

As Seen In

 

Just 30 Minutes A Day Can Get You Fluent In 6 Months

 

Word Association Makes New Words Easier To Recall

Fluent Forever helps you quickly learn and retain new words by its unique word association system based on memory-optimization research. Rather than teach you words by a theme (like colors), which delivers the worst retention results, Fluent Forever places words in actual environments where the word would naturally be used.

For example: instead of learning "green" by tediously memorizing a list of all colors, you would learn "green" within a scene that features a prominent green-colored item, like a green frog sitting on a green lily pad on a pond surrounded by green grass. 

Learning "green" by context instead of thematic category makes a word more than 100% faster to memorize and also ensures the best retention. Fluent Forever's purposeful word association means you're learning several words at the same time with the best retention instead of just one with mediocre retention!

 

Learn At Your Own Pace

No one learns the same. Pick easy, medium, or difficult-level phrases and recordings to learn at your own pace.

Use a photo from your own albums, or access our innovative, easy-to-use image search engine. Great for visual learners!

Create tools to help you learn different elements of language: vocab, conjugations, or word order. Automatically receive customized lessons based on your learning.

Save yourself time by accessing our community database of approved user-generated content. All content approved by our staff and native speakers.

Have questions about grammar or vocabulary? Native speakers are there to help you get answers to your questions in-app!


 

“Starting with pronunciation is genius. Pure and simple. [...] I believe that I am learning Spanish in a way that makes sense for me in ways that a classroom setting never did. [It’s] a language teaching method that is based on the logic of how people learn language.”
- Marsha M.

 

Easily Push Information Into Long-Term Memory

We use the most powerful learning tool: The Spaced Repetition System. This means we'll show you and test you on words we know you're going to forget before you've forgotten them. This process rapidly pushes those words into your long term memory.

The app will walk you through a series of choices: which words do you want to learn? What sentences will you use to learn them? What pictures do you want for each word? While you're making those choices, you're learning your target language.

The app automatically prepares customized, fully immersive flashcards for future review.

It knows which words you’re going to forget and tests you on them beforehand. You learn vocab and grammar in the process of creating your own tools.

You'll learn via a three-step process.
 


 

You need to learn what a language sounds like before you can learn how to speak it. This trains your ears in the sound system of your new language.
 

 


 

Quickly understand thousands of words and phrases through Fluent Forever's word association methods. You'll learn grammar through immersive stories, not boring lessons.

You'll never be forced to learn words or grammar you don’t need.
 

 

Quickly maneuver through your personalized content and study tools to retain everything that you've learned.


 

“I am actually thinking in Spanish which is amazing. I have tried other products such as DuoLingo and Babbel, but none of them had me thinking in Spanish.”
- Dave R.
 

What Languages Will It Support?

Spanish (Latin American), French, German, Italian, Russian, Korean, English, Spanish (Castilian), Portuguese, Dutch, Hebrew, Arabic, Japanese, Chinese (Mandarin), more coming soon!


 

“My progress has been pretty remarkable in terms of efficiency...When I went to study abroad in Spain this summer, they put me in the highest class at two different programs. I think I'd had about 7 actual Spanish lessons at that point.”
 - Nick P.
 

 

Compatible With iOS And Android


 

About Us

Fluent Forever, Inc. came into being as a result of a 2013 Kickstarter campaign to create pronunciation training tools that worked in concert with Gabriel Wyner’s book, Fluent Forever. That Kickstarter campaign was initially designed to be a short, $10,000 fundraising effort to design some simple pronunciation resources, but ended up raising $96,000 and expanding to 65 different products over the following 3.5 years. Demand for those products never stopped after the 2013 Kickstarter, and so The Fluent Forever company grew up in order to meet its customer's needs. In September of 2017, it launched a second Kickstarter to create a single app that automates the entire Fluent Forever method. Within its first 6 days, that Kickstarter became the most funded app Kickstarter of all time.



 

Frequently Asked Questions

How many months do I need to learn a language?

That'll depend on two things: how much time you're studying every day, and how challenging your language is. 

Based on my own experiences, if you're studying for ~45 min/day and you're an English native speaker, you should be able to reach a fairly solid level of fluency (CEFR levels B2/C1) in the following amounts of time:

  • 6 months: Level 1 languages (Closely related to English): Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch. German is a level 1.5 language, so ~9 months.
  • 12 months: Level 2 languages (Significantly different from English): Russian, Hebrew (If we get support for all languages, this category would also include things like Hindi, Icelandic, Greek, Hungarian, Turkish, Urdu)
  • 24 months: Level 3 languages (Very different from English): Korean, Japanese, Mandarin, Arabic


 

About

What is Fluent Forever? 
The first app that can take you all the way to fluency in your language of choice.

Who Created it?
Gabriel Wyner - the author of the book, Fluent Forever

Why should we use it?
For anyone who has ever wanted to learn a language and failed, this is the tool that will finally bring you to fluency.

How much does it cost?
$90 will bring you to fluency in a closely related language like French or Spanish

Where can we buy it?
On Indiegogo InDemand

What do we get when we order?
Early access to the app along with our groundbreaking Pronunciation Trainer and Sentence List in your language of choice

Why are you crowdfunding?
We're crowdfunding to finance development of the app

Who should I contact for press?.
Please email us here: corinne@leeandlondon.com

Tech Specs

What is the uniqueness of the technology?
This is the first app designed to teach you how to *think* in your target language instead of translating.

How does it work?
It uses Minimal Pair Testing to train your ears and teach pronunciation, followed by a flashcard customization process that allows you to learn a language while staying in control of your own learning process. The flashcards you create are put into a Spaced Repetition System to rapidly push words and grammar into your long term memory.

Will there be updates to it in the future?
Yes, we'll keep it current with the latest updates to iOS and Android, and continually add language support and grow our databases of proofread sentences.

How does it integrate with other connected devices?
It will sync with your iOS and Android devices. We will be looking into additional platforms as we move forward.

About The App

Does it have an app? Which phones does it work with?
It's an iOS/Android native app.

Can we also access app functions on a web browser?
Some of the app functionality (adding sentences and managing your subscription, in particular) will be accessible via your web browser. 

What can we expect from the app?
This will be the most effective language learning tool on the market.
 

Safety And Regulation 

What are the recommended ages?
The app should be relatively easy to learn. We’re working with our lawyers to figure out recommended ages (we’ll probably land on ages 13+, in part due to legal concerns about keeping flashcard data from minors under 13).

Will this benefit my kids?
Learning a language is one of the greatest gifts you can give a kid. Aside from giving them a new ability to communicate with more people, it has a ton of documented side benefits, ranging from better test scores in all core subjects, better problem solving abilities, higher salaries once they reach the job market, etc. 

Where can I use it?
You can use it anywhere. You'll need an internet connection to actively create new flashcards, but you can review your old flashcards offline.

How is my privacy protected?
We'll be keeping user data secure, both on their phones and in connections with our servers. We're early in design, so the specific technologies we'll be using to keep data secure are still getting decided.

How secure is it?
We'll be keeping user data secure, both on their phones and in connections with our servers. We're early in design, so the specific technologies we'll be using to keep data secure are still getting decided.

Can someone watch or listen to me?
No, we don't monitor users in that way!

Are there any risks associated with use?
No.
 

Credits:

Many thanks to the extraordinary members of the Fluent Forever team, who have been putting in long hours to get this project (and the last one) ready!

To my readers and backers, I love you. Thank you.

[...] I believe that I am learning Spanish in a way that makes sense for me in ways that a classroom setting never did. [It’s] a language teaching method that is based on the logic of how people learn language.”- Marsha M. Easily Push Information Into Long-Term MemoryWe use the most powerful learning tool: The Spaced Repetition System. This means we'll show you and test you on words we know you're going to forget before you've forgotten them. This process rapidly pushes those words into your long term memory.The app will walk you through a series of choices: which words do you want to learn? What sentences will you use to learn them? What pictures do you want for each word? While you're making those choices, you're learning your target language.The app automatically prepares customized, fully immersive flashcards for future review.It knows which words you’re going to forget and tests you on them beforehand. You learn vocab and grammar in the process of creating your own tools.You'll learn via a three-step process.  You need to learn what a language sounds like before you can learn how to speak it. This trains your ears in the sound system of your new language.   Quickly understand thousands of words and phrases through Fluent Forever's word association methods. You'll learn grammar through immersive stories, not boring lessons.You'll never be forced to learn words or grammar you don’t need.  Quickly maneuver through your personalized content and study tools to retain everything that you've learned. “I am actually thinking in Spanish which is amazing. I have tried other products such as DuoLingo and Babbel, but none of them had me thinking in Spanish.”- Dave R. What Languages Will It Support?Spanish (Latin American), French, German, Italian, Russian, Korean, English, Spanish (Castilian), Portuguese, Dutch, Hebrew, Arabic, Japanese, Chinese (Mandarin), more coming soon! “My progress has been pretty remarkable in terms of efficiency...When I went to study abroad in Spain this summer, they put me in the highest class at two different programs. I think I'd had about 7 actual Spanish lessons at that point.” - Nick P.  Compatible With iOS And Android About UsFluent Forever, Inc. came into being as a result of a 2013 Kickstarter campaign to create pronunciation training tools that worked in concert with Gabriel Wyner’s book, Fluent Forever. That Kickstarter campaign was initially designed to be a short, $10,000 fundraising effort to design some simple pronunciation resources, but ended up raising $96,000 and expanding to 65 different products over the following 3.5 years. Demand for those products never stopped after the 2013 Kickstarter, and so The Fluent Forever company grew up in order to meet its customer's needs. In September of 2017, it launched a second Kickstarter to create a single app that automates the entire Fluent Forever method. Within its first 6 days, that Kickstarter became the most funded app Kickstarter of all time. Frequently Asked QuestionsHow many months do I need to learn a language?That'll depend on two things: how much time you're studying every day, and how challenging your language is. Based on my own experiences, if you're studying for ~45 min/day and you're an English native speaker, you should be able to reach a fairly solid level of fluency (CEFR levels B2/C1) in the following amounts of time:

6 months: Level 1 languages (Closely related to English): Spanish, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Dutch. German is a level 1.5 language, so ~9 months.

12 months: Level 2 languages (Significantly different from English): Russian, Hebrew (If we get support for all languages, this category would also include things like Hindi, Icelandic, Greek, Hungarian, Turkish, Urdu)

24 months: Level 3 languages (Very different from English): Korean, Japanese, Mandarin, Arabic

 AboutWhat is Fluent Forever? The first app that can take you all the way to fluency in your language of choice.Who Created it?Gabriel Wyner - the author of the book, Fluent ForeverWhy should we use it?For anyone who has ever wanted to learn a language and failed, this is the tool that will finally bring you to fluency.How much does it cost? $90 will bring you to fluency in a closely related language like French or SpanishWhere can we buy it?On Indiegogo InDemandWhat do we get when we order?Early access to the app along with our groundbreaking Pronunciation Trainer and Sentence List in your language of choiceWhy are you crowdfunding?We're crowdfunding to finance development of the appWho should I contact for press?.Please email us here: corinne@leeandlondon.comTech SpecsWhat is the uniqueness of the technology?This is the first app designed to teach you how to *think* in your target language instead of translating.How does it work?It uses Minimal Pair Testing to train your ears and teach pronunciation, followed by a flashcard customization process that allows you to learn a language while staying in control of your own learning process. The flashcards you create are put into a Spaced Repetition System to rapidly push words and grammar into your long term memory.Will there be updates to it in the future?Yes, we'll keep it current with the latest updates to iOS and Android, and continually add language support and grow our databases of proofread sentences.How does it integrate with other connected devices? It will sync with your iOS and Android devices. We will be looking into additional platforms as we move forward.About The AppDoes it have an app? Which phones does it work with?It's an iOS/Android native app.Can we also access app functions on a web browser? Some of the app functionality (adding sentences and managing your subscription, in particular) will be accessible via your web browser. What can we expect from the app?This will be the most effective language learning tool on the market. Safety And Regulation What are the recommended ages?The app should be relatively easy to learn. We’re working with our lawyers to figure out recommended ages (we’ll probably land on ages 13+, in part due to legal concerns about keeping flashcard data from minors under 13).Will this benefit my kids?Learning a language is one of the greatest gifts you can give a kid. Aside from giving them a new ability to communicate with more people, it has a ton of documented side benefits, ranging from better test scores in all core subjects, better problem solving abilities, higher salaries once they reach the job market, etc. Where can I use it?You can use it anywhere. You'll need an internet connection to actively create new flashcards, but you can review your old flashcards offline.How is my privacy protected?We'll be keeping user data secure, both on their phones and in connections with our servers. We're early in design, so the specific technologies we'll be using to keep data secure are still getting decided.How secure is it?We'll be keeping user data secure, both on their phones and in connections with our servers. We're early in design, so the specific technologies we'll be using to keep data secure are still getting decided.Can someone watch or listen to me?No, we don't monitor users in that way!Are there any risks associated with use?No. Credits:Many thanks to the extraordinary members of the Fluent Forever team, who have been putting in long hours to get this project (and the last one) ready!To my readers and backers, I love you. Thank you.

story:
T500 Pro, the World's First and Smallest Dual-Port SSD

The T500 Pro is built for ultimate speed and convenience. At only 16 grams in weight and 76 mm in length, it is the World's Smallest Dual-Port Ultrafast SSD with Built-in USB-A and USB-C Gen 3.2, created to satisfy all your portable storage needs!

With cordless built-in USB-C and USB-A Gen 3.2, it is compatible with your mobile phone, laptop, camera, Xbox, etc, enabling you to unleash your creative boundaries!

The Tiburn T500 is the World's first Dual Port SSD with Built-In USB-A and USB-C. Our first-in-class design enables you to switch ports with a simple push, allowing you to edit and store anytime and anywhere, satisfying all your portable storage needs. 

With the T500 Pro, say goodbye to redundant cords and adapters once and for all!

Revolutionary Built-in USB-C & USB-A Gen 3.2 Dual Port

No more redundant wires and adapters needed!

 

Powered by the latest USB 3.2 GEN 2, the Tiburn T500 Pro has stable read and write speeds of 550MB/s, 4X faster than your HDD. It takes less than 10 seconds to transfer a 3GB 4K video on the T500 PRO, maximizing your efficiency at work or play.

NAND Type: 3D NAND TLC / 3D NAND MLC (Limited Edition)

The Tiburn T500 Pro is the world's smallest SSD - 1/3 the size of a credit card and weighing in at only 16 grams. The T500 Pro is your ideal everyday carry no matter where your day takes you!

The T500 Pro is a Custom SSD. Through our innovative chip design, we were able to deliver the speed and performance of an SSD at a fraction of the size. If you have any questions regarding technical specifications of the T500 Pro, please feel free to reach out to harry@tiburn.tech and we are more than happy to help!

See Below: Chip Design Diagram + Interior of the T500 Pro

d

​ Every T500 comes with built-in TiSecure Encryption. The TiSecure Encryption technology uses the AES256 encryption algorithm, the same Advanced Encryption Standard used by the US Federal Government. Full-disk encryption ensures the safety of your files even if the drive is lost. Using WINDOWS TO GO, you can store the entire Windows operating system in the T500, allowing you to access it from any computer, even on a MAC, giving you access to the best of both worlds. T500’s ultrafast transmission enables a true plug-and-use experience, meeting your needs for work on the go. 

 

T500 Pro’s casing is made with aircraft-grade aluminum alloy, going through more than ten steps of craft to render the dreamy colors of Midnight Black, Aurora Purple, and Lightning Blue. 

Under the light, the casing casts beams of dreamy starlight, bringing you space for boundless wonder and imagination...

Available in 3 Exclusive Colors

Tritium – With a global supply of 11 kg, it is rarer than diamonds. Each T500 Tritium Edition is equipped with a Blue Tritium Tube imported from Switzerland, with the ability to consecutively shine for 24 years (self-illuminating)

The T500 Pro Tritium Edition is also equipped with the MLC chip, delivering you highly stable transfer speeds and extended product lifespan.

The T500 Pro Tritium Edition is only available in the 1TB setup

Limited to 100 Units Worldwide

We are production-ready! Our product has been tested and our factories are already all geared up awaiting your orders! We began our preparations for mass production in February 2021 and we decided to launch our campaign after we are production-ready so you can purchase with peace of mind. 

Building Your Visions, Creating Reality.

Since 2018, we have been striving to create tech that transcends the boundaries between pop culture and consumer electronics. We have created fan favorites including the Star Trek Enterprise Gaming PC and the Star Trek D1 USB (both coming to Indiegogo in 2021!) Check out our portfolio below and stay tuned for our new drops!

The Tiburn Star Trek U.S.S Enterprise Gaming PC

The Tiburn U.S.S Enterprise Gaming PC is the first-ever Star Trek officially licensed gaming PC. Built with the Intel Z390 Gaming Motherboard, 9th Gen Intel Core, and Nividia GeForce RTX, the U.S.S Enterprise PC is one of the most powerful gaming PCs built for maximum performance and flawless gameplay.

(Coming soon on Indiegogo in 2021 - Stayed Tuned!!)

The Tiburn Star Trek D1 USB

Display your allegiance to the fleet with the Tibrun D1 USB! The D1 USB is a portable disk that enables you to take store more and discover more. With its full aluminum build and versatile size, you can even wear it as a badge! LLAP, Trekkies!

 (Coming soon on Indiegogo in 2021 - Stayed Tuned!!)

story:
GPD WIN 2's processor is not powerful enough to run the latest AAA gaming titles, and its mouse + keyboard control mode is deemed somewhat inconvenient for playing online games. All these disadvantages make it hard to call WIN 2 a full-featured gaming console.

In view of the above, we want to create something completely new: An ALL IN ONE product that combines the portability of a handheld and the graphics performance of a gaming laptop. We named it "WIN Max". Because such a product requires processor that is highly efficient and powerful, we have been kept waiting for the right product to appear.

Initially we considered using AMD's mobile processor Ryzen 5 2500U. However, after the release of Intel's 10th generation Ice Lake-U, we found that with the 10nm process, 15W TDP, 4 cores and 8 threads, twice the number of transistors (compared to the previous generation) and 6MB L3 cache, this product is superior to AMD Ryzen 5 2500U in terms of overall performance. In particular, Intel's 11th-generation Iris Plus Graphics 940, as an integrated graphics chip featuring lower power consumption and heat dissipation, actually performs in 3DMark 11 nearly as good as NVIDIA GeForce MX250, a discrete graphics chip. Considering the above (especially Intel AMD integrated graphics for the first time), we finally decided to go with the Intel solution. Considering the above (especially Intel having better integrated graphics than AMD for the first time), we finally decided to use the Intel solution.

 

As a product that is focused on gaming, WIN Max needs to be tough and durable. As such, we've decided to give it an upper cover made of CNC magnesium aluminum alloy and a main body made of LG-DOW 121H aviation-grade anti-shock ABS synthetic resin. The final product features 1.3mm shell thickness, high temperature resistance, Class V-0 fire resistance, 109R Rockwell hardness, 26000kg/cm2 bending resistance, an intact rate of 92% in 5m drop tests.

The button of the machine is curved with chamfered edges, 49.7% of which is hollowed-out for air intake. And foot pads of 3mm height are attached to the bottom of the machine to avoid obstruction of air flow.

On the back of the machine, there are L1 / L2 and R1 / R2 buttons on both sides, various ports in the middle (Type-C, Thunderbolt 3, USB A 3.1 × 2, HDMI), and 9 air outlets below the hinge (to avoid hinge blocking air-flow).


 

  • Only PC gaming console in the world that can fit in your hand;
  • Capable of running AAA games at 60Hz with medium settings;
  • 8-inch H-IPS screen featuring the fifth-generation Corning gorilla glass, 33% more screen real estate compared to last generation model, 90% DCI-P3 wide color gamut, DC dimming without flickering, 500nits brightness;
  • Intel 10th generation 10nm Core ™ i5-1035G7 processor, which out-performs i7-4790K, the 4th-gen flagship processor;
  • Intel's 11th-generation Iris Plus 940 Graphics, with graphics performance close to NVIDIA GeForce MX250;
  • Dual ssd sockets (Socket 3 / Socket 2) for unlimited storage expansion, support M.2 NVMe / AHCI 2280, with sequential read / write speeds exceeding 2000MB/s;
  • Dual-channel 16G LPDDR4X 3733 memory with read and write speeds exceeding 60GB / s;
  • With built-in Thunderbolt 3 port, you can connect to two 4K/60Hz monitors at the same time or an external eGFX to achieve the best gaming performance;
  • Built-in HDMI 2.0b HD audio/video interface, supports HDR and Intel SGX technology, can output 4K/60Hz UHD BD video;
  • With the latest Wi-Fi 6 technology, you can surf the web at the speed of 300MB/s, 2.77 times faster than 5G Wi-Fi speed;
  • Support Bluetooth 5.0 with transmission speed up to 3MB/s, 1-meter precise positioning, long distance communication at 300 meters and connection with up to 7 Bluetooth devices;
  • 3 × 5000mAh / 57Wh high capacity polymer lithium battery, supports heavy use for 3 hours, moderate use for 6 ~ 8 hours and light use for 14 hours;
  • Three-stage adjustable TDP (15W, 20W, 25W) for applications in different scenarios. With 25W TDP, the performance of the machine greatly surpasses other products on the market with the same configuration.  
  • Newly designed gamepad with split arrow keys, anti-slip sink-in joystick and L3/R3 functions (by pressing down);
  • Dual desktop-grade turbine fans + dual cooling pipes, high displacement side-blow design, 9 ventilation holes for fast heat dissipation;
  • 65W super-fast charger supporting PD 3.0 protocol, which can charge multiple devices such as mobile phones, tablets, notebooks at the same time.

 

Report link

Venturebeat        liliputing       Techbang       Hexus       Stealthoptional       Mspoweruser

Techquila       Gizchina       Web24       Io-tech       Notebookcheck

 

 

 

 

We believe most people know the Smatch Z handheld game console which is based on AMD Embedded APU, you probably also know the UFO handheld released by Alienware, a sub-brand of Dell at CES 2020.The following table is a comparison between WIN Max and Alienware UFO (Dell company only demonstrated this product at CES, but it has not been mass-produced) and Smatch Z:

 

 

From the table we can see the core graphics card of V1605B used by Smatch Z is based on Vega 8, Alienware UFO uses the same Ice Lake processor as WIN Max, but no specific model number has been determined.

 

 

Compared to the last-gen model, WIN Max with its high-performing Iris Plus Graphics 940, can run games at significantly higher frame rates. The following table shows the benchmarking results in some games (1280 × 800 resolution, default settings):

 

 

* Description: Testing environment: i5-1035G7 / 16GB LPDDR4X 3733 / 512GB NVMe SSD / 1280 × 800 / Windows 10 Home version 1909.

 

 

 

 

 

WIN Max uses an 8-inch H-IPS panel protected by fifth-generation Corning Gorilla glass.  Other features of the screen include in-cell full lamination, 33% more screen real estate compared to last generation model, 90% DCI-P3 wide color gamut, DC dimming without flickering, 500nits brightness, twice the pixel density of a 24-inch / 1080P display, a horizontal viewing angle of 178 °, 10-point touch support, a default resolution of 1280 × 800 (perfect for playing classic games under 1024 × 768 resolution (4: 3)).

How could an 8-inch 1280×800 screen be better in clarity than a regular laptop screen?

It's not that larger screen size and higher resolution automatically mean better clarity! We use "PPI" (the number of pixels per inch) to indicate the correspondence between screen size and resolution, and PPI is the determining factor for screen sharpness. The higher the PPI, the more pixels to be displayed, meaning the screen looks less grainy. The following are PPI values of common laptop screens:

 

 

As can be seen from the above figure, the PPI of WIN Max exceeds that of common laptops currently on the market. Players do not need to worry about the display quality of WIN Max, because the clarity of its panel is clearly better than that of an ordinary laptop!

 

 

In terms of built-in joysticks, WIN Max adopts the sink-in design and Xinput mode of the game controller. The ultra-durable dual 3D joysticks produced by Japan Alps, can be used as L3 / R3 buttons (support 360 ° rotation) after pressing down. In terms of working life, the potentiometer and center stack of the joystick can be used for 2 million and 5 million spins respectively. To avoid finger-slipping during gaming, the joysticks have curved rocker caps made of hard materials with strong resistance (the right joystick is in the same position as that of GPD WIN).

 

 

In terms of the D-pad, WIN Max uses the split arrow key layout of the PS4 controller to facilitate subtle precise movement. The ABXY buttons are still made with double layer silk-printing, with appropriate spacing between the buttons that facilitates comfortable pressing without errors.

 

 

The L1 / L2 R1 / R2 buttons all have highly-reliable Panasonic micro switches, with mechanical service life reaching 10 million times and electrical service life reaching 100,000 times, and operating temperature of -54 ~ 177 degrees Celsius.

 

 

Select, Start buttons are located near the top hinge to facilitate operation with left thumb. Clicking the button while streaming an game can turn on / off the joystick and activate functions such as "back to home", "long press to turn off", "screen capture", "snap to position".

 

 

Online game players love good keyboards and WIN 2's pan-shaped keyboard can't meet their requirements due to problems such as narrow pitches, short key stroke and lack of tactile feeling. In view of these problems, we decided to use a scissor-shaped membrane keyboard when designing WIN Max, and even had to increase the screen frame for this purpose.

 

 

Especially for the two sets of keys ("QWER" and "ASDF") most commonly used by players, in order to achieve desktop-level tactile feeling, the size of the buttons cannot be reduced. Under these circumstances, WIN Max adopts a standard "QWERTY" chiclet-style full keyboard layout with backlight, making it easy to transform the machine into a perfect mini-gaming laptop by connecting an external mouse.

 

 

But what if you want to play some games but don't have a mouse with you. It's simple, just turn the “mouse / joystick” switch on the side of machine to immediately transform the joystick into a track point and L1 / R1 buttons into the left / right mouse button, so that you can use the machine as a handheld, making it fit for more usage scenarios.

Even without the mouse / joystick switch function, WIN Max also has a built-in touchpad, which supports gestures with up to three-fingers and push-down operations.

No matter games playing or office working and No matter holding by both hands or putting on desktop.The built-in gamepads&touchpad can meet your operation requirements.

 

 

To improve thermal performance, WIN Max adopts the cooling solution of PC-class twin turbo fans + dual heat pipes. With dual heat pipes + high-power turbo fans, high-displacement side-blowing design, 9-hole ultra-short-distance ventilation, WIN Max can reach a hot air exhaust efficiency 8 times higher than that of WIN 2.

 

 

When the internal temperature is between 20 ℃ ~ 80 ℃. the BIOS can dynamically adjust the fan speed from 2700 ~ 6300 RPM based on the preset 70 temperature control levels.

At the same time, the BIOS also contains three TDP (15W, 20W, 25W) schemes for gamers to choose, which helps to achieve the best energy efficiency ratio and heat dissipation effect in practical applications.

 

 

WIN Max uses Intel 10th Generation Core ™ i5-1035G7 processor. With the help of 10nm processing technology, this CPU has a transistor density of 100MTr / mm², double that of a cup using the 14nm process. Other notable features of this processor include 4-core 8-thread design, 1.2GHz reference frequency, 3.7GHz Turbo frequency, 2MB L2 cache, 6MB L3 cache, 4 GT / s OPI bus speed.

How does the I5-1035G7 compare to other processors in performance? You can find out by looking at the following CPU benchmarks (PerformanceTest 9):

 

 

So how about its single-core and multi-core performance? Here are its benchmark results in CPU-Z:

 

 

The single / multi-core performance of I5-1035G7 has surpassed i7-4790K, the Intel 4th generation desktop flagship CPU, reaching a level close to that of i7-6700K. By comparison, the m3-8100Y processor used by GPD WIN 2 is quite weak in performance.

 

 

WIN Max's built-in i5-1035G7 SoC integrates the 11th-gen Iris Plus Graphics 940 which has 64 EU execution units, more than double the number of EUs in the 9.5-gen integrated graphics chips (up to 24EUs). With a base frequency of 300MHz and a maximum dynamic frequency of 1.05GHz, this display chip can perform one trillion floating-point calculations per second, 2.67 times higher than that of 9.5th-gen integrated graphics chip. Compared with the last-gen chips, this display chip has achieved a qualitative leap in performance, energy efficiency, 3D, media and gaming performance.

The following table shows the performance of several mainstream graphics chips in 3DMark 11 at the resolution of 1280 × 800:

 

 

As seen from the figure above, the performance of Iris Plus Graphics 940 is slightly higher than that of GeForce MX150 (a mainstream dedicated graphics card), very close to that of GeForce MX250 and nearly 4 times higher than that of GPD WIN 2. The aforementioned benchmarking results represent performance when using the built-in screen. When using an external display, the actual performance of WIN Max in World of Warcraft, DOTA2, and LOL is as follows:

  • World of Warcraft: Under highest graphics settings, the game runs at the frame rate of more than 80 with 1080P resolution and 50 ~ 60 with 4K resolution (maintaining at 35 during 5V5 team battles).
  • DOTA2: At 4K resolution and 4 "render quality" levels, the game runs at the frame rate of: 60 FPS, 45 FPS, 31 FPS and 11 FPS.
  • LOL: At 1080P resolution and “high” graphics quality, the game runs at frame rate ranging from 60 to 95 FPS, averaging about 80 FPS.

 

 

Memory frequency is an important factor affecting reading and writing speed and a system using high frequency memory can run games more smoothly. In the case of GPD WIN Max, 16GB of LPDDR4X 3733, the fastest low-power memory currently on the market, and dual-channel design jointly ensure that it can meet the needs of the latest games.

The following table shows the memory benchmark results of LPDDR3-1866, LPDDR3-2133, LPDDR4X-2400, LPDDR4X-3200 and LPDDR4X-3733 in AIDA64:

 

 

* The results of the Read, Write and Copy tests in Aida64 were all obtained in dual-channel mode.

We can see that WIN Max performs better than Surface Pro 7 which also uses LPDDR4X 3733 memory, the main reason for which is that WIN Max uses active cooling, which can effectively prevent reduction of memory frequency caused by the CPU throttling due to overheat. WIN 2 has the worst performance because its memory is not as good as the other two products.

In practical applications, LPDDR4X 3733 is obviously better than other products. Taking 4K video output and gaming (League of Legends) as an example:

 

 

* Note: A 2.4GB 4K video file (with compression) and the game League of Legends were used in the tests, results will vary between platforms!

 

 

WIN Max allows users to replace the built-in SSD installed in the M.2 NVMe / AHCI dual protocol interface. However, due to space constraints, WIN Max only supports single-sided M.2 2280 SSDs (such as Samsung 970 EVO Plus) and does not support double-sided SSDs such as Lenovo NGFF SL700. Please pay attention to the distinction between the two when replacing the SSD.

 

 

WIN Max's built-in SSD has excellent read and write performance. The following table shows the SSD performance comparison between WIN Max and three products with the same configuration:

 

 

* Test software: CrystalDiskMark 6.02 x64;
* Test environment: 1065G7 / 1035G7, 16GB LPDDR, 256GB / 512GB SSD;
* The test results may vary slightly between different versions of CrystalDiskMark.  Heat dissipation has a significant impact on the reading and writing performance.

SSDs with faster read and write speed can load games faster and make games run more smoothly. In terms of specific performance, the sequential read / write speed of WIN Max far exceeds that of other products with the same configuration (Microsoft Surface Pro 7 has the worst performance), and the gap between its read / write speeds is also smaller. In terms of 4K read and write performance, there is no clear winner among the products.

 

 

We didn't ditch the micro SDXC card slot because the machine supports large-capacity SSDs. WIN Max supports A2 Class Micro SDXC card, which features minimum random read and write IOPS of 4000/2000, and theoretical read and write speeds up to 170MB / s and 90MB / s respectively, nearly twice those of A1 class cards. At the same time, the card slot supports SD card with a maximum capacity of 2TB. The following figure shows the read and write speeds of two SanDisk micro SDXC cards:

 

 

* Notes:

C10, U1, A1 Sandisk (model: SDSQUNC-128G-ZN6MA) cards tested in WIN 2 (supports A1 class cards). 

C10, U3, V30, A2. SanDisk (model: SDSQXA1-128G-ZN6MA) cards tested in WIN Max (supports A2 class cards).
 

 

To support 4K 60Hz video output, WIN Max ditches the processor's built-in HDMI 1.4 controller, and is instead equipped with an independent HDMI 2.0b controller that supports 18Gbps bandwidth, up to 32 audio channels, 48bit maximum color depth and HDR.

Many people buy the latest HDR 4K / 60Hz monitors or TVs to watch Ultra HD Blu-ray-compliant UHD BD. However, all systems using the AMD solution and some using the Intel solutions cannot play UHD BDs with copyright restrictions. The reason is that only Intel processors that support SGX security technology can play such UHD BDs.

 

 

After understanding the reasons above, please stop using the traditional Ultra HD Blu-ray DVD players because by using WIN Max equipped with faster USB and Lan ports as well as the 1035G7 with built-in Intel SGX technology, Iris Plus Graphics 940 GPU supports FP16 HDR anti-aliasing display, supports HDR10 format and Dolby Vision, supports high quality encoder for HEVC(H.265) and VP9, supports BT2020 color gamut. Each performance can reach the standard of Sony UBP-X700 blu-ray DVD player. you can easily play online or downloaded UHD BD movies by connecting it to a 4K HDR TV via HDMI!

 

 

The best feature of WIN Max is the addition of a Thunderbolt 3 port. With the transmission rate of 40Gbps, 8 times that of USB 3.0 and 2.22 times that of HDMI 2.0b, this port can support 2 external 4K / 60Hz monitors at the same time. When playing games, WIN Max can be connected to any Thunderbolt 3 eGFX enclosure, so that the dedicated desktop graphics card (including NVIDIA graphics cards that support 3D stereo mirrors and virtual reality technology) in that enclosure can be used to further enhance the gaming experience.

 

 

* Notes: eGFX refers to a standard proposed by Intel for a complete set of external graphics solutions that covers various components such as power supply, motherboard, graphics card, and interface while eGPU only refers to the external graphics card. Currently in the retail market, eGFX products have many names, including eGPU, graphics dock, external graphics enclosure, external graphics dock and so on.

In addition to using eGFX products, Thunderbolt 3, which supports ultra-high-speed two-way data transmission and 65W charging, has many other extended use cases, including:

1. Using any 65W Type-C adapter to charge WIN Max.

 

 

2. To charge WIN Max when outputting high-definition video signals to any display through the USB Type-C interface. WIN Max does not need to charge through its USB Type-C charging port when connected to such external monitors, which means that WIN Max can do charging and video output at the same time with just one Thunderbolt 3 cable!

 

 

3. The Thunderbolt 3 port of WIN Max (power on) can be used to charge mobile phones, tablets and other devices charge.

 

 

4. To achieve 4K / 60Hz output through HDMI connection. Thunderbolt 3 supports simultaneous connection of two 4K / 60Hz displays through HDMI ports.

 

5. Support for many protocols (USB 3.1, Thunderbolt 1, Thunderbolt 2, DisplayPort, PCI express) and 40Gbps bus speed make Thunderbolt 3 the best port for various storage peripherals. For example, using Thunderbolt 3 to connect solid state drives can help the hard drives to achieve maximum read and write speeds.

Real-world test shows that the read and write speeds of a connected Samsung X5 (model name: MU-PB1T0B / WW) can reach 2800MB / s and 2300MB / s respectively.

 

* Notes: In order to achieve maximum speed, the external ssd hard drives must have built-in support for PCI-E bus.

6. Due to limitation of built-in storage, many people choose to purchase public cloud space, but platforms that operate cloud storage face risks from government suppression and service provider defaults and data leakage. In this case, more and more people are starting to use NAS and use its BT and PT functions to download and backup games, Blu-ray movies, etc. and retrieve resources from the NAS through LAN or WAN connections.

However, even in a gigabit LAN network environment, it still takes quite a while to copy a game with hundreds of GBs from a NAS, not to mention that many enterprises are still using 100M switches (12.5MB/s). Fortunately, with the Thunderbolt 3 port of WIN Max, you can connect 10 Gigabit network switches to achieve 10 times the transmission speed of Gigabit network.

 

 

* Notes: In order to achieve 10 times the transmission speed of Gigabit in a LAN environment, in addition to using the Thunderbolt 3 port of WIN Max to connect to a 10 gigabit ethernet converter, the router and NAS need to support 10 Gigabit transmission and NAS must have built-in PCIe NVMe SSDs paired in RAID.

 

 

GPD WIN Max supports Intel ’s latest Wi-Fi 6 (Gig +) technology that complies with the IEEE 802.11ax standard. Under 160MHz, Wi-Fi 6 can achieve single channel bandwidth up to 2402Mbps (300MB/s download speed).

 

 

Unlike SU-MIMO supported by Wi-Fi 5 (802.11ac Wave 1), MU-MIMO supported by Wi-Fi 6 has greatly improved network throughput and parallel communication capabilities. When connecting an MU-MIMO-based wireless router, the OFDMA technology with excellent parallel communication can ensure that WIN Max does not experience high network latency, even if the router is connected with many wireless devices at the same time.

 

 

The theoretical transmission speed and throughput of Wi-Fi 6 are 4 times higher than that of Wi-Fi 5, 2.4 times higher than that of current gigabit wired network and 24 times higher than the 100M wired network.

In the future, WIN Max users can freely enjoy ultra-smooth cloud gaming in any Wi-Fi 6-based network environment.

 

 

With support for Bluetooth 5.0, WIN Max can connect to 7 Bluetooth devices at the same time at a transmission speed of up to 3MB/s. With Wi-Fi turned on, WIN Max can achieve indoor positioning with an accuracy of less than 1 meter. At the same time, the effective connection range of Bluetooth 5.0 is also increased to 300 meters, which means that WIN Max users can ignore the limit of 10 meters under the old specification and connect and use various Bluetooth devices in a larger range.

 

 

* Notes: Long-distance communication can only be achieved when the connected device also supports Bluetooth 5.0. It is not possible to connect two identical devices (for example, two headphones of the same specification) at the same time. The communication distance of 300 meters is a theoretical value. Most manufacturers will limit the communication distance of Bluetooth 5.0 devices to 10 meters in order to reduce power consumption. Before purchasing, please confirm whether the device supports long-distance communication.

 

 

WIN Max is equipped with a USB 3.1 Gen2 Type-C port that has a peak bandwidth of 10Gbps and a transmission speed of up to 1.21GB/s. In addition to being the product's default charging port, this full-featured port can also be used for two-way charging, video output, data transmission and other functions.

WIN Max has a built-in 57Wh (rated capacity) large-capacity battery, which can be fully charged in about 2 hours by the 65W PD USB-C power adapter that comes with it. When fully charged, the machine supports 3 hours of heavy use, 6 to 8 hours of moderate use and nearly 14 hours of light use. The following table shows the battery life comparison between WIN Max and several other products with the same processor (all from official sources).

 

 

* Notes to battery life benchmarking:

The test result refers to the time taken for the battery level to decrease from 100% to 0% under normal usage scenarios. Normal usage time includes active use time and standby time. The aforementioned active use refers to:

(1) Browsing 8 mainstream websites by opening multiple tabs.

(2) Active use of Microsoft Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and Outlook to complete productivity tasks.

(3) Let application software run for a period of time without manual intervention.

All settings were set to default during the test, except for the following: Screen brightness (150 nits), automatic brightness adjustment (disabled) and Wi-Fi (turned on and connected). Battery life can vary significantly under different device settings, usage cases etc.

In addition to charging WIN Max, the 65W adapter of the machine can also be used to charge any mobile phone, tablet, or laptop that has a USB Type-C port.

 

 

The world's smallest 65W power adapter (as small as the WIN 2 charger), you can carry it everywhere you want!

 

Other than gaming, WIN Max is also a perfect productivity tool in the field of industry applications. For network engineers, IT operation and maintenance personnel or communications engineers, WIN Max is a universal portable mobile terminal that has enough computing power to make it the perfect substitute for traditional industrial laptop, IPCs or thin clients.

 

 

With the RJ45 port, engineers can connect WIN Max to any wired network to analyze and solve issues in various LAN, MAN and WAN networks; WIN Max can be connected with various serial devices with the help of a single USB to RS-232 cable.

 

 

After successfully launching GPD WIN 2 through crowdfunding on the Indiegogo platform we found that, although WIN 2 makes up for many shortcomings of the 1st-gen product, it still has room for improvement in areas such as performance, heat dissipation, appearance, ergonomics, etc. According to the requests of many users of the WIN series products, we started to develop this new model last year.

The main reason for launching a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo is that launching WIN Max requires heavy financial investment in R & D, mold development and material procurement. All funds raised through this project will be put in use for mass production of this product model. We believe that this product can meet the needs of all players who love portable gaming and will be their preferred handheld gaming PC for a long time. Looking forward to your support and we shall work together towards a brighter future for portable gaming!

 

 

We are a company specializing in handheld gaming devices and office equipment. We operate from Shenzhen, China under the brand name of GPD (GamePad Digital), which came from the company founder's aspiration for making gaming products. GPD is committed to providing users with personalized products and services.

 

 

We also want to thank all GPD WIN 2 users who choose to support the crowdfunding of this product as it's your continuous support that has enabled us to continuously launch better products. We also want to thank all who participate in our crowdfunding project for the first time as mass production and launch of this product would never be possible without your trust and support.

 

 

1. Do the contributions listed for this project include tariffs incurred upon delivery to the users' home countries?

The contributions listed in the project page include international express freight (including additional charges for delivery to remote areas) but do not cover tariffs incurred when entering the destination countries. Generally, the tariff rate for delivery of products to EU countries and Japan is 21% and 10%, respectively; in the case of the United States, tariff is required to be paid for products valued at more than $800; other countries may impose even higher tariff rates.

2. What after-sales services are available for those participating in the crowdfunding campaign？

Users participating in crowdfunding enjoy the same warranty benefits as the purchasers of officially launched products. Any user who is dissatisfied with the product can return it within one week of reception, but shipping cost for delivery of the product to the user will be deducted from the refund upon successful return.  

Please note that postage and packaging costs incurred for the return should be borne by the user. When returning the product, please use local postal courier. If you use other international logistics services, the returned product will incur a tariff equivalent to 20% to 30% of its value when entering China, for which GPD won't be held responsible.

3. What if the crowdfunding target is not reached?

Even if the target amount is not reached, we will still send the products to those who have contributed to the project. At that time, we will find other financing channels to ensure the mass production of the final product. Players who love this product are advised to pay close attention to the latest updates on the project.

4. What if I didn't get answers for my question?

If you do not get a response in time, please contact us as follows:

During the crowdfunding process, please report technical issues by sending an email to: Kendyz@gpd.hk

After the crowdfunding is over, you can get updates on product delivery by sending an email to: Kendyz@gpd.hk

After receiving the product, you can report quality problems or ask for return by sending an email to: Kendyz@gpd.hk

For inquiries about distribution or marketing cooperation, please contact us by emailing: Sales02@gpd.hk

For crowdfunding participants, please make sure to contact us through the email address indicated in your supporter's note, and we will make sure to answer your questions.
 

 

We will make delivery first to those who support us on Indiegogo.

Product specifications may change during the crowdfunding process for the purpose of making further improvements, in which case we will notify everyone as soon as possible on the "Update" section of our Indiegogo page.

We will make sure the product passes CE-RoHS, FCC, CCC, JATE, MIC and other international certifications.

We will try our best to make delivery at the agreed time. However, we might have to postpone delivery due to unpredictable supply chain problems or quality control issues, and please be patient if we do! Thank you for your understanding and support!

Core: A ballpoint pen that challenges the norms. It boasts a new yet simple mechanism, is beautifully crafted from durable materials and unlike other pens can be refilled without any disassembly. Designed with longevity at its centre by an award winning design team this pen will stand the test of time.

Simple Yet Innovative Design:

Core turns the traditional retractable pen on its head. Instead of multiple fiddly parts Core has just two key components that slide beautifully over one another to change from the writing and retracting positions. What is more Core is one of the easiest pens on the market to refill, requiring absolutely no disassembly of the pen whatsoever. 

The outer anodized aluminium shell has a familiar hexagonal profile which makes it comfortable to hold and means that it won't roll away, we've also added a fine texture to the surface of the aluminium which enhances the feel and quality. 

The inner core features a clip, allowing you to attach the pen to workbooks, this also functions as the 'button' to operate the mechanism. 

How it works:

Core is the outcome of a complete rethinking of a traditional retractable pen. Inspired by the classic craft knife you can simply slide the pen as it satisfyingly clicks into position, it feels like you are not only holding a premium pen but also a marvel of refined engineering in your hand.

 Moves like a craft knife

Refill:

Core is supplied with 2 x high quality Schmidt D1 refills. This compact ballpoint is popular amongst pen enthusiasts, it writes smoothly, the ink dries fast and it is extremely reliable. We provide this in black with a medium tip size, though you will find it available in a variety of colors and tip sizes, whatever suits your style.

Extremely simple to replace refill. Push firmly past writing position,+click+ and remove.

Insert replacement refill, retract, +click+  done.

Technical details:

  • Dimensions: 140mm x 10.5mm (5.5in x 0.4in).
  • Weight: 33 grams (1.16oz)
  • Materials: Aluminium Body / Polymer core.
  • Finish: Anodized in a choice of three colours.
  • Refill: Schmidt D1 with medium tip (black).

Anodized Finishes:

Who we are:

Andhand is a new London based stationery design studio founded by Simon Donald and Joe Wentworth of DonaldWentworth Product and Industrial Design. They are also the team behind many successful products for Joseph Joseph, are three times winners of the esteemed Red Dot Design Award and have work featured in the permanent collection of the Design Museum London. 

Andhand was established to create durable and honest stationery, thoughtfully designed and made with precision. The Core retractable pen is the first in a line of products for andhand and we have funded in order to achieve the tooling costs for the initial production run and bring this product to market.  

We hope you can support us in this!

Risks and Challenges:

We are industrial designers with 30+ years industry experience between us. Over the years we have successfully developed numerous products for mass manufacture for a range of clients.

Core has been the result of many months of design development, prototyping and testing. As such we are confident that we have refined the design to the point that it can be brought to market.

We have established production partners and are able to commence tooling soon after funding. However due to the impact of Covid 19 we are aware that things are still taking a little longer and this is cautiously reflected in our timeline.

story:
The smart & completely wireless native Full HD pico projector
with ultra-vivid picture made for use anywhere.

 

 

Expand your favorite film, or even just your favorite cat video, to epic proportions with crisp picture, smooth motion and vivid colors tuned by cinema experts.

 

 

 

Rated to last 30,000 hours at up to 850 ANSI Color Lumens, the PicoPix Max LED light source will display amazing, vivid picture for years to come.

 

 

 

With 16GB of internal memory and a battery that lasts for up to 3 hours, all you need is your Philips PicoPix Max. No phone or laptop needed.

 

 

 

Easily throw the Philips PicoPix Max into your bag or a pocket for every adventure.

 

 

 

Easily control apps and games with the built-in
touchpad for a perfect on-the-go experience.

 

 

 

Download your favorite apps directly from the Philips Store for on the go use.
Easily navigate in the brand new PHILIPS user interface.

 

The ExpressVPN app will be preloaded on your PicoPix Max so you can navigate safely and connect seamlessly, even when traveling abroad or using public WiFi. See more about this in our FAQ!

 

There’s no fuss, no muss, just the perfect picture.

 

 

The PicoPix Max automatically straightens for a clear, perfectly-angled
project no matter the surface it’s on (Auto Keystone: Internal, HDMI content and screen mirroring. 4 corners corrections: digital, screen mirroring and for internal content).

 

Using an internal camera just below the projector’s lens, PicoPix Max adjusts the projection instantly for that perfectly-clear picture every time.

 

Easily shrink your projection without moving the PicoPix Max (100 to 80%).

 

Modify the aspect ratio of each of the projection’s four corners for a perfectly straight image, or adjust it to your viewing pleasure (only for internal content, not for HDMI)!

 

Just like being at the Big Screen! Adjust PicoPix Max's distance from your wall or screen to increase your picture's size up to 120". 

 

The USB Type-C ports deliver fast data, audio, video and quick charging!
Extend the built-in sound through Bluetooth speakers (for internal contents), or mirror
your laptop for an amazing second screen.

 

 

 

 

The PicoPix Max may have an Android OS operating system, but that doesn’t limit its compatibility. Connect any and all of your favorite Apple devices via USB-C or Wi-Fi Screen Mirroring!

 

 

 

 

 

For an immersive, on-the-go gaming experience, plug in your favorite console via HDMI or USB-C. Use a Bluetooth gamepad to elevate your gaming experience.

 

 

 

PicoPix Max comes equipped with built-in dual stereo speakers
to help put you in the center of your cinematic experience.

 

 

 

Go big and wirelessly casts your screen directly from any Android,
iOS, Windows or MacOS device!

 

 

 

Our LED bulbs are rated to last 30,000 hours⁠ - that's over 40 years
of usage if you watched one movie per day.

 

 

 

 

 

If you don’t want to leave your seat to use the touchscreen navigation,
just grab the PicoPix Max AirMote for 3D distant control (Gyromouse).

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Get all the specs you’re looking for at a price that won’t break the bank.
That’s right - A picture the size of your wall from a projector the size of
your pocket for a price the size of your wallet.

 

 

 

 

 

 

Read the full article here:

https://www.passionhomecinema.fr/blog/index.php/06/02/2020/test-philips-picopix-max-lavis-de-gregory/

 

 

 

We are Philips and for over 125 years, we have been improving people’s lives with a steady flow of ground-breaking innovations.
We build products for those who believe that what makes technology smart is what you can do with it rather than what it can do. We do this by combining our design expertise and innovative Philips heritage as well as democratizing innovation that makes sense to consumers giving access to technologies that enables people to do more, watch more, and enjoy more. With these combined strengths, we bring premium award-winning Projectors to the market: caring, innovative, easy to use, and impactful.
Whether you are a value seeker, a freedom lover or a cinema addict, we bring you the real emotions to emphasis, enlighten and supersize your content to bring you the best experience you deserve.

#EXPERIENCEMATTERS

 

 

 

 

 

We are able to ship worldwide! VAT and GST not included in perk pre-order price and will be determined by country on delivery. Backers are responsible for these costs (VAT, GST, duties, taxes, etc) on delivery. Shipping costs vary by country; please see reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.

 

We plan to ship starting in December 2019* till May-2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.

 

By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order. *Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date. By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generations of the product.


 

 
      Rainfactory is a multiple-award-winning crowdfunding marketing agency that operates as a marketing department for growing brands. Rainfactory's experienced team & data-driven, battle-tested approach ensure long-term market dominance for entrepreneurs & enterprises.

story:
Elevate Your Productivity and Express Your Organization in Style

A magnetic, modular organizer and vertical garden that lets you enhance any surface. Hang with 3M strips that attach quickly and come off cleanly—no nail holes, cracked plaster or sticky residue.
 

 

 

 

 

Save your time, and eliminate distractions that cause a loss of focus and productivity. Cliclap helps you to stay focus and do better with a clean, clear desk.

 

 

Easy Remove With 3M Command™ Strip

 

Increase your productivity while showing your creativity.

 

Attach anywhere with strong magnets that can hold up to 4 lbs each!

 

 

 

 

 

 

PAFCAL is an organic product brought in from Japan and the beauty of this product is, it is recyclable. This makes it easier for individual to care for the plants especially those who are too busy at work and home. Which this in place, everyone is able to have their own pot of plant at home without worrying about watering the plant or going through the process to plant a pot of plant at home.

Soil-Free, Fuss-Free.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

14 versatile magnetic accessories

 

 

 

Cliclap can be attached to any wall with six simple steps:

 

 

 

Using damage-free 3M Command™ strips

Or With Screws

 

 

Each layout its own weight limit.

Our mighty small system packs a big punch. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.
