Hang with 3M strips that attach quickly and come off cleanly—no nail holes, cracked plaster or sticky residue.     Save your time, and eliminate distractions that cause a loss of focus and productivity. Cliclap helps you to stay focus and do better with a clean, clear desk.  Easy Remove With 3M Command™ Strip Increase your productivity while showing your creativity. Attach anywhere with strong magnets that can hold up to 4 lbs each! 
 

 
   
PAFCAL is an organic product brought in from Japan and the beauty of this product is, it is recyclable. This makes it easier for individual to care for the plants especially those who are too busy at work and home. Which this in place, everyone is able to have their own pot of plant at home without worrying about watering the plant or going through the process to plant a pot of plant at home.
Soil-Free, Fuss-Free.
         14 versatile magnetic accessories  
 

Cliclap can be attached to any wall with six simple steps:
 
  Using damage-free 3M Command™ stripsOr With Screws  Each layout its own weight limit.
Our mighty small system packs a big punch. This striking design makes a sophisticated statement in any home.

story:
The Everlast Mini is a pocket sized notebook built for the digital age. Although it feels like a traditional notebook, the Everlast Mini is endlessly reusable and connects to all of your favorite cloud services.

Like the original Everlast, when you write using any pen from the Pilot Frixion line, your writing bonds to the Everlast Mini pages like regular paper. But add a drop of water… and the entire notebook erases like magic.

The Everlast Mini also works with the Rocketbook App in a new and unique way. So before your notes go off the Mini, they go online, perfectly organized.

 

 

1 X PEN-PACK | 2 X PEN-PACK | 3 X PEN-PACK | 4 X PEN-PACK | 5 X PEN-PACK | 10 X PEN-PACK

The Everlast Mini is not a whiteboard book.

You can use any pen from the Pilot Frixion line. Frixion gel pens come in all different kinds and colors and are available for purchase online and in stores.

When we launched the original Everlast, we worked closely with paper industry experts to find the optimal synthetic polyester blend to create pages that could be wiped clean of Frixion ink, but also felt perfectly natural to write on. Our Everlast customer love it because writing feels smooth and natural. We have designed the Mini with this same synthetic.

 

Everlast Mini pages do not have a weird high gloss. And, the writing does not just wipe away.

 

Here is where things get crazy. When you combine Frixion pens with Everlast mini pages, a dry paper towel doesn’t do a thing. But a moist paper towel removes every bit of ink. So you can reuse your notebook over, and over, and over, and over, and over again.

 

SIZE MATTERS

We crafted the Everlast Mini to be the same height as Frixion Pens so they can travel together in the same spaces and go to the same places. And what better way to keep your Frixion pen with your Mini than a Pen Station stick-on pen holder? That’s why we’re including one FREE Pen Station with every Everlast Mini for this campaign!

 

MACHINE VISION

The Rocketbook System is the combination of a special notebook and a free mobile app. Write notes and create designs in your notebook with a pen. Then, using patent-pending image capture technology, the Rocketbook app accurately and quickly captures and bundles your notes together… in any orientation!

 

SEVEN SYMBOLS

The Everlast Mini works with the Rocketbook cloud organization system in a new and unique way. Using the Rocketbook app, you assign 7 shortcut “symbols” to a destination of your choice: any folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs, your email address, or many other cloud services. After you have completed scanning pages, simply select the destination symbol(s) you would like to send your notes. The Rocketbook app instantly files your notes in the right place.

IMAGE PROCESSING

In an instant, the Rocketbook app crops and enhances each page so your digital notes are more crisp and vibrant than the real thing.

BIG THINGS ON SMALL PAGES

The pages all feature a unique dot grid pattern that is perfect for both text notes, sketches and diagrams.

 

INTELLIGENT PAGES

Each page of your Rocketbook Everlast contains a special QR code which contains metadata about the Rocketbook Mini page. This triggers the special app functionality as well as enables complex image dewarping from any angle.

Each page also has a narrow dark border surrounding it. The border allows the Rocketbook app to find your page quickly in any environment or background, like a messy desk.

NO NOTEBOOK? NO PROBLEM.

Forgot your book or just want to take a test drive? We offer free PDF downloads of full size Rocketbook pages with all sorts of page patterns. Give it a try today!

PDF PAGES

SMUDGE FREE ZONE

Frixion pen ink completely dries and bonds to the page in about 15 seconds. After that, your writing doesn’t budge without moisture. You can flip the page before that, but there may be some slight transfer of the ink.

Frixion markers are great for adding a dash of color but they can transfer a small amount of ink to the opposite page.

MAXIMIZE EVERLASTICITY

ONLY USE PILOT FRIXION PENS. Although there are other inks that work, the entire Frixion pen line is the most accessible and they erase great. Plus, they are just solid pens.

If you leave the ink on a page for a really long time (like months), it can eventually leave a ghost behind. It’s kind of like an old whiteboard with very faint marker images. So just erase once in a while to keep pages looking pristine.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

Check out this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation

As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:

http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html

Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculationAs many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. story:
For more information on how the warranty program works, email: warranty@robboxtools.com

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’re a group of professionals who are super into construction and DIY, but also really into tech. We take great tools and make them even greater. 

We get the need for a great powertool, and we get the need for great tech. So we’ve combined the two to bring you an incredible drill with tech to make your life easier. 

Our mission is to create quality powertools that maximize safety and increase productivity. We want to take the intimidation factor out of using powertools, and help cultivate a greater sense of confidence while using them. 

xDrill ensures that you get the job done as quickly, accurately and conveniently as possible.

 

 

 Tross is a data driven Crowdfunding company

story:
Our team consists of people with great tech background which are part of the world’s leading Dreamweaver extensions producer DMXzone. We are part of Dynamic Zones International BV, founded in 2000. More than 17 years on the market!

Our history of innovation started with the launch of a successful international user group. The goal of this community was to share knowledge about Adobe Dreamweaver, that long-known website editor. Because of the enthusiasm of the users this group blossomed and became a network with more than 600,000 users. Currently, we are operating from two offices in Europe, located in The Netherlands and Bulgaria.

Wappler is standing for Web App Builder. We give you the opportunity to create single page applications and mobile apps without any skills! And following our team's main principle: just add creativity.

Long story short: Wappler is an advanced visual web and mobile applications builder – create your projects in a great visual way by using only creativity and combining many components and workflows.

App Connect and Server Connect, most powerful really well-known DMXzone frameworks, will be implemented as native components of Wappler, as well as Bootstrap 4 and Framework 7!

With Wappler we are opening a new way to complete freedom of extension development based on the latest web and app standards, producing clear code and empowering the modern workflows of multi-target publishing, modern web and app building and packaging workflows!

Don't forget to check out Wappler's landing page here and some features - presented in details.

Access to Wappler beta will be delivered to all the backers ASAP. The license will be assigned for all as soon as it is officially relased.

Some of our team members joined Web Summit 2017 and announced the visual web app creator Wappler for the first time in public! Dutch cookies and a lot of marketing materials were waiting for the visitors of our stand as exhibitors. A lot of users' opinions were heard, great reactions, awesome support, as well as very important suggestions for the development of the product!

 

Absolutely. Adobe Dreamweaver is turning more and more into a tool for hardcore coders and loosing its well-known visual abilities. It's also a truth that Dreamweaver's development has being way behind the latest web or mobile app developments. Wappler is going further - where Dreamweaver hasn't gone before!
 
See what Joseph Lowery - a well known best-selling author and Dreamweaver Guru has to say about Wappler:

 

No, we aren't. Wappler is innovative, a standalone application which you can use on any OS - Windows, MacOS X or even Linux! Our product gives you the power of design - then you have freedom to use all the included components to create a professional web project or mobile application. No watermarks, no slow and lagging browsers!

Wappler is build on top of the Google Chrome platform - the latest web technologies and the powerful components from DMXzone, the most successful Dreamweaver community ever! So we know how to make the things working...

Wappler's user interface is much simpler than Wix or Webflow. And more powerful! You can choose your personal hosting provides, as well as you got access to any file or database Wappler produces. You’re making dynamic-driven websites and mobile apps… no need to code it by yourself and you got access to every single file and database in the project.

The rendering in Wappler is now the latest Chrome 64 — great speed improvements and instance rendering with the latest web technologies!

It’s not Adobe XD or InVision too: in Wappler you make dynamic projects, not mock-ups. Imagine the mock-up you designed fully functional without hiring a developer — that’s Wappler’s spirit.

Using Wappler you can directly publish your mobile apps to App Store (iOS) and Google Play Store (Android) - there's no such opportunity in other web builders!

I've been using Dreamweaver for years, but Wappler isn't just a replacement of it: Wappler is Dreamweaver's killer.
Mike Hall, Web Designer

It's so easy to build web pages using Wappler! My workflow was greatly improved and now I have more free time for my family.
Ben Williams, UI/UX Expert

I was looking for something more than a mockup design tool and I am really happy I found Wappler. Now I can create dynamic websites by myself without hiring back-end developers.
Sasha Sukho, Graphic Designer

I love Wappler – I’ve met these guys at Web Summit 2017 and they invited me to test the application. I’m impressed and looking forward seeing it in public.
Marco Silva Web Design Enthusiast

Hm… it’s simply awesome! So many extensions, it’s easy and I don’t have to spend time on looking on Google about web development. Just wait for it :)
David Günter Business Owner

No more codiiiing! As a designer, I used to deal with that. But Wappler is my key to coding freedom! You’re great and improving the product constantly!
Michelle van Dijk UI Designer

One of our beta testing users even wrote a whole article Bye-bye Dreamweaver, hello Wappler! Read it on his Medium blog.

We got a challenge for you! Let's prove you that Wappler can create a fully functional dynamic website in 2 minutes - starting form scratch.

Do we have a deal?

Then click Play...

 

 

Frequently Asked Questions

1. What is the difference between Wappler Free, Basic and Pro?
- You can see what the different packages include on this page: https://wappler.io/extensions.html The Basic package includes all of Free + Basic. The Pro Package includes all of Basic + Pro.

2. What's the license include?
- The Wappler license includes Wappler for lifetime and 1 year extensions usage, updates and support for the selected plan. After this period, Wappler will continue working and you if you want to continue using the extensions and get free updates you need to purchase a new license.

3. What's inside Wappler Enthusiast? Up to 5 projects?
- Yes, Wappler Enthusiast is targeted to freelancers and it includes the functionalities of Wappler Pro license but limited to 5 projects total. The unlimited usage of Wappler Pro is included in Early Adopter perk.

4. I am a DMXzone user who purchased extensions or subscription, can i use my Dreamweaver extensions in Wappler?
- No, Wappler comes with the extensions especially developed for it and integrated in it, depending on the package you purchased. It won't be possible to install Dreamwaeaver extensions in Wappler.

5. When will Wappler be released?
- We are currently running a beta version. Backers will get access to beta version and will receive the licenses purchased, as soon as Wappler is officially released.

Got more questions? Don't hesitate to write us on boris@wappler.io

story:
Now available at getrocketbook.com and Indiegogo Marketplace!

 

The Everlast notebook provides a classic pen and paper experience, yet is built for the digital age. Although it feels like a traditional notebook, the Everlast is endlessly reusable and connected to all of your favorite cloud services. 

When you write using any pen from the Pilot FriXion line, your writing sticks to Everlast pages like regular paper. But add water… and the notebook erases like magic.

The Everlast notebook is compatible with the Rocketbook app. That means before your notes go off the page they go online to destinations like Google Drive, Dropbox, Slack and Evernote — perfectly organized.

 

 

 

 

Prior to shipping, we will send you a survey, so you can select which size(s) you want. Feel free to mix and match if you purchase multiple Everlast notebooks.

 

 The Everlast is not a whiteboard book.

You can use any pen from the Pilot FriXion line. FriXion gel ballpoint pens come in all different kinds and colors and are available for purchase online and in many stores.

We worked closely with paper industry experts to find the optimal synthetic polyester blend to create pages that can be wiped clean of FriXion ink, but also bells perfectly natural to write on. Writing on an Everlast page feels just like writing on regular paper with a smooth finish.

The pages do not have a weird high gloss. And, the writing doesn’t just wipe away.

Here is where things get crazy. When you combine FriXion pens with the Everlast pages a dry paper towel doesn’t do a thing. But a moist paper towel removes every bit of ink. So you can reuse your notebook over and over again.

 

 

MACHINE VISION 

The Rocketbook System is the combination of a special notebook and a free mobile app. Write notes and create designs in your notebook with a pen. Then, using patent-pending image capture technology, the Rocketbook app accurately and quickly captures and sends your notes to pre-configured cloud services.

 

SEVEN SYMBOLS 

The seven symbols at the bottom of each page are the magic “buttons” behind the Rocketbook’s quick and easy cloud organization. You assign each icon to the destination of your choice, any folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, Box, iCloud, Slack or your email address. When you mark that icon on your page, the Rocketbook app automatically files your notes in the right place.

IMAGE PROCESSING 

In an instant, the Rocketbook app crops and enhances each page so your digital notes are more crisp and vibrant than the real thing.

INTELLIGENT PAGES 

Each page of your Rocketbook Everlast contains a special QR code which tells the Rocketbook app the page number of each scan. That means no matter how or when you scan your Everlast, we can always get your notes in the right order. Each page also has a narrow dark border surrounding it. The border allows the Rocketbook app to find your page quickly in any environment or background, like a messy desk.

DOT GRID+ 

The pages all feature a unique dot grid pattern that is perfect for both text notes, sketches and diagrams. NO NOTEBOOK? NO PROBLEM. 

Forgot your book or just want to take a test drive? We offer free PDF downloads of Rocketbook pages with our special border. Give it a try today! 

8.5 x 11 Page | A4 Page 

SMUDGE FREE ZONE

FriXion pen ink completely dries and bonds to the page in about 15 seconds. After that, you’re writing doesn’t budge without moisture. You can flip the page before that, but there may be some slight transfer of the ink. FriXion markers are great for adding a dash of color but they can transfer a small amount of ink to the opposite page. 

 

MAXIMIZE EVERLASTICITY 

ONLY USE PILOT FRIXION PENS. Although there are other inks that work, the entire FriXion pen line is the most accessible and they erase perfectly. Plus, they are just excellent pens. If you leave the ink on a page for a really long time (like months), it may leave a faint ghost behind, so it's a good idea to erase every few weeks to keep your book in perfect condition.

CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERS

We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.

Check out this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculation

As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:

http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html

FriXion gel ballpoint pens come in all different kinds and colors and are available for purchase online and in many stores.We worked closely with paper industry experts to find the optimal synthetic polyester blend to create pages that can be wiped clean of FriXion ink, but also bells perfectly natural to write on. Writing on an Everlast page feels just like writing on regular paper with a smooth finish. The pages do not have a weird high gloss. And, the writing doesn’t just wipe away. Here is where things get crazy. When you combine FriXion pens with the Everlast pages a dry paper towel doesn’t do a thing. But a moist paper towel removes every bit of ink. So you can reuse your notebook over and over again.  
MACHINE VISION The Rocketbook System is the combination of a special notebook and a free mobile app. Write notes and create designs in your notebook with a pen. Then, using patent-pending image capture technology, the Rocketbook app accurately and quickly captures and sends your notes to pre-configured cloud services. SEVEN SYMBOLS The seven symbols at the bottom of each page are the magic “buttons” behind the Rocketbook’s quick and easy cloud organization. You assign each icon to the destination of your choice, any folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Drive, Box, iCloud, Slack or your email address. When you mark that icon on your page, the Rocketbook app automatically files your notes in the right place.IMAGE PROCESSING In an instant, the Rocketbook app crops and enhances each page so your digital notes are more crisp and vibrant than the real thing.INTELLIGENT PAGES Each page of your Rocketbook Everlast contains a special QR code which tells the Rocketbook app the page number of each scan. That means no matter how or when you scan your Everlast, we can always get your notes in the right order. Each page also has a narrow dark border surrounding it. The border allows the Rocketbook app to find your page quickly in any environment or background, like a messy desk.DOT GRID+ The pages all feature a unique dot grid pattern that is perfect for both text notes, sketches and diagrams. NO NOTEBOOK? NO PROBLEM. Forgot your book or just want to take a test drive? We offer free PDF downloads of Rocketbook pages with our special border. Give it a try today! 8.5 x 11 Page | A4 Page SMUDGE FREE ZONEFriXion pen ink completely dries and bonds to the page in about 15 seconds. After that, you’re writing doesn’t budge without moisture. You can flip the page before that, but there may be some slight transfer of the ink. FriXion markers are great for adding a dash of color but they can transfer a small amount of ink to the opposite page.  MAXIMIZE EVERLASTICITY 
ONLY USE PILOT FRIXION PENS. Although there are other inks that work, the entire FriXion pen line is the most accessible and they erase perfectly. Plus, they are just excellent pens. If you leave the ink on a page for a really long time (like months), it may leave a faint ghost behind, so it's a good idea to erase every few weeks to keep your book in perfect condition.
CUSTOMS & DUTIES INFORMATION - FOR INTERNATIONAL ORDERSWe cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Indiegogo.Check out this handy tool, that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-and-tax-calculationAs many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html

story:
We sincerely injected our utmost attention to bring the best user experience for users who care for and appreciate these subtle elements. We tirelessly tested every aspect of the Fokal keyboard to ensure the most premium and luxurious feel.  Therefore, every need and aesthetic wish would be wholly satisfied for even the pickiest shopper. Subtle details on classic vintage cameras have reflected in the design of the Fokal keyboard.

 

Utilizing only choice selected materials, we created a robust and durable body in supreme anodized aluminum and premium leather. Staying true to the opulent materials Azio is recognized for, the incredible anodized sheen and supple genuine leather instantly elevates any space.

 

A Durable Housing Constructed of

Dual Aluminum Plates + Steel Mid-Plates 

 

Camera Lens inspired Fokal Control Knob is a seven-way joystick knob that controls multimedia, lighting, joystick, and customizable command in one focalized control point.

Centralized control of the Fokal Control Knob streamlined the complexity of multi-keys commands execution into an intuitive one-stop solution while creating a cleaner and classier keycap layout.

 

 

 

 

The Fokal Control Knob is a seven-way control knob. The top crown is a two ways infinite spin control for volume, light brightness, or any other two ways commands. The middle part has a press button for control mode change. Then the joystick is 360 degrees control with top button serves as select function.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

This operating mechanism had sparked the inspiration of moving all hard to reach commands on a conventional keyboard into one central control. Then, we carefully studied every element of the classic vintage camera and tried to reinterpret these details in the modernized design of the keyboard.

 

 

 

The Fokal keyboard comes in 2 pieces (the central unit and the Numpad) that can be used together or separately. 

 

 

 

FOQO is completely customizable. It allows the user to map any of the keys and the control knob to their individual unique needs. 

In Custom Mode, key macros can be recorded to all 5 buttons on the Control Knob: Up, Down, Right, Left, and Center buttons. Assign a combination of keys to each of these buttons as a shortcut.  

 

The Dual RF & Bluetooth connectivity provides you true wireless connectivity in all possible situations. Connect with Bluetooth 5.0 or RF to the desired device such as PC, Notebook, Tablet, or smartphone.

The Fokal keyboard supports connections up to four different devices through one RF 2.4Ghz connection (RF dongle included) and three Bluetooth connections (User need to have Bluetooth equipped or ready devices or a Bluetooth adapter need to be purchased separately).

Swapping between each connected device by simply turning the beautifully diamond-cut knurled connection dial to the desired position.

 

 

 

The most massive battery in its class of using Li-ion polymer battery in 5000 mAh capacity. The battery can last regular use up to 4 months by one charge, and it is also a certified battery built with the highest safety standard. The Li-ion battery is polymer-based with a safety board to prevent hazardous situations if any fault happens.

The charging is going through a USB Type-C charging port with the included charging cable.

To check battery level, press FN + ESC key, then battery level will be shown through key F1~F10.

 

 

 

With versatility in mind, we designed the Fokal to auto-detect Windows & MacOS systems. 

 

 

 

Gateron mechanical switches provide satisfying haptic and sound feedback with the best RGB backlit visual presentation for the Fokal user. The user can select between Gateron blue, yellow or brown switches for a clicky, linear or tactile feel. The Gateron switch lifespan is 50 million keystrokes. 

 

 

The Fokal comes with 9 dedicated backlight colors: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Teal, Blue, Magenta, White, and RGB. With each color comes 4 different programmable modes: Static, Breathing, Wave, and Reactive. With so many options, users have the freedom to choose their favorite visual representation.  

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

*Final dimensions and weight subject to change depending on the final production model.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

After the Original Retro Classic (Vintage Typewriter Inspired) keyboard, we wanted to improve the next keyboard in all aspects, including aesthetics, functions, user scenario, and user environment. Our wish is to continue building on our brand image with unique designs and premium workspace tools to inspire creativity.

Our mission was to add a new, bold, unique, and inspiring element to the keyboard while keeping the premium elements we developed from Retro Classic by incorporating authentic and genuine materials through prestigious craftsmanship. 

By taking inspiration from a classic icon that provided the desired value, we created the first premium keyboard with a multi-function Control Knob for ultimate efficiency. 

 

 

Our goal is to create unique products to not only efficiently complete every task, but also elevate a workspace. We are a collective of bold and curious spirits who are passionate about developing inspiring, functional tools by reinterpreting iconic and nostalgic objects with our creative synergy. We honor the past while triumphing modern-day innovation into the tools we offer. The result is a line of intentional, artful, and practical tools, unlike any other - all to equip and empower the user.

We are tirelessly curious and bold. Every AZIO product comes with its own story. There is a reason behind every material, every cut, and every fit.  We back our products with premium quality and excellent customer service.

We honor the past while triumphing modern-day innovation into the tools we offer. There is a reason behind every material, every cut, and every fit.  We back our products with premium quality and excellent customer service.

story:
Stop Motion Animation has been a frequent choice for Cinematic Storytelling in recent years.

The most important element for a Stop-Motion puppet is the skeleton or armature.

A puppet with mediocre skeleton is hard to work with during animation.

A Stop -Motion puppet skeleton must be stable, but lightweight at the same time.

A good puppet skeleton can be moved easly, maintaining position without changing because of settlements or subsidence. Also, it must not lose this feature after a few movements.

The right movement of the skeleton allows the puppet to assume positions that appear natural and prevents cracks or deformations in the coating materials to appear.

 

 

 

Introducing GEORGE®

Made from pure Carbon Fiber and high quality Stainless Steel 630, GEORGE® was created for professional stop motion animation use and applies the most advanced composite material technology.

GEORGE® is extremely durable, has great fluidity of movement, and maintains mobility over time and during filming. 

The upper torso is made entirely of carbon fiber and was created in three different versions: a base, an improved reinforced section for shoulder joints, and another with a special dynamic neck.

A rapid attachment system is used for the limbs and neck, which lets you create different hands, feet, and heads whilst maintaining the same body. It's very easy to remove and replace the limb.

 

 

 

GEORGE® ENGINEERING manufactures professional armatures for stop motion animations, designed to facilitate the work of the animator. The models meet all the common requirements of any animated puppet, are sturdy, with carbon fiber joints and an adjustable pressure range suitable for most sets.

These metal structures are movable puppet armatures, mainly made of carbon fiber and stainless steel. They are fully articulated and can securely hold a position, an important and necessary feature for the stop motion animation technique. Handmade, all armatures
  they are made piece by piece in Italy by processing professionals and assembled in our company.

All parts are handcrafted and carefully assembled to ensure smooth, precise movements.

All parts of the armature system can be unscrewed and removed. This is very useful when it comes to dressing and undressing the final animation puppet with cloth clothes.

Built to last for years.
Used in all major animation studios in the world.
Ideal for both beginners and experts
Produced in Italy.
GEORGE® is made with high quality technological materials, such as carbon fiber and 630 stainless steel.

 

 

 

The first studies to create a highly innovative professional product were undertaken at the beginning of 2015. It was immediately decided to use a material never adopted in the animation sector: CARBON FIBER. The products and armatures (the supporting skeleton of the puppets used for making the videos) currently on the market are all in ordinary metal. These are quite light but quite unreliable and can warp when subjected to stress. On the contrary, the carbon fiber is extremely lighter, but stiff and will not deform, the carbon fiber joints are extremely fluid and precise in movements.
 The project was developed in several phases. First, a long period of meticulous solid modeling resulted in the first version of the armature. It features: - limb stems made 100% from 630 stainless steel rod (special stainless steel used in the medical sector) - joint plates from carbon fiber sheet cut and machined with CNC computerized machining center - hip block in stainless steel with logo made with laser and other large pieces from plates of
 thick carbon fiber cut and machined with CNC machining center - joints made of carbon fiber always machined with CNC machining center. The carbon fiber sheets are cut and machined by CNC controlled machine tools to ensure the highest level of precision and cutting quality. The 630 stainless steel rods are rounded and have a diameter of 3 mm.

As a result, GEORGE® has become a versatile and precisely calibrated professional tool for artists and animators to create their own animations.

 

 

 

 
 

The main and greatest tool for stop motion animators are rigs.
A Rig is an articulated arm that can hold objects and puppets in the air when needed. Their main focus on this tool is to fight gravity and keep everything still in place to catch each frame. They are often used to perform complex movements such as walking, jumping or flying things. They are very useful, you can move all their parts to reach the desired position helping your animation needs.

 

 

 

 

 

GEORGE® is a highly articulated and precisely placeable animation armature that allows artists, animators, students and creatives to explore poses quickly and easily.

George armatures was chosen by universities in Germany, England and Australia.

 

George Engineering is a team of engineers and designers based in Italy dedicated to renewing the way of stop motion animation. With a focus on innovation through technology and sustainability, our team has developed a completely new type of armatures for animation with high-tech materials carbon fiber and 630 stainless steel of which we are very proud.

story:
Rocketbook Beacons allow you to capture, organize and broadcast important notes, diagrams, and big ideas on any whiteboard or wall surface in real-time. No need for expensive new hardware and software. Just four restickable "beacons" for any sized surface and one futuristic smartphone app that connects with many of the popular cloud services you already use!


Place the four restickable Beacons in each corner of any size whiteboard, and start writing the way you normally would. Then download the free Rocketbook app. When you scan your whiteboard with the app, the space aged machine vision will “see” the Beacons and quickly capture your whiteboard from any angle. 


Rocketbook Beacons can modernize any size whiteboard you have hanging around. If your surface area is small, and every inch of writing space counts, simply cut the Beacons to size and the app will still capture your work! The majority of whiteboards (over 3 feet wide or high) will work great without trimming!


The Rocketbook app will instantly adjust and visually enhance your scans so the digital version is light years ahead of the real thing.


The Rocketbook app allows you to assign 7 shortcut symbols to "destinations" in the cloud which could be any folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs, your email address, and many other popular services.


Set up the app to instantly beam your notes, diagrams, and big ideas. And save precious time by transcribing your handwriting with powerful optical character recognition (OCR) technology.


For crucial missions with a scattered crew, the app allows you to share your whiteboard in real-time. Switch to “Snapcast” mode, share the unique URL and get ready to collaborate with your team anywhere in the world. Your private, real-time page is updated every time you scan your whiteboard. Or simply prop your phone facing your whiteboard and set the app to auto-scan every 5 seconds. 


Rocketbook Beacons are made with space aged micro-suction technology that is specially designed to stick to whiteboard surfaces. This synthetic and durable material acts like millions of microscopic suction cups that cling to your whiteboard and won't deteriorate over time like other sticky adhesives.  The Beacons can even be cleaned to ensure a quality bond with each use! 

 


The Rocketbook app can transcribe your handwriting with OCR or “Optical Character Recognition” technology. Transcription allows you to send a digital text version of your whiteboard, or even search through all of your scans with keywords and phrases. You can even auto-name your files by placing two hashtags ‘#’ on either side of a title like ##THIS TITLE##. Traditional surfaces will never be the same! 


For more information on our OCR features, fly over to the Rocketbook Launch page

Customers & Duties Information For International Orders

We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:

http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html

story:
Senstone is a new way to create notes — faster and much more convenient than any smartphone app. With Senstone, you no longer have to pull out your phone to take notes on the go. Just capture the things in your daily life that you don’t want to miss. It automatically converts your voice notes into text and organizes them for easy access.

We check smartphones 150 times a day, every day. But what if there was a plainly easier way to capture those precious words?

Senstone lets you record your thoughts quickly and conveniently. Senstone is a notepad the size of a bottle cap. Imagine walking in the busy street or driving a car and taking those notes and reminders with the speed of thought.

Tap on the Senstone to start recording and speak. Tap again and it stops. All audio and text notes are synced to the Cloud seamlessly.  

Senstone saves you from getting distracted while reaching for your smartphone and looking for the necessary app. Especially when focusing is critical.

 

Being able to take notes on the go is critical — be it your personal goals, your breakthrough ideas or your travel journal. This is why the world’s greatest writers, inventors, and visionaries kept notebooks to document their ideas. And today we offer a much more convenient and handy solution.

Are you a food blogger discovering a new cafe and wanting to document your experience? Take notes in seconds with Senstone. It has been designed specifically to keep track of details in any situation. You can even capture an impromptu interview with someone at a cafe.

 

You can also use Senstone at night, but you don’t need to wear it. It listens to you when you sleep and is just a finger snap away from recording the details of your dreams while you still remember them. There’s no need to press any button. Thanks to our unique machine learning system, we help you record your midnight thoughts and dreams with just a snap of your fingers. 

NB: Currently, the finger snap feature is only available when the gadget is charging on its dock. 

 

Senstone helps you stay focused, lets you organize your thoughts quickly and allows you to manage your life with confidence and style. Send reminders to other members of your team. Just say “Tom, I figured you didn’t bring lunch today, so I ordered pizza” and the message is sent.

Senstone is your communication tool with others on the team. However, sometimes it is more convenient to have your thoughts laid out right in your favourite app. For these scenarios we are integrating with apps like Evernote, Trello and more.

 

Everyone has their own sense of style. People are wearing accessories to underline their personality, get attention and feel good. We tried to be timeless and original with this device. Senstone’s design is pure and minimalist — it’s something that will match any style or look.

 

 

Our fashion designer picked the best materials for Senstone to look and feel right. The casing is made of Chrome-plated brass and clear brass. We also offer a lighter, Aluminium version anodized in white, gray and black. All models feature a scratch-proof tempered screen.

Senstone’s screen consists of 17 white LEDs that inform you of key activities such as starting and ending a recording, synchronization, battery status, and charging. It’s all displayed by flashing patterns and shapes with the LED array.

 

 

We do care about the environment, so we made the box that is indisposable and reusable. This is your stylish dock that is used for charging and a sole place to store and carry Senstone and its accessories. You can use it to hold the device itself as well as all your detachable backs.

Our line of interchangeable backs was developed by a fashion designer. You can clip it to your clothes, hang it from your neck, or wear it on your wrist, for the style that suits you best.

 

We developed our own firmware with the Protocol that works specifically with audio tracks (files). It is optimized to record and transmit high-quality audio without data loss and run them later through AI systems in the Cloud. We ensure encryption of our data so it's highly protected during data transfer over the air.  Hardware is optimized for low energy consumption which gives about 4 days of average use.

The reason we've chosen the components is multilayers, among them the size. We spent several months trying to fit components into a small casing and maintain good battery life at the same time by using BLE microprocessor.

1) Multi-core system, 2) Support Over-the-Air Upgrade (OTA), 3) AES-128 Security Module, 4) Compatible with BLE 4.2.

Digital MEMS Microphones with the following features: 
1) Three modes: Standard Performance, Low-Power and Ultrasonic Mode, 2) Frequency Range 0.01kHz - 80kHz.

Memory with the following features: 
1) Minimum 100,000 recording cycles, 2) 20 years of data retention.

Lithium (LiPo) battery:
1) 4.2 Voltage, 2) 80mAh capacity, 3) 4 days of average use. 

As great as a simple and convenient tap could be, we are constantly looking for more natural ways to capture your thoughts. One of them is a snap. 

The magic lies in the device machine learning system. The microphones are in the active listening mode, and when the captured sound matches the Snap pattern — it activates the device. It works best in silent environments, and with the shipped device you will be able to switch to Snap or back to Tap mode depending on your preferences. See it here in action.

We bring a new level of intelligence to your voice notes.  The moment you start a recording, it’s stored on your smartphone and backed up in Cloud, even if your app is in a background. The Cloud software platform converts voice memos into text, extracts keywords, to-dos, and analyses your speech patterns. 

It's like having an AI to organize your notes. What is the topic of the note? What was your mood at the time? What was happening around you? Where were you? You can then find your notes by hashtags, their content or time and location to replay original audio, edit them or export to other apps.

With additional premium app subscription, you’ll be able to access more AI features, like automatic punctuation or noise analysis, get larger cloud storage for audio notes and freer speech-to-text transactions. The App also works in the background, notifying you on the progress and number of notes made. Once you open the app, all your voice memos and text notes are automatically synced to the Сloud.

 

Since both the audio recording and the converted text are available for each note, there is a lot we can do to improve your note-taking experience. You’ll have a chance to vote on the upcoming features you want, like automatic punctuation, intonation analysis, productivity tips based on your previous performance, noise and context analysis, and integration with various software.

 

Senstone Inc. is an audio company that’s on a mission to provide the best note-taking experience. We do it through voice analysis, text extraction and machine learning via deep audio analysis. Our company provides seamless and smart voice recording by combining well designed hardware and a cloud-based software platform.

For more questions, media inquiries or review unit requests please contact us at team@senstone.io.

Press Kit is available here.
story_txt:
Senstone is a new way to create notes — faster and much more convenient than any smartphone app. With Senstone, you no longer have to pull out your phone to take notes on the go. Just capture the things in your daily life that you don’t want to miss. It automatically converts your voice notes into text and organizes them for easy access.
We check smartphones 150 times a day, every day. But what if there was a plainly easier way to capture those precious words?Senstone lets you record your thoughts quickly and conveniently. Senstone is a notepad the size of a bottle cap. Imagine walking in the busy street or driving a car and taking those notes and reminders with the speed of thought.Tap on the Senstone to start recording and speak. Tap again and it stops. All audio and text notes are synced to the Cloud seamlessly.  Senstone saves you from getting distracted while reaching for your smartphone and looking for the necessary app. Especially when focusing is critical.

Senstone should be close when you speak — for best performance. You can hang it around your neck, clip it to your shirt collar or a jacket, or even wear it on your wrist. 
Senstone is a standalone device so you can take notes and create lists when its not connected to your smartphone. It records for up to two and a half hours when offline. Then it automatically syncs your notes in the cloud when you are back in range. Being able to take notes on the go is critical — be it your personal goals, your breakthrough ideas or your travel journal. This is why the world’s greatest writers, inventors, and visionaries kept notebooks to document their ideas. And today we offer a much more convenient and handy solution. Are you a food blogger discovering a new cafe and wanting to document your experience? Take notes in seconds with Senstone. It has been designed specifically to keep track of details in any situation. You can even capture an impromptu interview with someone at a cafe. 
  You can also use Senstone at night, but you don’t need to wear it. It listens to you when you sleep and is just a finger snap away from recording the details of your dreams while you still remember them. There’s no need to press any button. Thanks to our unique machine learning system, we help you record your midnight thoughts and dreams with just a snap of your fingers. NB: Currently, the finger snap feature is only available when the gadget is charging on its dock.  Senstone helps you stay focused, lets you organize your thoughts quickly and allows you to manage your life with confidence and style. Send reminders to other members of your team. Just say “Tom, I figured you didn’t bring lunch today, so I ordered pizza” and the message is sent.Senstone is your communication tool with others on the team. However, sometimes it is more convenient to have your thoughts laid out right in your favourite app. For these scenarios we are integrating with apps like Evernote, Trello and more. Everyone has their own sense of style. You’ll have a chance to vote on the upcoming features you want, like automatic punctuation, intonation analysis, productivity tips based on your previous performance, noise and context analysis, and integration with various software.
 
Ongoing Production

The most complicated mechanical part - metal housing - executed near perfectly

T0 Tooling for metal stamped partsSenstone Inc. is an audio company that’s on a mission to provide the best note-taking experience. We do it through voice analysis, text extraction and machine learning via deep audio analysis. Our company provides seamless and smart voice recording by combining well designed hardware and a cloud-based software platform.
Frequently asked questions
 
Q: Why can’t I use my phone for this?
A: You can, and it will help in some situations, but Senstone is fighting a bigger beast. One of the most surprising insights we found is that we lose our trail of thought because of tiniest distractions, which are everywhere: phone call, notification, random sign on a street, previous todo item in your notepad etc. They all trigger new associations and the new trail of thought, simply overriding the ones we had before. Senstone minimizes the time between idea popped up in your head and saved in your notepad, therefore reduces any possible distractions.
 
Q: What mobile devices does Senstone work with?
A: Senstone works with iPhone 5s and higher on iOS 9+ and with Android 5.0 or higher. Tablets and other devices are on limited support. Please reach out to us if you'd like to use Senstone without iOS or Android smartphone.
 
Q: Can Senstone speak back to me?
A: No, Senstone only records your voice, and processes it on your mobile device. It’s designed to listen to you with no distractions, and we intentionally chose to leave off the speaker to keep it as small as it is.
 
Q: How many notes can I store in a cloud?
A: You can store as many text notes as you want, but there is a limit to their original audio recordings, as they take much more space. The basic version will allow you to store 50 hours of notes, which should be enough for 1 year of average use, but you’ll be able to use the premium version of the app for extended audio storage.
 
Q: How long can I record with Senstone?
A: There are three parts to this answer. First, Senstone can store up to 2.5 hours of recording when disconnected from a phone, but it uses your phone’s and cloud storage when connected, which allow many more hours. Second, the battery allows recording for about 3 hours in single charge. Third, the speech-to-text functionality has limitations on how many texts it can transcribe in the basic version of the app. Please read below for details.
 
Q: How many recordings can I make?
A: You can make as many recordings as you want, but there is the limitation to the number of speech-to-text transactions per month. The reason is that we’re using third party API and have to pay for each transaction. The limit we accounted for so far is 300 minute-long transactions per month(average of 10 notes per day), but we will modify this to the factual number of average daily usage. We will allow (almost) unlimited transactions for first 3 months, will measure average usage and will set the limit just above that number. Our goal is for you to not notice any limitations with average use, and provide premium subscription for heavy usage.
 
Q: What’s premium app subscription?
A: Premium app subscription is made for those who use Senstone very intensively and need more capabilities. It gives you much more storage in the cloud, many more speech-to-text transactions and unique features like automatic punctuation and intonation analysis. It will be charged monthly, but we haven’t yet come up with the pricing.
 
Q: Can I use Senstone to transcribe speech of people around me?
A: Not in the first version. Currently, Senstone is a personal device and is optimized for use by a single person. Optimal distance from mouth to Senstone is 8 inches(20 cm). We can record on larger distances, but we can’t yet perform speech-to-text analysis when speakers are located further away from the device. This often includes recording lectures, meetings, or interviews. In those cases, you will have to bring Senstone close to the person speaking.
For this functionality our goal is to roll it our with a software update after we ship you the device, so you don't have to buy a new one. And although we can't commit yet, it is in pipeline.
 
Q: Is speech-to-text recognition quality better than Siri?
A: Short answer: it’s quite similar. Long answer: we tested numerous engines and with the current proprietary NLP deliver results at 95% accuracy and higher and adapting to speaker’s style over time. We are improving these results with noise reduction and additional audio processing.
 For more questions, media inquiries or review unit requests please contact us at team@senstone.io.Press Kit is available here.

story:
Having a printer is one of the benefits of working professionals, as printing out important documents to review is always easier than doing so digitally. But for most of us living in smaller departments, owning a printer is not ideal due to their relative bulk. And so we are proud to introduce you to HPRT, a wireless compact printer that will not only fit into any apartment, but it’s so compact, you can take it with you anywhere, anytime.

Having your own printer is of particular importance during such unique, trying times, when many of us are working from home, perhaps indefinitely. The HPRT Printer can be with you wherever work takes you, keeping work efficiency and at the same time practice social distancing.

Whether it’s printing home work for your kids, or study material for yourself, printing has never been easier. HRPT printer is extremely easy to use, so it’s suitable for children to print on their own, directly from their smartphone or laptops.

Printing used to be a hassle. Well, not anymore. HPRT works wirelessly, making printing a breeze.

Contract signing meetings don’t have to be confined to the boring boardroom. With the HPRT, you can revise files as needed, print them out, and sign anywhere -- at a restaurant, at a cafe, or perhaps at a bar.

You can use HPRT scanner to print files during your doctor’s appointment

Print any charts or sketches anywhere you want, without a computer. Just use your smartphone.

HPRT printer features strong automatic paper suction functionality. Alll you have to do is to align the paper and push it into the slot, and the suction will start, ensuring the paper enters the slot in a steady and controlled manner.

With a resolution of 300dpi, this printer can create decent copies of documents and other materials. The higher the DPI value, the higher the printing accuracy of the printer. Enjoy printing high quality contracts and materials wherever work takes you!

Measuring just 310.5mm X 63.5mm X 39.5mm and weighing 766g, this is the most portable printer on the market. Take it with you anytime, anywhere.

Not only dodes HPRT connects to your computer, it can connect to your phone as well. Use HPRT’s companion app for easy controls.

Connect to the printer via Bluetooth for one tap printing.

HPRT is equipped with a large capacity battery for long-lasting battery life. It can be topped up via portable batteries or other power sources.

As an enterprise in thermal printing industry for many years, HPRT has insisted on its professional technology and services since its establishment, keeping provides perfect printing solutions for all of you. Up to now, there’s over 200 members in R&D Team, and has obtained more than 100 patents in invention. HPRT always keeps the faith Let everyone sees what they think. With HPRT Printers, let your family and your business see what they think and make it together.

story:
• Review & Hands-On By Tyriel Wood - VR Tech!! 

"Right away the clarity of the 5K display over here is pretty impressive!! It is impossible to spot any pixel on the screen that is projected." --Tyriel Wood

 

  • Made by Unbox Fantasy, a professional crew assemblage from the former editors of tech review media. 
     













~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)

Still tethered to the past with an old bulky head-mounted display (HDM) or backpack-sized HD monitor weighing on your mood while working or watching entertainment? You may be feeling dizzy due to the visual ‘melee attack’ of first-gen displays or bothered by curious prying eyes when watching videos in public, or feeling self-conscious like a time-traveler with a bizarre gadget strapped to your head while trying to relax with some multimedia?





Get GodView and set yourself free from old technology for an incredibly immersive visual experience for fun and productivity. Whether you are a hardcore gamer, movie fanatic, or busy commuter looking for an entertainment solution, GodView is a revolutionary solution that delivers an extradimensional experience for multimedia. A next-gen wearable with a perfectly balanced super lightweight, affordable, and stylish design suitable for everyday use.



~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)





GodView is designed as a standard-setting smart device, to bring user & budget-friendly mixed reality to life. Any content on your mobile phone can be cast wirelessly to the 300-inch virtual display in front of you.  It unveils vivid imagery before your eyes, empowering you with superb vision even more lifelike than what your eyes can show you.  



~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
 

  • High Resolution

GodView serves as a match for a professional monitor with a resolution of 2*2560*2560 (5K) that is sharp enough to eliminate ghosting, graininess, or optical grating, which allows you to experience visual details you can’t see with typical displays.




3650 PPI See-Through Demo:



 

  •  Large Display Size & FOV 

GodView creates a massive 300’’ virtual display with a binocular 110-degree wide field of view (FOV) that naturally merges virtual details into the real-world viewed through the lens, for an incredibly immersive experience.

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)

 

  • ​ High Refresh Rate & Brightness

GodView supports a 90Hz refresh rate so the images you see are always extremely smooth without visible flickering, and with a brightness up to 2000 nits, the display is ultra-clear even in bright daylight.
 

 

  • ​Myopia Adaptability

If you wear glasses, it’s time to put them aside! GodView can self-tune its clarity for myopia of -8~0D, which means near-sighted users can see clearly and comfortably without wearing their everyday glasses or contacts. (Offered as an optional function in addition to the standard model). By continuously controlling the change of focal length, the eye can be trained to achieve the purpose of adjusting myopia. Holographic optics change and adjust the focal length automatically according to an advanced algorithm.


~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)


GodView opts for a sunglasses-like design without a heavy battery or processor on-board so they remain stylish and comfortable for extended use. Super lightweight and cable-free connectivity make them effortlessly wearable. Without the distraction of cords or a bulky headset, you can indulge yourself completely with ‘God’s view’ and enjoy the best visuals.




GodView opts for a sunglasses-like design without a heavy battery or processor on-board so they remain stylish and comfortable for extended use. Super lightweight and cable-free connectivity make them effortlessly wearable. Without the distraction of cords or a bulky headset, you can indulge yourself completely with ‘God’s view’ and enjoy the best visuals.
 

  •   Why Super Waveguide 


GodView utilizes the super waveguide optical solution made of lightweight resin. This innovation transforms the conventional head-mounted display into an everyday fashion item weighing just 55g, less than 1/10 of Microsoft HoloLens.





 

  •  Wi-Fi Connectivity 

GodView achieves its unique lightweight performance without a heavy battery or processor onboard. It uses a compact Wi-Fi 6 bridge housing a power supply that can work continuously for over 4 hours and any multimedia on your smartphone can be cast wirelessly to the GodView virtual display in front of your eyes. It’s the ultimate high definition visual experience at home or on the go.

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)


Much of our time is spent on electronic devices, it’s a way to stay connected as well as our main form of entertainment. Instead of simply being an entertainment gadget, GodView becomes part of the fun itself. It is a useful extension of all your existing electronic interfaces, seizing every idle moment for fun. Carpe diem!
 

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)


~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
 

  • Omni-Compatibility

GodView is multi-compatible with devices like laptops, desktops, and game consoles via the world’s first zero-lag GodView USB C to HDMI Cable. Plug & Play has never been so easy! Enjoy a stunning new visual world in an instant.

 

- Boost your productivity on the go with the powerful GodView PickMini (5G Cellular Mini-PC). You can use a Windows-based operating system to run any office applications. GodView is your best mobile office companion on the go.
 

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)


~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
 

- Versatile compatibility to connect all game consoles, like XBOX, Playstation, and Nintendo Switch. Play all your loved console games with a 300" immersive gaming experience. 
 

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)

 

- Cloud-based platform opens a dimension door to any popular games on Steam -- all authorized editions for you anytime & anywhere via GeForce Now & Steam Link.


~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)





  • GodView Light V5 + Galaxy S8 + Live Demo:
 

 

  • GodView Light V5 + Bridge + iPhone 8 Plus Live Demo:
 

 


  • ​ Alexa AI Assistant 

Alexa is the most popular home voice assistant, she’s everywhere! So let’s get heads-up and hands-free from now on with GodView. Use voice commands to simply control any Alexa-built-in devices for a convenient, smooth, and futuristic experience that adds value to your life.


~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)

  •  GodView V1- Lighter Option to Go
     

GodView V1 is lighter but not less powerful. GodView V1 comes as an airy, techy & spiffy option to meet particular needs for portability. Skillful combinations of super waveguides & titanium alloy refine it to merely 28g, light as a feather! It’s more than a pair of glasses, it can really be your newly acquired vision.

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)​







 

  •  Detailed Specification of GodView PickMini

 

  •  What kind of cable to use with GodView Light and what we will offer:

 

  • ​GodView Game Controller that you're interested in:



















The GodView team is led by several passionate members with years of Harvard & Silicon Valley product development experience. We have been dedicated to designing and manufacturing innovative near eyes display (NED) devices ever since our team was founded.

 

We hold a firm belief that if high-tech innovation cannot condescend to meet the needs of the masses, then it has failed its mission.  
 


Driven by patented technology and expertise, we spare no effort to make possible the manufacturing scalability of our product. This strengthens our capabilities as we further develop our business and scale up to meet our customer’s needs. 
 


We are on a mission to bring ar/mr down from the shelf and add more fun to your everyday life.

Without the distraction of cords or a bulky headset, you can indulge yourself completely with ‘God’s view’ and enjoy the best visuals. 
  Why Super Waveguide 
GodView utilizes the super waveguide optical solution made of lightweight resin. This innovation transforms the conventional head-mounted display into an everyday fashion item weighing just 55g, less than 1/10 of Microsoft HoloLens. 
 Wi-Fi Connectivity 
GodView achieves its unique lightweight performance without a heavy battery or processor onboard. It uses a compact Wi-Fi 6 bridge housing a power supply that can work continuously for over 4 hours and any multimedia on your smartphone can be cast wirelessly to the GodView virtual display in front of your eyes. It’s the ultimate high definition visual experience at home or on the go.
~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
Much of our time is spent on electronic devices, it’s a way to stay connected as well as our main form of entertainment. Instead of simply being an entertainment gadget, GodView becomes part of the fun itself. It is a useful extension of all your existing electronic interfaces, seizing every idle moment for fun. Carpe diem! 

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-) 
Omni-Compatibility
GodView is multi-compatible with devices like laptops, desktops, and game consoles via the world’s first zero-lag GodView USB C to HDMI Cable. Plug & Play has never been so easy! Enjoy a stunning new visual world in an instant.
 
- Boost your productivity on the go with the powerful GodView PickMini (5G Cellular Mini-PC). You can use a Windows-based operating system to run any office applications. GodView is your best mobile office companion on the go. 

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-) 
- Versatile compatibility to connect all game consoles, like XBOX, Playstation, and Nintendo Switch. Play all your loved console games with a 300" immersive gaming experience.  

~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
 
- Cloud-based platform opens a dimension door to any popular games on Steam -- all authorized editions for you anytime & anywhere via GeForce Now & Steam Link.~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
GodView Light V5 + Galaxy S8 + Live Demo:

 

 

GodView Light V5 + Bridge + iPhone 8 Plus Live Demo:

 

 


​ Alexa AI Assistant 
Alexa is the most popular home voice assistant, she’s everywhere! So let’s get heads-up and hands-free from now on with GodView. Use voice commands to simply control any Alexa-built-in devices for a convenient, smooth, and futuristic experience that adds value to your life.~NB. I am an animated GIF - give me a second to load :-)
 GodView V1- Lighter Option to Go 
GodView V1 is lighter but not less powerful. GodView V1 comes as an airy, techy & spiffy option to meet particular needs for portability. Skillful combinations of super waveguides & titanium alloy refine it to merely 28g, light as a feather! It’s more than a pair of glasses, it can really be your newly acquired vision.

The GodView team is led by several passionate members with years of Harvard & Silicon Valley product development experience. We have been dedicated to designing and manufacturing innovative near eyes display (NED) devices ever since our team was founded.

 
We hold a firm belief that if high-tech innovation cannot condescend to meet the needs of the masses, then it has failed its mission.   

Driven by patented technology and expertise, we spare no effort to make possible the manufacturing scalability of our product. This strengthens our capabilities as we further develop our business and scale up to meet our customer’s needs.  

We are on a mission to bring ar/mr down from the shelf and add more fun to your everyday life.

story:
Is there anything more wasteful than legal notepads? (Before you answer, remember you are under oath). The original legal pad design hasn’t been revisited since 1888! No wonder it’s the 21st century and the most widely-used writing surface can’t connect to the digital universe and is a doomsday device for trees. 
 

Legal pad users everywhere should be held in contempt! Until now. The Rocketbook Orbit is an endlessly reusable, customizable, cloud-connected pen and paper notepad.  
 


Magnets + Modularity = Magic! The Orbit utilizes customized “Page Packs” that can be removed from the pad! Our new technology uses a magnetic base and has stainless steel rings attached to every pack of Rocketbook pages that can be lifted off the Orbit, flipped 360 degrees, and changed out for a brand new mission.   
 


For your core mission, we’ll equip you with a Page Pack so you can write and sketch at the speed of light, then flip the page for your next objective. A standard lined / dot-grid combo Page Pack is included! But what about other page templates to fulfill all your handwritten needs, like planning the future, conquering your tasks, or writing a fierce space ballad? We’ve got you covered at every phase.


The Orbit uses patented Rocketbook reusable pen and paper technology and is forged with a hard plastic composite with a textured synthetic outer layer so the vessel that protects your notes will last for lightyears to come.   

What is your favorite force in the Universe? Ours is magnetism, which is why we designed the world’s first magnetic binding system. Orbit “Page Packs” are bound with ferrous metal rings and stick to a magnetic pad. That also means the entire Orbit happens to stick to your fridge. 

 
 


 


Rocketbook’s patented technology means the Rocketbook Orbit is designed for endless reusability. First, use any Pilot FriXion product on your Rocketbook Orbit pages for a traditional handwriting experience. Then, simply use a damp cloth to wipe your pages clean again and again! We’re including a Rocketbook microfiber towel for truly advanced erasing capabilities.  
 


Did you know you will consume an entire tree with an average lifetime use of legal pads? Don’t be a weapon of mass tree destruction. It’s not cool for our planet … not to mention that ordinary, one-use legal pads just don’t look cool. Rocketbook’s mission is to eliminate all the boring and wasteful single-use writing products from the galaxy (don’t believe us? We blogged about it … so yea, it’s pretty legit).    
 

Make no mistake, the Rocketbook Orbit doesn’t only exist in the analog world! First, use your Rocketbook Orbit and Pilot FriXion pen to jot down your notes and big ideas. Then download the free Rocketbook app. When you scan your pages with the app, the space-age machine vision will “see” your handwriting and quickly capture your notes from any angle.   
 

The free Rocketbook app will instantly adjust and visually enhance your notepad scans to ensure the digital version is light years ahead of the real thing.       
 

In the app, you can also assign 7 shortcut symbols to "destinations" in the cloud. These destinations can be a folder inside Dropbox, Evernote, Google Docs, an email address, and many other popular services.
 


Control the internet with your pen. Use these 7 shortcut destinations to send your notes, diagrams, and big ideas to the cloud at the speed of light! You can even send to shared folders that your teammates have access to!  
 


The Rocketbook app can even transcribe your handwriting with OCR or “Optical Character Recognition” technology. Transcription allows you to send a digital text version of your notes without ever having to type a single word. OCR also gives you the power to search through all your scans with keywords and phrases. You can even auto-name your files by using the special Smart Title Bar at the top of every Orbit page. Traditional legal pads just can’t keep up! 
 


Set up the Rocketbook app to instantly beam your notes, diagrams, and big ideas. And save precious time by transcribing your handwriting with our powerful optical character recognition technology. For more information on our OCR features, fly over to the Rocketbook Launch page


At the conclusion of our campaign you will be able to:

  • Pick between Letter and Executive size for a personalized experience
  • Choose from four color options for a futuristic style
  • Add additional Orbit Page Packs for maximized customizability 
  • Add more Pilot FriXion pens and colors designed for smooth writing
  • Add other futuristic Rocketbook products to round out your digital note-taking skills 
     

Would you like to add additional Orbit Notepads, custom Page Packs and FriXion Pens to now? Add these dollar amounts to your pledge! 
 


Customers & Duties Information For International Orders

We cannot mark as gift, this is illegal so we will not be able to do this.

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes.

As many of you know, our terms of sale are CIF destination. This means that we pay all freight, but none of the duties or taxes. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through Kickstarter.

As many of you know, Canadian Customs are very strict on products imported into Canada. All products over Canadian $25 are subject to duties and GST or Vat tax. Our invoices are in U.S. dollars, and being converted to Canadian dollars for purpose of duties and taxes, by Canadian Customs.

Here's a link to find the CBSA offices where you can actually go and do the clearance, and save some significant dollars:

http://www.cbsa-asfc.gc.ca/do-rb/services/lvs-efv-eng.html 

This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best crowdfunding projects with 1100+ successful projects with over $450MM raised between them.
