Gemini's superiority comes from the combined power of two independenttablets (Dual-screen laptop). Pair that with our proprietary software and you're flying. Runall your programs, multitask and more - all while maintaining thebest performance of any laptop out there.      Each Gemini is made of two powerful tablets working together to make one all-capable workstation. Each tablet comes equipped with:     We spent 2 years developing a battery system and power efficiency software that work hand-in-hand to deliver over 13 hours of work time for both 15" and 13" models so you can work all day without the fear of running out of juice.     8th Generation Intel i7 & i5 Quad Core With Up To 4.30 GHz
     
   GEMINI
 Hey there, we're GEMINI: the team behind the Gemini Dual-Tablet Laptop. We're here to give a quick introduction! If you've never heard about our company, it's because we've been behind the scenes producing the components that bigger companies use to make their computers. We've also been hard at work since 2004, quietly making other people's dreams into a reality. We can safely say that you probably have something in your house already that has one of our components in it!Here are few of them                  Premium 1.6W speakers for loud, crisp, clear sound.   Supports all Windows programs with no compromises.   For days when you want to use both screens as, well, just screens,we’ve created a premium physical keyboard. A stylus pen is also available!        Order now to be among the first to have this amazing technologyat an absolutely unbelievable price.      We are able to ship worldwide. VAT not included. Please see the reward for details on the shipping cost that applies to you.We plan to ship starting in March-2020. We will keep you up to date on our progress and the expected delivery date of your order.*Actual ship dates may vary. We will keep you notified of your product ship date.By backing now, you’ll get to own one of the very first products off of the line, plus exclusive access to provide valuable feedback that will shape future generationsof the product.

story:
Short Summary

We're looking to produce decorative puppets and other items to sell.

The campaign is about raising enough money to source ethically traded yarn to make the puppets with.  

This is yarn spun by women's cooperatives in India. We want Cask Theatre to be part of giving these communities an income. We also feel that this yarn has very rich qualities to it and we want to bring those qualities out in our designs.

What We Need & What You Get

We need to buy a bulk load of this yarn to get trade prices. Over 5kg of yarn ensures we get a 50% reduction from the importer, plus we need to ensure we have enough yarn to make enough of these items to keep afloat.

Our perks include prototypes of our puppets made out of high quality main brand yarns. These are mainly decorative puppets that can be used as wine bottle covers - because they are prototypes they're too fragile for children, but would still be a lovely decorative addition to your home! There will be smaller one of a kind teddy bears and Cask Theatre key rings on offer as well as much larger creations.

If we don't reach our entire goal, the funds will go to buying as much of the yarn as possible. We're hoping to be a purveyor of these yarns as well as the items we create, so we're going to start from whatever position we can.

The Impact

It is important that as many people invest in fair trade/ ethcially traded goods as possible. Not only does it help people who would otherwise be exploited, but it also sends a message to big businesses that these are the practises people want to see happening in the world.
India has a population of over one billion people with huge disparities of wealth.  It is both reassuring and inspiring that these women's co-operatives are educating, employing and empowering women to take control of their finances, enabling to send their children to school, and to take charge of the family income.  It is also reassuring to see how well established the Co-operative Movement is at supporting communities because traditionally men made all the decisions.

Risks & Challenges

The main challenge with this venture is achieving a balance between what we spend on making the products and what people are willing to pay for them. We're going to do everything in our power to get these costs as low as possible and this campaign would play a major part in that.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you like the idea of fairtrade, handmade Bubba Flumpets and other one-of-a-kind items, please help us get the word out about this campaign through facebook, twitter, etc.
  • Also, please give any help or advice through creative feedback.
This page will be constantly updated with other items as they're created so check back in. We're hoping to offer more perks than we need to to get the target amount.

story:
A SKID ROW CHRISTMAS

THANKSGIVING WAS A HUGE SUCCESS!!  We were able to offer more than 14,000 meals, nationwide, to those in need this holiday! Records were broken and we just keep growing.

But this party, well it just don't stop.  We have a few days left to contribute to the community and we're doing so by continuing the giving spirit.  This month we'll be giving toys and/or clothes to those in need!  And we'll be doing it from this sweet ride:

Beginning today, #GivingTuesday, our every thought is bent towards getting toys to kids in need.   Please help us spread the word and know that all of the funds generated for this and our Thanksgiving event go directly to those in need.

MISSION

This video sums it up nicely:


For the the past 15 years Gobble Gobble Give has spent every Thanksgiving feeding the homeless directly.  The charitable organizations and ‘soup kitchens’ nationwide are doing phenomenal work.  Gobble Gobble Give has a different approach.  We’re a little rough-and-tumble, a little rock-and-roll. 

We assemble meals, clothing, and care kits for the homeless and our volunteers take these packages directly to the homeless and in-need. We’re a big potluck party, and if you’re reading this you’re invited! 

WE NEED YOUR HELP

We’re using IndieGoGo to raise money for our annual multi-city potluck.  Gobble Gobble Give is a 501c3 non-profit and all funds go towards providing food, supplies, and any relevant facility costs to those that host our event.  Anything left over just rolls into the next year.

Every Thanksgiving we try to expand our ability to help feed the homeless, and every Thanksgiving we’re floored by the outreach of support (from our on-the-day volunteers to the companies that donate their goods to clothe the homeless). 

THE NUTS & BOLTS

We’re asking for $15,000 from the community.

Last year we were inspired and grateful for a successful $10k campaign on IndieGoGo. People want to help!  And we want to keep that magic growing and expanding.  

Funds that we raise go into a GGG general fund that we use to buy supplies and food for each location hosting a potluck event on Thanksgiving.  No more, no less.

We're also very excited to announce the inclusion of Nashville and Santa Ana, with more cities possibly joining as we get nearer to T-Day!!

THE ‘NOT SO SECRET’ SECRET

Helping to feed and clothe someone over the holidays is an amazing experience.  The person in need receives some love and support, yes, but the real transformative experience comes from the volunteers that give their time and energy to step away from their holiday obligations to help others. We’ve seen friendships form and lives change with one service.

Thanksgiving isn’t the only opportunity for this outreach and connectivity, though.  If and when Gobble Gobble Give can keep those charitable wheels turning and growing we can start to think about year-round opportunities for giving!

QUID PRO QUO

The Raven Spa was a huge supporter for GGG last year, offering soothing and invigorating treatments and packages for generous backers. This year they’re at it again!  . And check out these shirts!! 


If you really want to be a rockstar (or at least prepare meals next to one), come join in on the fun for a couple of hours on Thanksgiving morning!

GIVE ON, PARTY ON

Gobble Gobble Give offers this potluck event for volunteers every year.  If you can’t donate, spread the word and better yet come help out!

This year we plan to host potluck events in the following cities on Thanksgiving:

  • Los Angeles, CA - Echo Park
  • Los Angeles, CA - Santa Monica
  • Harlem, NY
  • Austin, TX
  • Las Vegas, NV
  • Santa Ana, CA
  • Nashville, TN

Visit our website at www.gobblegobblegive.com to see the details, and thank you very much!

story:
Short Summary

Twist Tickets is an online e-ticketing platform that will allow you to search, share, and purchase tickets to your favorite events. 

My name is Roy Hinson III. I am a young financial professional who, like a lot of you, has watched innovation over the last 5 to 10 years and found a glaring absence in the world of events and ticketing. The only advancement comes in higher prices and added hassle for the events we want to enjoy. After doing some research you find there is really only one company monopolizing the industry and controlling the secondary market in which its products are sold. Without outwardly saying the name, this company’s initials are TM. TM has been around for a very long time with little innovation favoring the customer or the customer experience.

I am going to build an online e-ticketing platform that puts the customer first. It will be more difficult for bots to be used and easier to see events and concerts without excessive fees and ultra-excessive repurchase prices. This is not only a crowdfund for a project but an opportunity to make your voice heard by taking a stand against TM and letting them know it’s time for a change. [KM1] 

What We Need & What You Get

The reason for running this campaign is because development takes a team and that team costs money. What we are hoping is to reach our goal to help put that team together and pay our developer so we can create the first generation apps, on both IOS and Android, for our platform. 

To you we are offering a dedicated ticketing platform with a commitment to innovation and to doing the right thing when it comes to our business practices. Fees are a given these days but when that fee becomes almost as much as the ticket itself, there is a problem. We promise to bring a platform with a sensible approach. 

The Impact

Your contribution will go toward paying our developers. Any monies over and above our goal will go toward expanding our team by hiring the marketing team and other essential personnel needed to make this project a success. 

Risks & Challenges

Our main challenge is being the underdog. We don't have the size or monetary funds to take on a company like TM but we are hoping for a shot. I think that's something we here at Twist are great at taking advantage of, the opportunity to show what a small group of hungry individuals can accomplish. We have persevered through “no's” and failures at business competitions, improving every day. We are ready to take the leap of faith and build this company. Join the journey with us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone can make a monetary contribution, but if you like the idea and think it should be developed please share with friends and family. We appreciate the help that getting as many eyes on this as possible can bring. 

Also, if you would like to help in other ways feel free to email us at: roy@thetrusolution.com

Thank you for your support!

story:
The completely portable dual-screen laptop accessory that promises to boost your productivity by up to 50% and allows for efficient multitasking. Attach the DUEX Pro monitor to the back of any laptop, and you’re ready to work wherever you are!

 

DUEX Pro provides a full 270° rotation, with the option for a 180° presentation mode, so you can choose your optimum viewing angle for any situation. You can also slide DUEX to either side of your laptop screen.

 

DUEX Pro was created with high-quality industry materials and can withstand the wear and tear that comes with transporting your laptop around.

 

At 1.7 pounds, DUEX Pro gives you the true mobility you need to move from workspace to workspace.

 

The DUEX Pro video driver has an energy-star rating to reduce battery drain from your laptop.

 

DUEX Pro is compatible with any laptop via simple USB connection and available in a 12.5-inch size to best fit your laptop.

 

DUEX Pro has a 1080p high-resolution display, so everything you see is crisp and clear.

 

 

Toggling between tabs, windows, and applications can make us lose, on average, about 10 seconds every five minutes. That adds up to be a huge loss in productivity on an average workday.

Unfortunately, a second desktop monitor doesn’t help employees when they work from home or travel.

DUEX Pro is a convenient, yet affordable, on-the-go dual screen option, so the large fraction of the computer-using population isn’t forced to lose out on the proven benefits and productivity that come with using multiple screens.

Every product stems from the invention of necessity, and DUEX is no different. Here’s our story about how we came up with our innovative dual-screen laptop accessory.

While working at Amazon, DUEX’s creator, Jack, was constantly frustrated by the lack of a secondary monitor that could help him work more efficiently. Feeling strangely nostalgic about the work monitor he used at his previous job, he decided to build a laptop monitor from a broken laptop.

During the process, he realized that most of the secondary monitors available were stationary, and he couldn’t move around with them. So, he built a prototype of a light and portable monitor that he could carry anywhere with him.
 

Soon, everyone in the office wanted one, and our product, DUEX, was born!

Yao and Banda are from the MIT school of engineering and the MIT Sloan School of Management where they gained funding from MIT Sandbox, which promotes student entrepreneurship. The team is also funded by IDEA Northeastern, which is a venture accelerator, as Ng attends Northeastern University. 

 

 

 

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make DUEX a reality.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge, so even if you can’t give a dollar or purchase DUEX, if you’re a supporter of DUEX, you can help us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

FAQ

1. Can Mobile Pixels DUEX monitor work with MAC or PC?

DUEX can work with all operating systems. This includes Mac OS, Windows, Linux, Chrome and even Android!

2. What is the screen brightness?

300 nits

3. What are the technical specs of the product?

  • Screen is IPS 
  • 1080p resolution 
  • 300 nits brightness 
  • USB driver is custom built for USB-eDP signal conversion

4. What is the display coating of the screen?

It was glossy, but they have been upgraded to matte

5. Which Android version does DUEX work with?

DUEX will work with Android 5 (Lollipop) and newer

6. Can DUEX monitor brightness be adjusted?

Currently, there is no adjustment option for brightness on Mac, but it's adjustable on everything else. This is due to the current driver software from display link. They may issue an update in the future

7. Is it possible to plug in 2 DUEX monitor screens to my computer if I have enough parts for it?

You will be able to run multiple DUEX, they have individual drivers.

8. Can I buy more adhesives later?

Yes! you can buy more sets later from our online store at a very cheap price.

9. Will DUEX monitor work with iPhone or other smartphones?

DUEX will not work with iPhones or any other smartphones.

10. Will there be tax/import costs to the UK?

We are currently not familiar with such tax/import costs to the UK. We will look into them when we start shipping.

11. What is the thickness of DUEX monitor ?  DUEX is 0.48” thick, so when you attach it to the back of the laptop, it will stick our 0.48”.

 

12. Can two DUEX's be mounted at once to use it as a triple screen?

Yes, it can be. But DUEX was not intended to work this way. You can check the mounting here. 

13. What is the brightness of the screen?

Most 12.5" screens are around 300 to 400 nits. There are brighter ones available, but it becomes a trade-off with power consumption.

14. Any possibilities that the USB connection will be at the other end (near the laptop)? So it won't protrude and look more space-saving?

Yes, we definitely thought about this several times. The problem is that if we place the connection anywhere else, then DUEX will not be able to fold into presentation mode. However, we will ship DUEX with a right angle head USB cable, at least the cable will be pointing downwards.

15. Is the DUEX screen IPS?

Yes

16. Is there a DUEX monitor 17" version?

We have not thought about developing 17" yet. Currently, they are not a part of the plan.

17. What is the PPI for the DUEX screen?

The display is FHD, it is not a retina display which has a much higher resolution. it's about 176 PPI. However, at 12.5", we don't really think it makes a big difference.

18. Is there a short how-to video of the setup (hardware) with a laptop so that everyone can get a better insight into the setup?

We will have a full step by step instructions manual with the product which will be very helpful in the setup. I will also try to get a how-to-video for you! 

19. How sturdy/rigid is the DUEX screen when propped to the side? Mainly due to the stress that will happen on the in-flexion point at the top when folded; to avoid any cracks or having it break completely due to long and multiple uses?

We ran FEA on the hinge design, and have built in a 30% margin. We don't think the hinge will crack during repeated use. Also, the rotational portion of the torque hinge is life-tested to last 30,000+ cycles.

20. Should I install something to start using DUEX?

Yes, you will have to install a driver. For Windows users, the driver will be automatically installed when you plug DUEX in for the first time. For Mac users, you will have to download the driver, we will ship DUEX with very specific instructions. 

21. Will the case be provided for all kinds of laptops?

We will collect everyone's laptop model in the final survey. Once we have that info, we will make a bulk purchase from our supplier for those exact models. It will not be a one size fit all case.

22. Will there be a touchscreen version of DUEX?

Touchscreen will not be possible at this stage. The digitizer for the screen needs to be custom as well as the PCBA. It will delay the ship date by months.

23. How does the case look?

It is a transparent case as in this picture 

24. Is there going to be a 4K version?

That is not possible in the current state. I don't think 4K screens come in 12.5", it will be way too dense. We also need a much higher powered chip for that as well.

25. What's the color gamut like compared to standard Mac models?

The current panel displays 262k colors at 1080P resolution.

What is the thickness of DUEX  monitor ?  DUEX is 0.48” thick, so when you attach it to the back of the laptop, it will stick our 0.48”. 12. Can two DUEX's be mounted at once to use it as a triple screen?Yes, it can be. But DUEX was not intended to work this way. You can check the mounting here. 13. What is the brightness of the screen?Most 12.5" screens are around 300 to 400 nits. There are brighter ones available, but it becomes a trade-off with power consumption.14. Any possibilities that the USB connection will be at the other end (near the laptop)? So it won't protrude and look more space-saving?Yes, we definitely thought about this several times. The problem is that if we place the connection anywhere else, then DUEX will not be able to fold into presentation mode. However, we will ship DUEX with a right angle head USB cable, at least the cable will be pointing downwards.15. Is the DUEX screen IPS?Yes16. Is there a DUEX monitor 17" version?We have not thought about developing 17" yet. Currently, they are not a part of the plan.17. What is the PPI for the DUEX screen?The display is FHD, it is not a retina display which has a much higher resolution. it's about 176 PPI. However, at 12.5", we don't really think it makes a big difference.18. Is there a short how-to video of the setup (hardware) with a laptop so that everyone can get a better insight into the setup?We will have a full step by step instructions manual with the product which will be very helpful in the setup. I will also try to get a how-to-video for you! 19. How sturdy/rigid is the DUEX screen when propped to the side? Mainly due to the stress that will happen on the in-flexion point at the top when folded; to avoid any cracks or having it break completely due to long and multiple uses?We ran FEA on the hinge design, and have built in a 30% margin. We don't think the hinge will crack during repeated use. Also, the rotational portion of the torque hinge is life-tested to last 30,000+ cycles.20. Should I install something to start using DUEX?Yes, you will have to install a driver. For Windows users, the driver will be automatically installed when you plug DUEX in for the first time. For Mac users, you will have to download the driver, we will ship DUEX with very specific instructions. 21. Will the case be provided for all kinds of laptops?We will collect everyone's laptop model in the final survey. Once we have that info, we will make a bulk purchase from our supplier for those exact models. It will not be a one size fit all case.22. Will there be a touchscreen version of DUEX?Touchscreen will not be possible at this stage. The digitizer for the screen needs to be custom as well as the PCBA. It will delay the ship date by months.23. How does the case look?It is a transparent case as in this picture 24. Is there going to be a 4K version?That is not possible in the current state. I don't think 4K screens come in 12.5", it will be way too dense. We also need a much higher powered chip for that as well.25. What's the color gamut like compared to standard Mac models?The current panel displays 262k colors at 1080P resolution.

story:
I believe we're at the beginning of a design BOOM, a proliferation of digitally-generated design. With my new system of digital creation techniques and programs, I am able create hundreds of unique designs, from furniture to vessels, to jewelry. My work exists at the intersection of industrial production and craftsmanship, so every piece I create is hand-folded and one-of-a-kind. We're so, so close to the edge of the digital precipice, and I invite you to take the leap with me with this campaign for my digital vessel!

IF YOU'RE A CHINESE DESIGNER, WHY ARE YOU LAUNCHING ON AN AMERICAN PLATFORM?

For me, Indiegogo and the design-supportive community of the United States is the perfect launch point. I believe that Indiegogo is the right platform to find the support needed to launch an entire digital revolution, a generation of backers that understand and can identify with my vision.  A successful Indiegogo campaign will open all of the following possibilities for me, including larger production and more in-depth research.

HOW DID YOU GO FROM BEING A CLASSICAL CHINESE PAINTER TO BEING A STEEL DESIGNER?

HOW DO YOU DO IT?


Fundamentally, the core of my design process is in creating a collaborative environment between the designer and the computer.

Using custom designed software, I code a series of rules for each pattern. Every rule that I add is a limitation which determines the shape, size, and style of each design. After carefully selecting the limitations, the computer generates the most logical pattern that can fit within these specifications. However, each computer generated pattern is constrained to the screen, and can only be represented two-dimensionally. This means, ultimately a human mind has to discover their potential three-dimensional forms, and determine their practicality as functional objects.

story:
Engadget, Technology Tell, ZNitro, AndroidGuys, AndroidHeadlines, MikeShouts, eWallstreeter, iPhoneMAD, GeekyGadgets, iPhoneClub

The most efficient attachment system that allows you to attach any portable device conveniently to any surface or accessory in seconds.

Snap is too easy: Simple attaching, like magic!

Attaching your portable device to the wall, your bike, the car head-rest, or anything else usually requires a separate attachment system for each type of accessory or surface. With Snap, after you attach the female side to your portable device it will fit into the male end on the entire line of SNAP products. Using commercial grade 3M material as the adhesive, and simple plastic/silicone for the attachment parts, Snap is simple in design, powerful in application, and easy to use anywhere.

Attach a mobile device to the SNAP Money clip

Attach a mobile device to the SNAP Car Dashboard

Attach a mobile device to the SNAP Bike Mount

These are just a handful of the ways you can use Snap. We have plans for producing a line of accessories that make it even easier to attach your portable device to literally anything. Each Snap accessory that we ship will also have a few male/female parts that are ready to attach to anything else the second you open the package. The product ships with a polyurethane material (think a quarter-sized clear screen protector) that can be placed on your device, prior to attaching Snap, in case you’re worried about removing Snap from your device later.

What is SNAP?

Snap is a new accessory system unlike anything ever done before! It's secret sauce is the innovative male/female connector system we have developed that easily and securely "snaps" together.  It's low profile and allows us to offer an endless line of mobile accessories that attach to ANY device. 


How is SNAP Valuable?

From our time working in professional mobile accessory product development, we found there are a number of problems with almost all mobile accessories:

Problem 1: Each Accessory is Made for just One Device.

Today's digital devices come in different shapes and sizes.  There are literally thousands of devices with different shapes.  Typically it's too expensive to make accessories for less common devices, that's why only the most popular devices get all of the accessories.

SNAP Solution: Snap fits easily and securely to ANY device, so no matter what device you own now, or in the future, you have access to the entire Snap line of accessories.


Problem 2: When you Upgrade Devices, you need New Accessories.

Your new device will likely be a different shape or size than your current device, so each time you upgrade you have to buy all of your accessories again!

SNAP Solution: When you upgrade, all you need is a new extremely-inexpensive Snap female connector to attach to your new device, and all of the Snap accessories you bought before, you can keep using.  Finally, you never have to buy those same accessories again!


Problem 3: Because Accessories are Dedicated, they're Expensive.

There are a number of things that add cost to manufacturing a product, one of the most expensive being making the accessories fit to each individual different device.  Each different accessory company has to pay these costs, and they don't share costs with each other, so you never see any savings.

SNAP Solution: We will invest in the Snap connector system one time, so all future accessories will cost less for us to make.  Since it costs us less, we can sell them to you for less.  For example, a typical bike mount that may cost $50 - $60, we could sell for $30 - $40 because we can share the cost of our connector system with our car mount which will also be sold for less than you would pay for a car mount from a different company.

The larger the Snap line gets, the more valuable it is for everyone.  We can save our customers a lot on their accessories because we can leverage our system better than any other company.


Problem 4: You Have No Say in What Mobile Accessories Actually Get Made.

We all use our devices every day, and think of hundreds of things we could do with our devices if we had the right accessory, but it never happens for us because no one ever makes them and we have no one to tell about our awesome ideas.


SNAP Solution: Your involvement in the Snap community doesn't end with Indiegogo.  Our ongoing Snap Development Center will give voice to Snap users for new Snap accessory ideas that they want, and can vote up to actually see them made.  Think of it like an Open-Source hardware development. There will be incentives for those with good ideas to share them, especially if those ideas end up as a new accessory that is actually made.

When we say Snap will become more valuable for everyone the bigger it is and the more accessories that are added to the line, we literally mean it.

Story / History

The Snap product was originally invented by Eric Child and was sitting in his garage collecting dust while he focused on some of his other product inventions (one of which was recently on Shark Tank). Craig Morris and Nate Bradshaw have been friends with Eric for a long time and have talked about many different products and projects together.  When Eric showed them Snap, they instantly knew it would be a major success.

Craig and Nate originally met 4 years ago in the Product Development department while working at ZAGG, a publicly-traded company and one of the largest mobile accessory businesses in the USA. After getting their feet wet in mobile electronic accessories, they left along with a handful of other employees to start their own companies. Three of those former employees that left ZAGG have run successful Kickstarter campaigns.

Craig and Nate approached Eric about letting them run with Snap.  They organized a team of some of their best and most successful friends from a variety of backgrounds: Manufacturing, marketing, distribution, and operations.  Together they convinced Eric to let them try and raise the funds necessary to bring it to market. Eric had been too busy to work on Snap, because of the success of his other products so he happily agreed to let them run with it.

Production Timeline

It is important to us that our backers understand what our plan and timeline is for fulfillment on our rewards.

Once we have received the funding from backers, tooling will begin immediately.  Tooling is the manufacturing process of building the equipment necessary for mass producing a product.  The tool, or mold, is what will shape plastic into our product so that it can be sent to you.  The tooling process takes time to ensure each of the products manufactured are identical and of high quality.  This process will take about 30 days to complete from the time we receive funding so we can pay to have the tooling begin.

Once the tooling is finished, mass production manufacturing can begin. It will take about 30 days, starting after tooling is finished, to make all of the products and have them ready for initial production shipment.  Our current manufacturing arrangements are off-shore, so the products will need to be shipped to the USA before they can be individually shipped to each of our backers.

It takes an ocean container about 2 weeks to travel across the ocean with the products, and potentially another 10-14 days to process the shipment through USA Customs, transfer the load onto shipping trucks in the USA, and deliver them to Utah.

From there, the final leg is to pack the individual orders for our backers and ship them out so that you can receive them.  Packing will likely take 7-10 days, and USPS Shipment should arrive anywhere in the connected USA 48 States within 3 days of being shipped out the door.  International orders will obviously take a little longer to arrive.

We will be in communication with our backers, giving progress updates along the way so that everyone can have the proper expectations and knowledge (including reasons) if there happen to be any delays.

Risks and challenges

Scaling to thousands of customers: 
The key challenge in our project is delivering the product on time, to any location in the world, while keeping production and shipping charges low. 
Our manufacturing partner, Allen Zhang CEO of KinSpring who lives in China, has 20+ years experience in plastics production for some of the largest consumer brands in the world. Coupled with our experience in supply chain management, we will create efficiencies and ensure timely production and delivery.

Product Adhesive Strength 
Snap has more than adequate adhesive strength; some consumers may feel that the adhesive may damage the product it attaches to. If such is the case, we ship each Snap product with a special polyurethane ‘patch’ that can be attached to the device first, and Snap then attaches to the Polyurethane ‘patch’.

Shipment of Product 
If you desire early delivery, we will charge extra freight costs separately.

story:
What is DoNation?

The DoNation is a non-profit, global community of givers - a Nation of Doers. We are people who not only care about social good, but want to Do something about it.

  • There are millions of people from 18-35 (and outside that age range) who do not currently give their time or money to charity - what if we could entice them with the ease and simplicity of doing so right from their phones? Even if each person only gave $1 or one hour, imagine the massive impact on the causes that matter most.
  • Founded in November 2013, The DoNation quickly developed a website connecting donors to 1 or 100 charities, at any dollar amount, within seconds.
  • Now we want to expand this capability to every web and mobile device - in the form of an app. We also want to enhance the community, social sharing, and volunteering capabilities of our website so we can come closer to fulfilling our mission. 
  • Imagine giving to any non-profit in the world instantly from your phone, especially in times of emergency or special need. Imagine coordinating volunteer events and actions from your phone - even competing with your friends to attain higher levels of Do - imagine a global community of givers, one that didn't exist before.

Let's build an app that will change the world, together. Let's revolutionize not only the way people give, but the way they Do More and Do Good in their communities!

Paul Gubbay, VP, Design and Web, Adobe Systems is pumped about DoNation!


Our Mission and Vision

  • Mission: DoNation is dedicated to increasing global contributions and raising awareness of charitable causes through the growing community of social media.

  • Vision: A global population of givers who are empowered and more active in their communities because of their social connections through DoNation to charities/volunteering/activism opportunities in their communities. Millions of people coordinating volunteer events and opportunities, donating to emergencies and worthy causes instantly, and investing their time in the causes they believe in - all in one place. 

  • Goals: To make social good, donating, and volunteering more mainstream, easy to access, and popular via a ready-to-use, easily navigable interface and infrastructure that caters to people of all backgrounds, histories, and social situations.

The App, Website, and What You Get

Here's the skinny:

  • Each app platform (that's iOS and Android) will cost about $15,000. We will use the rest of the money to make our website more social, communal, and national.
  • The app will be a simple, user-friendly interface that will allow Facebook and Twitter integration along with the ability to arrange one time or recurring donations within seconds.
  • Show the world that you Do! $5 gets you some sweet stickers. $15 gets you an "I Do. Do You?" t-shirt! $25 gets you access to the beta version of the app on your platform. $250 gets you a Super Do-Per Cape from Amazing Capes (another successfully crowdfunded company) and a Skype Date with the Founder.
  • If we don't reach our entire goal, we will use what we get to nationalize the website, add a huge amount of social integration, and make the first DoNation Stations. 

The Impact

Millions of people who have never given before contributing to the causes that matter most.

  • How many people do you know that currently give to charitable causes or non-profits? How many of your friends would be much more likely to give if it was THIS easy?!
  • According to BlackBaud, a popular fundraising company, 62% of Generation X would be willing to give to charity through their phones. Why don't we make this happen, together?
  • Everyone wants to Do More Good in the world - now we can, right from our phones and other mobile devices.

DoNation Stations

  • DoNation Stations will eliminate the need for checks, cash, and forms - all in the lobby of your favorite non-profit, instantly. Imagine how many more people would be willing to give a few dollars here and there with a swipe of their credit card or by simply clicking "Yes" to use their preexisting DoNation account. 
  • With a ready-to-use infrastructure built specifically for each non-profit, every organization will have a customized DoNation Station look and feel. When placed in an independent organization, donating to multiple non-profits will be disabled so as to maximize the contribution to that non-profit. The user will still be able to share their volunteer commitment or monetary gift through the station.

FAQ

Is DoNation a non-profit? Yes. We are currently registered with the State of North Carolina a public benefit non-profit corporation. We sent the IRS our 501(c)(3) application in December, so we're just waiting on them to tell us they love us.

Do you take a cut? Yes. 1.1% of each transaction. Which is very, very low (especially compared to other "charity" sites who are taking between 4-7% of each transaction for themselves). If you do the math, we'd have to have over $2,000,000 in transactions to provide ourselves with an average teacher's salary. So, yeah, we're not in it for the money.

Then why? Because the non-profit world needs this tool - if you know anything about non-profits they are often lacking in technological efficiency, modernization, and their websites look like they're from 1999. We're here to change that.

What's your end-goal? A worldwide community of givers, Doers, and people who are totes in to changing the world. A bunch of people who were never really aware of the world of non-profits or social good donating between $1 and $5 monthly to charities (see: millions into the non-profit world that weren't there before). Dare we say.. the "Facebook" of #socialgood.

Any other preguntas? That's Spanish for questions. See, you learned something today! But seriously, if you have any other questions, concerns, ruminations, musings, commiserations, or just want to scream at the top of your lungs, feel free to drop us a line. We pledge 100% transparency in everything we do, no if's, and's, but's, or butt's about it.

The CEO of TopFloor Studio Web Design Firm is excited about DoNation!


Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

  • SPREAD THE WORD! Share our campaign. Like our Facebook and Follow Us on Twitter. Tell your friends that there's this really super cooltastic idea you saw on IndieGoGo and if they give us a few bucks they can get a sweet t-shirt, or water bottle, or stickers. Or a really, really big bear hug that even bears will be jealous of.
  • Share this thang. Share it like you mean it. Please. We just want to make the world more awesome, really.

And that’s all there is to it.

every organization will have a customized DoNation Station look and 
feel. When placed in an independent organization, donating to multiple 
non-profits will be disabled so as to maximize the contribution to that 
non-profit. The user will still be able to share their volunteer commitment or monetary gift through the station. 
FAQIs DoNation a non-profit? Yes. We are currently registered with the State of North Carolina a public benefit non-profit corporation. We sent the IRS our 501(c)(3) application in December, so we're just waiting on them to tell us they love us.Do you take a cut? Yes. 1.1% of each transaction. Which is very, very low (especially compared to other "charity" sites who are taking between 4-7% of each transaction for themselves). If you do the math, we'd have to have over $2,000,000 in transactions to provide ourselves with an average teacher's salary. So, yeah, we're not in it for the money. Then why? Because the non-profit world needs this tool - if you know anything about non-profits they are often lacking in technological efficiency, modernization, and their websites look like they're from 1999. We're here to change that. What's your end-goal? A worldwide community of givers, Doers, and people who are totes in to changing the world. A bunch of people who were never really aware of the world of non-profits or social good donating between $1 and $5 monthly to charities (see: millions into the non-profit world that weren't there before). Dare we say.. the "Facebook" of #socialgood. Any other preguntas? That's Spanish for questions. See, you learned something today! But seriously, if you have any other questions, concerns, ruminations, musings, commiserations, or just want to scream at the top of your lungs, feel free to drop us a line. We pledge 100% transparency in everything we do, no if's, and's, but's, or butt's about it.The CEO of TopFloor Studio Web Design Firm is excited about DoNation!
Other Ways You Can HelpSome people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:
SPREAD THE WORD! Share our campaign. Like our Facebook and Follow Us on Twitter. Tell your friends that there's this really super cooltastic idea you saw on IndieGoGo and if they give us a few bucks they can get a sweet t-shirt, or water bottle, or stickers. Or a really, really big bear hug that even bears will be jealous of.

Share this thang. Share it like you mean it. Please. We just want to make the world more awesome, really.

And that’s all there is to it.

story:
We are living in a world moved by technology; a world that is changing in every single minute; and a world full of innovation that is kicking in and reshaping every aspect of our life. ROLLOVA is a product of that very nature - a digital ruler that transforms the way you measure things. Most importantly, a ruler that measures a variety of surfaces easier than ever before.

 

  

 

● Measuring just got easier - and more fun

● Replacing your traditional ruler with a pocket-friendly gadget

● The 10000:1 high-contrast ratio OLED screen provides brighter display and outstanding energy efficiency

● Measuring everything from flat surfaces to curved objects

● Full stainless steel body combining the best of ruggedness, precision, and style

● Compact size for measurement on the move

Our measuring gadget comes complete with a genuine leather case – sure to become your favorite pocket-sized ruler. It features an OLED screen that is compatible with Major Units of Length and engineered in a stainless-steel wear and tear resistant body. The design is minimalistic, and the measurement is accurate.

UNBOX ROLLOVA

 

IN THE END:

story:
iCall - connecting the world

We all know the frustrating feeling of trying to maintain long distance relationships with family and friends with the lacking quality of international calls over VoIP Applications that suddenly loose connection, voices are delayed and all you can hear is - HELLO can you hear me now? The other option, making a regular phone call, will probably make you want to cry when you see your phone bill.
     


Call2World is a small team of 5 people located in Barcelona, Spain. We have developed a set of innovative B2B services that facilitates international communications and generate big savings for companies.

We want to use this knowledge and experience to create something everyone can enjoy - iCall!   

iCall will be a call Application that connects people by eliminating international communication barriers that you can download through App store or Google play. 


The good part...

- The price/minute is going to be extremely low and it will be fixed no matter what destination you are calling to

- You don’t need any data connection to use the App

- Does not require both users to have the application

- You can refill your credit wherever you are, on App store or Google Play

- High quality phone calls (meaning that iCall is not another VoIP App)

- As long as you have credit on iCall you can make calls, even if you lack credit on your phone's prepaid card

- You will keep your same number

- You are in control of the costs since the price/minute never changes and you decide how much credit you want to charge.


How does it work?

1. Download the App via App store or Google Play.

2. Charge your credit on App store or Google Play.

3. Select a contact to call in your contact list that appears in the App.

4.Within 6 seconds our server will call you back. When you answer that call you'll be automatically forwarded to the person your are calling.

iCall will make it as simple as that that to make real International phone calls.

No need to struggle with data connection-required Apps that lack quality anymore.

(picture of our successful B2B-application, which iCall will look similar to)


Keep your friends and family living abroad closer!

"Communication to a relationship is like oxygen to life, without it...it dies" 

- Tony Gaskins


First Countries to get iCall

These are the countries we will start introducing iCall in. Contact us to get the full list of destinations  you can call to from these countries.


Barcelona Boat Party

Celebrate the launch of iCall on the Mediterranean sea with us!

If we together achieve our target of 25000 euro we are going to arrange an unforgettable launching party for iCall with our amazing contributors as special guests... It will take place on a big boat cruising around outside the beaches of Barcelona with an amazing atmosphere including food, cava and good music. 

Add the boat party perk to your other perks to make sure you don't miss this day!


Dear contributors...

We will develop and launch iCall within approximately 16 weeks from now. 

The importance of our early adopters and the cannot be overrated, we are depending on your usage of iCall and feedback in order for us to make iCall the perfect App for you. 

We want to take iCall to as many countries as possible in order to fully achieve our mission to connect people all around the world, your contributions will help us to do so.


Perk-ilicious

Don't forget that besides the catamaran party, we have some other cool perks. Let us introduce:

The "Barcelona-Style" T-shirt



Proud Contributor & Early Adopter Phone Case



The Happy Reminder Keyring



Follow our progress here

In this section we will keep you updated on the progression and development of the Application! We will outline how your contribution makes us move forward. Follow us!


Limitations

- We want you to be aware of that the number of countries with ability to use iCall in and the destinations to call to are limited at this moment (see the countries above), but of course support help us bring the service to more countries!

- iCall is a service for making International calls from your country, it does not cover roaming charges when you are going abroad. 

- The party is going to be amazing, but unfortunately we can only arrange it if we achieve our target. 

- If you live outside out Europe, please add the 5 euro perk for delivery, in order for us to send you the perks (t-shirt, keyring or phone case). 


    Don't forget to spread the iCall word around on Facebook and Twitter - we will randomly pick 1 person who have shared our campaign to get invited to the party!
